title: Old is gold
desc: Concorde hotel, orchard road is about half an hour drive from changi airport. Centrally located with all the conventions at a walking distance. Wonderful staff but the rooms are little damp and one could feel it.

title: Perfect location and great service
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights and we loved it! What a wonderful place, location is right on Orchard Rd and short walk to bus stop and train station. The family room is large and spacious. Staff were very friendly and helpful, food is good plus fantastic hospitality. Special thanks to Sulianto Tee for making my birthday even more special here, it was a really nice surprise to have a birthday day cake and lovely dinner with my family at spice restaurant, definitely one to remember, thank you again for everything. Jacy and Rita are both so friendly and nice to talked to, we felt so comfortable staying at this place and would gladly book this hotel again.

title: Cleaning time
desc: I stayed at room number 619 for 5 nights. one of the days, cleaning of a room near my room started from 7am which woke me up. I think that cleaning of rooms should not start from 7am and it shoud be at earliest 9am.

title: Superb
desc: We stayed at this property for nearly a week. Everything about this property was exceptional. The service, staff and facilities were absolutely superb. Finally, the restaurant, food, and hospitality were fantastic.

title: services
desc: this is my first time but got very good service from information, check in and check out counter services, taxi hotel, I will be back again and introduce my collegues and friends Much appreciated Thanks

title: Complaint
desc: The hotel location is good, but some problems with the management. I made booking for 4 rooms, 2 rooms with lower rate, and 1 room with higher rate. When we checked in and enter the rooms, we found that 3 rooms with lower rate are OK with king size bed as per my request, but the 1 room with higher rate for 2 adults and 1 small child and 1 infant was 2 single bed with baby cot. while the other facilities are same withthe other 3 rooms. I requested to change the room, it was not available in the first day, in the second day hotel offer me other room with lower grade. Why I have to pay for higher rate. Why don't you upgrade me to better room?

title: Satisfied stay
desc: Had our wedding in this hotel in 2018 and was given a one yr open date complimentary stay in their premium room for our anniversary. We just had our stay and no doubt to their great service, they went extra miles to noticed it was my husband's birthday in two days and sent a small cake with handwritten card to our room. It was such a pleasant surprise for us. Such gesture is thoughtful which i believe many other places will not bother. Other than this, their staffs are polite and warm from us arriving, to dining, to checking out. Definitely recommend this hotel . They may not be the best hotel in orchard but they make it up by great service attitude which you will love for sure.

title: Singing in Singapore!!
desc: I stayed at the Concord hotel as I was performing at a wedding that was taking place there. The facilities such as the gym and pool were all clean and easily accessible. The staff were very polite and always ready to help and accommodate in every way. Will be coming back definitely.

title: Lovely hotel central location
desc: A gorgeous foyer and great location. Room was lovely but the family room is just some bunks pulled out. At check in the lady we had was rude and very unhelpful. The next day the same thing with staff not seeming to know what‚Äôs going in without talking to their managers. Breakfast buffet is great but same again, staff nice but seem a little alouf.

title: Location, Service top class
desc: Location is great. Free parking too. Only found the price slightly on the high side and the room is a bit dated especially the bathroom. The power points at the desk were not all working and I thought I'll be getting a bigger room because I booked a triple deluxe room but it's just a standard room with an extra bed thus there wasn't any space left for the mini table in the room to be usable. Not a real big deal and I would definitely stay there again. The staff were amazing from checking in to 3am room service all very good.

title: Hotel, Room & Executive lounge
desc: Hotel location was good. Room was very good but it will be nice to have a bath in addition to shower. Executive Lounge was very nice. We had a lovely time there. The ladies was very friendly. Breakfast was very nice in comparison the restaurant.

title: Another lovely stay at Concorde hotel
desc: We have stayed in this hotel since 2015. The staff are always warm and welcoming when we return, the hotel is quiet and charming, with a live pianist, and the same staff remain over the years. This time, they gave my husband a cake for his birthday breakfast, and the manager invited us for cocktails that night. A special hotel for us! Thank you for the warm welcome, itS a pleasure to come back.

title: Tired but okay
desc: Just got back from a two-night stay at the Concorde in Singapore. Went for an international conference held at the hotel. The room we were given was right beside the pool so we had the keep our curtains closed most of the time since we didn't feel comfortable people being able to see inside our room. We had a king-size bed with a terrace. The room was very spacious but you can smell that the carpet was old. My rhinitis was going crazy but an anti-histamine a night helped. The shower was also spacious and I appreciate that the shower knob was right at the entrance of the shower to avoid that shock of cold water. The toilet seat was a bit wobbly so it was tricky but we managed. I appreciate that the toilet had a bidet sadly the water pressure was too low. We ate breakfast at

title: Concorde Singapore
desc: Nice 4 star hotel located at the start of the famous Orchard Road shopping precinct. Lovely foyer and my 3 year old loved the lifts with the view of the foyer. Rooms were good, although two armchairs would have been nice. No bath but shower was large enough for her to shower with me. Kids pool was great but quiet cool due to the shade over the top. The main pool was good for a me as it‚Äôs 1.2m all the way so I could walk up and down with my daughter easily. This pool was warmer as no shade cover so got the warmth from the sun! Room service was an average of 20min which was good. Close to many shopping complexes with many good court option available also. Tour desk consultant Diane was so helpful and friendly. Overall, we had a lovely stay. They lost a star for the cold kids pool

title: Very good experience
desc: I stayed 4 nights in this hotel. The location is great, near MRT station. Rooms are confortable and the staff is very kind. The breakfast was very qualitative as well with enough western options. The pool is also quite nice. The only negative point is the insonorisation of the rooms that are pretty poor. I had to call the reception one night for very noisy guests, great reaction however of the staff that sorted the situation !

title: Location AND laundry
desc: One cannot appreciate enough a dedicated laundry room at guest's disposal, when staying 3 weeks with family in Singapore. Worth the gold. Along with location. Pity I couldn't open my room window though. Rooms with terrace are much nicer.

title: üòçüòçüòç
desc: it was a last minute booking for me and family. pleasant stay, service was great. great sleep. the deluxe plus rooms was spacious. no regrets. rooms are clean. up to expectations for me. im thankful that they have water hose/bidet in the toilet.

title: Enjoyable stay at the Concorde
desc: Enjoyed our stay at the Concorde. Room was a good size, Restaurant meals and breakfast were very good. Close to the main shopping centers in Orchard Road as well as the train system. Will stay again when next in Singapore

title: Hotel details
desc: So this is one of the best hotels! I have ever experienced. The stay is worth ur Pocket. If there is anyone around check in and enjoy ur trip to the fullest, Thank you team concorde Singapore. You guys are the best!

title: Singapore Hotel
desc: This hotel was for us the best location there is in Singapore, The service was exceptional and the staff were friendly and most helpfull, actually going above and beyond Top service on fast Checkin, so helpfull in restaurant I found that I didn't have to think Excellent travel desk service

title: Wonderful stay in Singapore
desc: The wonderful experience started from the entrance. Wonderful and compassionate staff, special thanks credited to Rachel (front desk), Rita (Spices cafe), concierge team and 7th-floor room attendant team. The location is great, right on Orchard Road, close to shops, MRT and bus station. My family and I had a great time during our 5 nights stay. Wilson Indonesia

title: Great Location with Newly Renovated Rooms
desc: Hotel is located right on the vibrant Orchard Road, where one can indulge in shopping spree and fantastic culinary experience. All major shopping malls are within walking distance. Orchard Road is almost in the centre of Singapore and thus commuting to other parts of Singapore from this hotel is convenient and choices of transportation are abundant. The building may look outdated, but our room was newly renovated. We stayed in the deluxe plus room for 2 nights, and we had our good rest. Bed was quite firm, comforter and pillows were fluffy enough to our liking. Toilet was clean and hot water was almost instantaneous available. Breakfast was included in our room rate, and it was mostly continental with a small selection of mediocre Singaporean or Asian cuisine. The selection is

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Everyone at the Concorde are very professional, efficient and caring. i always enjoy my stay at the Concorde, it is like my second home. i highly recommend the Concorde Hotel, Singapore to anyone wishing to stay in excellent hotel in Orchard Road.

title: Very relaxing hotel
desc: My wife and I stayed at the Concorde twice for 2 nights on our way from Sydney to Helsinki and for 11 nights on our way back. The room on the way over was good but the air conditioning was a bit too cold however the room on the way back was excellent. It was quite and peaceful and a great place to relax in at the end of the day. All the staff where very professional and at the same time pleasant and courteous. Nothing was a problem. It is a great hotel and well worth staying at.

title: Good value
desc: The hotel is on the good location of Orchard road. The room is quiet and large. The breakfast should have more variety of food. I prefer non-smoking room but it is not available. There is a free cell phone for calling in the room. The WiFi speed is good. Overall is good.

title: overall
desc: good Welcome at the reception on arrival Luggage storage facility staff at reception take good note of my request to have a room with shower instead of bath tub good Assistance provided at the reception and at main entrance for instance the corridor at the 5th floor has cigarette smell

title: Clean & comfortable room
desc: Usually my family like to stay at other hotel. But when I asked them to try Concorde, they just love it. They love the location, the cleanliness, room space and the breakfast. Surely we will stay again.

title: Great Service and Staff
desc: We have just come back from a ten day holiday in Singapore. We could not praise this Hotel enough. Everyone we came in contact with staff wise where fantastic. The room was very comfortable and spacious as was the bathroom. Fresh bottles of water everyday toiletries supplied and the use of a dressing gown and slippers perfect.We had a balcony suite the only complaint we have is we where in room 519 and looking at a wall but we could still sit out and have our happy hour regardless. We had our breakfast in Spices caf√© every morning what to have so much to pick from even an egg station to cook your perfect fried eggs to my husbands delight. We also had dinner in the caf√© three nights as well and again to much to pick from the food was amazing. Just a suggestion at breakfast

title: Jasmine is a very rude front reception manager who treats guests badly
desc: An extremely ill-mannered reception desk manager named Jasmine. A small miscommunication regarding checkout timing was handled very unprofessionally by her. She yelled at me and taunted me to the point that I was shocked, belittled and I could not help myself but cry in front of everyone in the lobby. I will never stay at concorde again. Spent 11 nights and that's the low level of courtesy I received as a guest. LOST LOYAL CUSTOMERS!!

title: An extremely ill-mannered reception desk manager named Jasmine.
desc: An extremely ill-mannered reception desk manager named Jasmine. Jasmine at front desk lobby has been extremely rude while handling a very small matter. Her behaviour and rudeness has left my daughter traumatised to the point that she broke down and cried in the hotel lobby. Please deliver courtesy and manners training to her. My advise to you would be to stay away from her as she can mentally torture you. Also, you have lost 4 loyal customers from my family, who has been a part of concorde for many years.

title: Excellent
desc: Excellent hotel. I liked everything including the premier lounge service and the location. The food was very good. I was very impressed by the cleanliness. The suite was spacious and thus very comfortable.

title: Very good location and service
desc: Very good location, near MRT station. Bus stop at front of building. Orchard area.... love to stay here.... Rooms very good and big. Food for breakfast need to be improved.... Very helpfull staffs....

title: Very comfortable hotel
desc: Spacious room made for a comfortable stay with nice bathroom and toiletries supplied. Shower temperature was hard to regulate though. Room was clean and friendly housekeeping staff were helpful. Breakfast selection was good but dining room aircon was too cold. Rita was very welcoming and made us feel at home. Good location on Orchard Road and handy to Dhoby Gaut MRT station.

title: Great location on Orchard Road
desc: We had two nights in the Concorde on our return from 5 weeks in UK. We were given a fourth floor room which had a disappointingly musty or damp air about it. I asked for a room change to other than that floor (which smelt musty). After some discussion with staff and then a manager my request was met with a move to the 6th floor. Much better up there. The hotel was reasonable value but a little older and tired. Staff generally lovely and helpful, particularly Ross in the dining room. A good gym and nice outdoor pool.

title: Good Location
desc: Good location but the breakfast line is less choices. Japanese restaurant is awesome. In fact it is a good place for family as well. Gym room is reasonably equipped. Room service is not at par though. Overall experience is good.

title: a pleasant stay
desc: Hotel is in a nice neighborhood and has great facilities. Staff has been friendly and helpful, professional and efficient whether at check-in or check-out time and throughout the stay at the hotel. Particular helpful has been the reception desk¬¥s Ms Nesh who not only processed my check-in and check-out but also efficiently and effectively attended to a request for extended check-out time. Most helpful in a friendly if not charming manner of conversation while focusing on resolving room assignment issues related to my request for extended check-out time. Additionally, the breakfast has been a delightful experience. Certainly the hotel is to be recommended

title: Great place to stay.
desc: Room was spacious with everything we needed. The lobby was very attractive and the staff were very pleasant and helpful. Breakfast was excellent. We were able to store our bags until mid afternoon and we were given access to an area where we could change before our flight. Bus stop right outside the entrance.

title: Comfy stay
desc: The room is large and comfortable. There were a few problems with the television and the internet but the staff helped immediately. The breakfast buffet was good! Concorde is located along Orchard Road, which has many malls, shops, and restaurants. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Best stay in singapore
desc: My wife and I recently stayed in your Hotel for 10 days had a great holiday in your lovely country. Your staff were wonderful, those who deserve special mention are Mok, Suki, Jenna, Rita and Gee Hoon

title: Very nice
desc: Very comfortable hotel on Orchard Rd, I had a nice room on level 8 which even with door to balcony open was very quiet and I really appreciated this, I like the idea of 4pm checkout when booking direct, pool area was nice, shame about prices for poolside food and drinks, i was keen on a drink but not $10-$15 for a basic drink, apart from that free bottles of water would be a good idea, this is a nice hotel though with professional staff, I would definitely come back next time I transit via Singapore

title: excellent
desc: My stay was very rewarding the staff where very friendly and helpful. the location to both the mtr and the shops was very convenient . would stay again on my next visit. all the facilities where excellent

title: Update
desc: Great Location, close to buses, underground and shopping. Marvellous staff, on arrival, at reception, dinning and cleaning. Large comfortable room with coffee/tea making facility fridge and including ironing board and iron.

title: Great experience!
desc: very nice room. there was a complimentary phone they lend you to use around the city with wifi. the room was clean, with hair dryer, steam iron, slippers, bathrobe, and loads of complimentary soap. we loved the bar soap! staff were friendly and attentive. thanks to our room attendant adam. we also loved the food in the breakfast buffet. staff were also very accommodating especially Rita. thank you so much Concorde! will definitely stay here again next time üòÅ

title: Food problem as international
desc: It ok but you must think about the people no like Asia food Specially the Chinese food . You host many people from around the world. So think about it. The other thins was good place good to stay but hard to eat in .

title: Singapore Hoilday
desc: The hotel staff where excellent. The hotel has an a very good location and is central to most things you want to do in Singapore. The food and drinks where top class. Offered medical assistance when an emergency developed.

title: comfort
desc: the room was comfortable but the bath towels were old. beds and pillows are soft but the room view that was provided was not good as it was back of the building. the slipper provided was only for one day use and there were no universal power outlets.

title: Good hotel in Singapore
desc: Good service and food, best location and nice officer. I really like the Concorde hotel so much. It's nearly the Singapore Plaza and other such as Don donki Zara Uniqlo and H&M. And It's also closely the MRT.

title: Great Location, Standard Hotel.
desc: This is your basic hotel, lacks character though. Clean rooms, nothing fancy. A bit pricey but I guess you are paying for the location. Close to MRT station and on Orchard Rd. Decent enough pool to cool off with kids after a tiring day.

title: My Second Stay in One Month
desc: A work colleague recommended this hotel as I find the larger ones too crowded. It's a little dated and old school but quieter and the staff are great. Good location and the rooms are a good size with all you need. There are a few shops and restaurants on the floor below the hotel but many are empty. Breakfast is good but less choice than other hotels but this is a reflection likely of the lower price to say here. If you start breakfast early, at 6am, they are often a little slow to get things going. All up I will be a regular as I like the rooms, the quieter atmosphere and location.

title: Spacious room, excellent service & central location
desc: Situated in Orchard Rd, this hotel provides easy access to many popular sights in Singapore. There are numerous bus services & shopping centres just outside the hotel. We had a very spacious room with very comfortable beds & the staff are very attentive.

title: Delightful stay.
desc: We 3 (3 generations) stayed at Concorde hotel both on way over to Europe and 3 weeks later on our return. We enjoyed everything anout the hotel. The staff were friendly and helpful, the food for buffet breakfast and from the bar menu was delicious and plentiful. Our room was roomy, very clean, tidy and well appointed. Dressing gowns were available. The bus stop was right outside hotel to take you to all locations and quality shopping and food venues just up the road. The reception area is vast and beautiful with comfortable couches in various areas to await check-in or departure. A live pianist was playing one night and it was lovely. We were able to use the pool and shower after check out on first visit and had complementary early check in on return which allowed us to sleep

title: Quick stopover in Singapore
desc: Excellent service. The staff were accommodating. The rooms were bright, modern and very clean. I would definitely stay here on our next trip. Wonderful location on Orchard Road. Nothing was too much trouble for staff.

title: Impeccable Service and Top Facilities
desc: As our first visit to Singapore we were 'newbies' and needed plenty of assistance! The reception and concierge staff were very helpful and made our stay a pleasure. The Concorde catered well for children with well designed rooms and the pool was appreciated.

title: Perfect p≈Çace for business stay
desc: Good location and facilities. Very clean and quiet. Tasty breakfast and very good service. Moderate price. A lot of space in the room. WiFi was very fast. Great idea regarding mobile phone as room equipment with free maps and calls.

title: The Concorde Hotel experience
desc: Ideally situated on Orchard Road and very close to the MRT. The MRT is a very clean efficient and customer service oriented way to get around Singapore. The Concorde Hotel offers excellent service in all areas of hospitality. The staff are friendly and efficient. The consultant in the Tour Booth has a wealth of experience dispensed with a great personality and the ‚Äúno trouble‚Äù manner that is synonymous with Singapore.

title: perfect hotel
desc: In this hotel we had a stopover to Australia. We travelled with Singapore Airlines. We took an upgrade so we could check in inmediatly. The room was perfect and the hop on hop off bus stopped near the hotel. The staff was friendly. We enjoyed it very much. Next year we do it again like this. Sorry for my English I'm from Holland.

title: Jupiter refit at Keppel
desc: In Singapore for work, left hotel 07-00 in morning and returned at 19-00 at night, only time to eat & sleep apart from quick visit to Premier club room very little time to do anything else Spicers OK but buffet leaned more to Asian food, most of which was good. Breakfast a good selection

title: Comfortable stay
desc: 1. No hardcopy newspaper 2. Kitchen staff not so friendly. Surprised that they are allowed to use mobile phone whilst on duty 3. Friendly and courteous front office staff and bellman 4. Comfortable room and excellent location

title: Lovely staff in a beautiful hotel
desc: We stayed here for a few days on our way to a tour of Australia. Our tour company had reserved this hotel and we were extremely happy with their choice. We were booked in by one of the lovely reception staff and even though this was done quickly and efficiently we were given a refreshing cold drink whilst we waited. Our sparkling clean room was very spacious with very comfy large twin beds, spacious bathroom, wifi, bathrobes and slippers etc. We were soon unpacked and quickly out into the busy but exciting Orchard Road. The location of the hotel is excellent and there are lots of public transport available on the doorstep. We tended to walk quite a lot of the time and totally enjoyed the ambience of Singapore. After a mad and hot few hours we went back to the hotel for

title: Super Breakfast
desc: Great location walkable to orchard road. Shopping,hop on / off bus stop, train station just in front of hotel. Night entertain club just underground Fl. A food court just in a corner. Staff very helpful. Breakfast was a hi light. Not so pricey of you compare with other in Orchard RD.

title: Good Place, Nice Ambience.
desc: Spacious and clean room. Good privacy and excellent sound proofing. Convenient location, accessible multiple transport types. Excellent place with friend;y staffs for a short stay to relax or re-charge.

title: Excellent
desc: Everything is very good. Breakfast, amenity kit, sleeping, room condition, staff's service, etcs... Just, it would have been better if the tea & coffee that prepared in the room were prepared with more variety.

title: holiday
desc: Need to make changes to the dinner menu at Spices and the in-room dining menu. We been eating the same stuff for the past 4 to 5 yrs. We stay at Concorde 2 to 3 times an year. The service is very good . helpful and very pleasant staff, especially those at the premiere lounge.

title: My favorite hotel
desc: During this stay, we were given a bigger room with swimming pool view. The room comes with a sofa and bath tub which really benefit our 4 nights stay. They gave me a slice of birthday cake which really surprise me. Will definitely stay with here again. My son will always cry when it's time to leave this hotel.

title: David Wright
desc: Nightclub on the second floor noise was evident in my room 469. Rang housekeeping 9.00am last Sunday to have room made up-returned 3 hours later-not done. I asked a cleaner to do my room next-which he did. Half an hour later another cleaner knocked on the door to say he had a message to clean my room.....told him it was cleaned, he seemed surprised. I will continue to stay at the Concorde when in Singapore.....even though there are no powerpoints in the bathroom !!

title: Singapore Holiday
desc: Terrific Hotel, rooms very clean & tidy overall great place to stay. close to all the shops in Orchard Rd, breakfast was included in our accommodation, meet and greet at the front door was terrific, my wife & I had a great time at the Concorde.

title: Convenient location
desc: Location is close to Orchard and MRT stations, Somerset and Dhoby Ghout. There are bottled water provided in the rooms, it saves a lot of hassle of buying bottled water back to the hotel every night. Staff at reception desk is friendly and we managed to get a late checkout as our flight is late at night. Overall, a comfortable stay.

title: Another great stay at the Concorde
desc: This is the fourth time that we have stayed at the Concorde Hotel. Check-in and rooms are great and pool is a good size however they need to bring back the umbrellas poolside. Whey-Whey has been there each time we have visited this hotel and every time has given us excellent service. She's an asset to the hotel! Breakfast buffet had a good selection however a lot of the hot food was cold and the eggs were under done many mornings. As mentioned in other reviews there is a fishy smell in the foyer that comes from the restaurant at lunch and dinner time. I would be very put off by this if I was a first time guest. We will definitely stay again but I think hotel management should consider the points mentioned above.

title: Scratching the surface of Singapore
desc: The Premier Club allowed access to a privilege where we could begin our day with a beautiful breakfast in fabulous surroundings. We would plan our day and check with the Tour desk, Diana gave us extra tips to make our trip enjoyable. A knowledgeable local, she was able to provide information to make our decisions to what activities we could do in the time available. Winding down at the end of the day in the swimming pool was a relaxing end of our daily activities, then to refresh ourselves and head down for cocktails before heading out for night activities that included many light shows in the Gardens and in front of the Fullerton Hotel. Many things to do and see in Singapore. The staff were friendly and helpful and treated us like royalty on our stay. Nothing was an issue.

title: Holiday Singapore
desc: Hotel in great location with good views. Friendly hotel staff and good food. Clean room with good amenities and room service. Check in and check out staff very friendly. Loved the lifts and welcome lounges and cafe staff very friendly and welcoming.

title: Great hotel
desc: Very good Hotel overall. Great facilities (gym (was very good for hotel gym), restaurant), great location on Orchard road, clean property, staff were very friendly. I would definitely stay again and happy to recommend

title: good service
desc: I bought one bottle of wine and try to open, but no wine opener in the room. I requested reception to bring opener to my room. after 10 min one staff from Hotel restaurant came to my room and opened it.

title: Amazing place to stay!
desc: We stayed here for 3 days before we boarded our cruise ship and were pleasantly surprised by how we were treated, the condition of the hotel and the amazing breakfast buffet. We arrived at 0730 and were able to upgrade our room (after 20+ hours of traveling) to shower and get settled in. They even held our bags for us until it was time to board the ship , even after we checked out. The staff was amazing, nice and so very helpful. It was our first trip here and we had many questions. They answered every question and suggested great places to go. We highly recommend staying here!

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Excellent hotel friendly staff lovely room. Clean stayed here before in 2001 will Return soon . Recommend the afternoon tea Lovely swimming pool sun beds spa Great positions for shops as right in orchard road.and station

title: 3 nights stay April 2019
desc: excellent Hotel, close to bus & train stations, restaurants. Very comfortable, big room. Staff extremely attentive. Excellent breakfast. We took deal for premier club which was excellent value. Included food & drinks from 6-8 every day and complimentary breakfast. Had to leave very early on last day so used other breakfast room which was also very good. Would recommend this hotel on all fronts.

title: Great services and facilities
desc: Premium Longe is very useful, comfortable and very kind service stuff as most important Piano play during evening spread out luxurious mood and feel very relax even hearing from room Unfortunately I could not use pool but I want to make time to relax there in next singapore business trip

title: Excellent Customer Service!!
desc: My most recent stay at S'pore Concorde Hotel was absolutely amazing... I was here with my parents for 4 nights. Check-in : Staff at check-in counters welcomed us with a warm smile. Ms.Nicole, Mr.Akhi and Ms.Natasha assited us during Check-in process. Staff found very efficient , friendly and helpful. Bell Captains assited us with our luggage to the room. I was given a Spacious room with all required amentites including a free Mobile phone during your stay with data. Rooms were sound proof and best for light sleepers. Mr.Akhi suggested many restaurants in Orchard Road for my dad since he is a vegetarian. The staff at Spice restaurant found very Cheerful and attentive. They prepared Vegetarian Dish as per my dad's diatery requirements on the day we arrived. The

title: Staycation
desc: Booked Premier Suite comes with lounge benefit. Room is huge and spacious. Mini bar is complimentary. Had cocktail and snacks at lounge. Overall very good service, will go back again. Only downside is called for makeup room but nobody came.

title: Great value for money
desc: Really good hotel for those who go to Singapore for business trip. Breakfast was fine. Good laundry service at reasonable price. Room was really clean. Concorde gives guest a lot of opportunity to participate in event.

title: Bad experience! NOT RECOMMENDED!
desc: I checked in very late at night, so tired and found that the fridge was not working. (Room 509) As I need to put something I bought for food&drinks. Then I call one stop service. The answer was no there was no problem about the fridge in this room. Therefore I insisted that there was!!, staff said ‚Äúwe‚Äôll send someone‚Äù and there was no someone in at least 20 minutes of waiting. I decided to change the room and go sleep with my colleague room on 4th floor. Towel on the toilet floor was not prepared in the room. The worst part was that there was a surprise wake up call for me by the loud sound of constructions at 10am, screwing and smashing non- stopping. I really needed some sleep before going to work in the evening as I was so tired last night but could not sleep at all. I

title: Singapore
desc: This is a quality hotel with good facilities. Good resturant, swimming pool and gym. If you are a smoker ask for a balcony room. Handy location for all the sites of interest. Good tip to get around is to get a tourist ticket for public transport. Approx 10 dollars per day and you can use buses, underground and trains.

title: Singapore Vacation
desc: Room was large, clean, and was in a great location. Everything we needed except for the ESPN TV sports channel! Included cell phone was a bonus. Able to walk in 5-6 minutes to the MRT, a supermarket, fast food, and about any other kind of restaurant you can imagine.

title: Spacious room with a view
desc: Loved our room with a balcony. The air conditioning was a welcome relief from the heat outside, although a bit too cold for us and not changeable. A very elegant pacious room and bathroom and very clean

title: Amazing service
desc: Stayed here on a stay prior to taking a cruise. The service was amazing. Tourist event tickets, money exchange, early check-in(if room is available), and the beat breakfast i have ever had. There breakfast buffet was nothing short of amazing. The drink at check-in was a great surprise as well. The only possible down part was a very firm mattress. Location was excellent as well. Walking distance to all the major shopping and great food.

title: Great value for a super location
desc: This is an older hotel which has been well maintained and has all you would need from facilities, location and good value. My wife and I enjoyed the Concorde Singapore and would not hesitate to stay there again.

title: Stopover in Singapore.
desc: Good location, friendly staff, excellent variety of food choices for breakfast and seafood buffet. Housekeeping left a lot to be desired and we even had to ring to ask our room to be cleaned and towels replaced on one day as it was clearly forgotten.

title: Ms
desc: Overall experience is good as compared to previous stay. The location can be easily access through MRT, Grab and close to Shopping district. Wide spread of breakfast buffet but strongly suggest to improve coffee quality. Comfortable bed and spacious room but air-cond seems like not very cold. I will still choose this hotel for my next trip to SG.

title: Stay at Concord Hotel Singapore
desc: When coming to Singapore my favorite place to stay is the Concord Hotel. Nice hotel, good location friendly staff and good service. I have been staying at this hotel for nearly 15 years (even when it was owned by the group Meridian) and the standards did not change over all these years.

title: Amazing staff-Mia helped me with my breakfast
desc: I had an absolute pleasure to stay again at Concorde, where everyone is so helpful and accommodating, Mia from the restaurant, helped me choose my meals, asked me how my food was and made everything so easy. It's just so nice to have nice and friendly people that care about your existence and walk that extra mile to make you feel good!

title: Splendid
desc: Pros: 1. Excellent location. Hawker food, convenience store, shopping malls, bus stop etc are within short walking distance. 2. AWESOME staffs, right from our arrival until departure. Check in & out were swift. Smiley & friendly faces everywhere (FO, restaurant, Concierge). Special thanks to Bonita (FO), Joe (Concierge) & Gee Hoon (Housekeeping). Also to ALL the staffs in Spice restaurant on breakfast shift, very helpful & diligent (too many names I can remember). They could even recognized my face & my husband's on our second morning of stay (very strong memory üòÄ). 3. We stayed in Room 660 (I don't know what the room type was). Very spacious with complete amenities. Love the ironing facilities (a housewife's job is never done üòÜ). Room's layout was fantastic with modern

title: First time to Singapore
desc: Satisfied with my first visit to Singapore. I went for some business thingy and had a very tight schedule during my stay. So I decided to pick a hotel with the best location in case i have some free time to strolling around. This one is best!

title: Friendly, excellent service, wonderful location
desc: My second stay with Concorde Hotel, and as first stay, I enjoyed this fine hotel. The staff, from restaurant hostess to room attendances and concierges, are friendly and do their jobs with a smile! The room (a deluxe) was comfortable, nice work area (yes, a business trip), the breakfast truly international fare and delicious. You can't beat the location: two MRT stops within an easy walk and buses stop right outside the door. Lots of dining options in the immediate area if you want to dine outside the hotel.

title: A family vacation
desc: Stayed for a family vacation. Good location, friendly staff and a very helpful tour desk. Would have liked more options for food outside the Hotel premises, though we could not explore much. Overall we do recommend it.

title: Excellent hotel with excellent staff and amenities
desc: This is the second time I have stayed in the Concorde the last being 9 years ago. The room i had 754 was excellent. So much space. I was on the Premium Lounge package and I have to say the lounge and particularly its staff were first class. The location on Orchard Road is perfect. What is there not to like.

title: very convenient location
desc: right on orchard road. nearby an mrt station. great access to everywhere. friendly staff, from reception to housekeeping (ms janet an elderly lady who is very kind and sweet), to restaurant staff (sweet and friendly malay lady with glasses) made our stay a very memorable one. will definitely come back to this hotel.

title: Family Holiday
desc: My husbandand i spent a week at the Concrde Hotel Singapore and were very happy with our room, hotel staff were very nice and helpful. Spices Restaurant in the hotel offerred a wonderful breakfast and we also enjoyed an Asian Banquet for lunch and a Seafood Banquet one night for dinner. Located on Orchard St with buses running just outside for easy transport. Good hotel great location.

title: Back again
desc: We chose to stay at Concorde for the fifth time because we knew what to expect from previous experience. It was our first time to stay in one of the updated rooms which overlooked the street behind Orchard Road. On previous occasions we have stayed overlooking Orchard Road but this different location was not a problem since we didn't stay there just to look out the window. The room was kept clean and nicely presented and any request, such as an extra towel, was promptly attended to. We really appreciated the new style of bedlamps for reading at night. Rita greeted us in Spices Cafe on our first morning having remembered us from previous visits. Breakfast there is always a treat with plenty of choices in a pleasantly presented space. The staff in the Cafe we found to be

title: Wedding & 1st night bride & groom stayover
desc: The experience was by far one of the best I've had. The room I stayed in with my husband after my wedding there was amazing but the room where I stayed in for my wedding preps with my family was not as what was described online. It was small and cramp with no tub as stated. I had to pay for an upgrade to the tub ones.

title: good condition and service
desc: Locally, it was convenient to move to different parts of the city. The service of the staff was excellent, and the amenities of the hotel were well used. Overall, it was a satisfying stay. I'd like to stay next time.

title: Excellent
desc: I have already written regarding the premium club restaurant service. The rest was all fine. A super and a convenient location. It was fully worth the price and the staff especially at the front office reseption was extremely accomadative which is the first impression given to the guest.

title: FIRST VISIT TO CONCORDE
desc: A great experience in this ideally located hotel. Receptionists are very attentive, the beds and rooms especially the ones located on Orchard road are very good. The lobby is a superb retreat and the ambience is enhanced by the superb piano player.

title: Good location, good food, good service & good transportation
desc: I have stayed at the Concorde several times and the reasons are quite simple: 1. Good location: it is central to shopping as it is located in an important intersection on Orchard Road; and it is close to the MRT - Somerset & Doby Ghaut stations. 2. Good food: the breakfast is very good; the lunch menu focuses especially on local specialities; while dinner is most delightful. 3. Good service: the service has not dropped. Highly recommended

title: Great Hotel
desc: Very helpful staff, hotel is in a very central location and close to MRT. Breakfast is excellent. Room as really good. Would recommend this hotel as the place to stay in Singapore when you next visit..

title: Awesome!
desc: Good service, nice food, nice and clean room. The only hotel with staff that remembered my name. Stayed in quite a few hotels with Club rooms and this is the best. Will stay at this place again. Awesome!

title: Lots of room of improvement
desc: 1) aircon was super noisy when temp>25 2) cleanliness not done in details. Hairs/dirt/ old tissues left on the bed sheet from previous day weren‚Äôt attended at all: 3) toothbrushes/shower gel/shampoo not refilled 4) face towel not refilled on the 4th day 5) old flabby paper coaster for the teeth washing cup was left separately at the corner of the table every day. One on each end

title: Wing at 619 -673 rooms
desc: Music from lower ground floors outlets of the building was continuously super loud until 4-5am in the morning . Hotel can‚Äôt do anything Because these are independents outlets in the same building. Can‚Äôt get a good night sleep for 2 consecutive nights !

title: Comfortable stay
desc: This was the second stay at the Concorde in the last few weeks. Comfortable and spacious rooms. Personally preferred the walk in shower to the bath with shower. Top air conditioning. Complimentary water, tea and coffee. Complimentary smart phone. Pleasant front desk staff and helpful. Other service good and responsive when required. Did not use restaurant as found plenty of options close by including breakfast. Good location on Orchard Road. Bus stop outside the hotel and two MRT stations close by so easy to get about and explore.

title: Wonderful!
desc: We had a wonderful experience! Wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect since I booked it on a Cruisline package - would stay again for sure ! Great location on Orchard Rd and very clean and wonderful staff ! Breakfast buffet better than excellent

title: A very good stay, as always
desc: I stayed in Concorde hotel for about a week. It was my usual short-term contract. And as usual the stay was pleasant and efficient. I have also noticed some small, but significant improvements. For example, the card readers in elevators worked better. And the on-line pop-up survey asking the guests about their experience and allowing them to report things that don't work is great. Especially for people like myself, who can put up with minor inconveniences, postponing the complaint and eventually forgetting about them.

title: Miss
desc: We really enjoyed our stay in this hotel the food was super and amazing staff Susan at the bar with Jenna and maria all are amazing especially Jenna who is always smiling and fast not forgetting Joanna who always made sure my room is at its best ,club sandwich was my best if I happen to be visiting Singapore anytime soon I will surely book with you.keep up.

title: Satisfying Stay in Concorde Hotel
desc: I would like to recommend this hotel. Best location, nice services, warm services, nice and comfortable room. The location is very near to the MRT station. Grab or Taxi access to lobby is also easy. Easy to find food, but kinda far to walk to the central of orchard (Takashimaya). Overall recommended.

title: Great Room and Location
desc: good location, clean and spacious room, great buffet style breakfast. within 5 minutes walking distance to Somerset MRT. nearest shopping mall is OG and Orchard central which have all good restaurants

title: Great hotel
desc: Great location, facilities and F & B. Definitely good for business travelers, and probably for families too. Room was huge and definitely suitable for work trips. All in all an extremely good experience with no adverse issues to raise.

title: Great Value
desc: The hotel staff are very friendly. Modern and clean room. The location is excellent and a short walk to nearby shopping mall. A short walk to MRT station. Breakfast and evening snack at the premium lounge were great.

title: Very Average Stay
desc: Very old hotel, shopping centre and food court is either closed/ghost town now. beds as hard as concrete, staff not very helpful, would not stay again. Hotel needs to be demolished and built new. Overall below average experience, would rather pay more elsewhere

title: A great stop over trip
desc: the hotel was great and in a great location to lots of shops and money lenders and other facilities. the room was clean, tidy and good internet connection, staff very helpful and willing to help with any issues.

title: Good location and fair rate
desc: Can see gradual renovation happening over the years, the rewarded food & beverage voucher for direct customers made a difference, room service F&B was reasonably fast, and twice I had been upgraded, all this makes me come back as a repeated customer

title: good guest service
desc: the handy in the room was useful in getting discounted tickets for the zoo. the morning buffet was diverse and delicious except for the dried hard-edged waffle pieces . pancakes were great especially.

title: great location in orchard road
desc: The Concorde Hotel in Singapore is a very nice hotel in Orchard Road. The location is fabulous for walking to shopping, plenty of food shops and close to MRT. The club rooms are spacious and the staff are very friendly. We certainly enjoyed staying here.

title: Good location
desc: Good location, Break Fast taste good for me. Room was clean, Bed was comfortable. BUT I needed a room with Bathtub. basic toiletries, Shampoo and Conditioner was not separated. I needed both. there was no comb.

title: Good location and excellent customer service
desc: I stayed at the hotel for a night but it left such an incredible first impression. Firstly, the location of the hotel was very convenient! I can choose to alight at Dhoby Ghaut or Somerset. The two stations allow me easy access to other MRT lines too. Also, the room given was very spacious and new. I had the room with the balcony. Although there were no nice view, but for the price I paid, it really is worth every cent. Needless to say, the service given was amazing. Staffs were very friendly. The two staffs that attended to me were Khaz and Noreen. Both of them showed great professionalism when handling admin matters. They both listed out everything in detailed, especially when checking out. I was assured that since I had no extra charges, my card would not be charged.

title: Good location and cost effiency
desc: Very close to ochard road and good facility quality to cost. Convenient to go shop and bar. There is a big park near the hotel. Not distant from the marinabay. Just 10 minutes takes. Breakfast is not great but so so.

title: Affordable accommodation along Orchard Road
desc: The staff in the well located hotel are friendly and we will definitely choose to stay here again in our next visit to Singapore. It is easy to get around the main shopping areas along Orchard Road. Closed proximity to MRT station is a great plus for this hotel. The room is pleasantly spacious and is clean and well maintained. We had included breakfast during our recent stay and the selections provided were sufficient.

title: Great Hotel at Great Location but slightly overpriced and probably only one taking deposit for stay in 21st century.
desc: Everything is good as regards hospitality, location, service etc. What really discerned me was something purely commercial and hotel policy. They demand a security deposit even if we pay the full amount in advance before check-in. I have never come across any hotel with such practice anywhere else globally. My Credit Card limit remains blocked despite me returning home. So go only if you have money to spare.

title: Welcome as warm as the Temperature
desc: First time in Singapore hotel room's adequate size very large shower superb food very varied and plentiful staff excellent and very helpful. Would recommend and will give a excellent review on Trip Advisor.

title: Great Location
desc: Lovely hotel and have stayed there several times. Rooms are spacious, clean and house keeping is excellent. Large variety of food to choose for a delicious breakfast. Hotel is situated in a perfect location on Orchard Road.

title: First visit to Singapore
desc: Excellent location and facilities. Helpful staff. Spacious room with quality fittings. Extensive breakfast choices. Unlike a lot of hotels the Concorde provides rooms that have a degree of individuality which made us feel at home. Would definitely stay there again.

title: Concorde Hotel
desc: Very dissapointed with receptionist attitude, which is not friendly .otherwise everything was fine. Location near to plaza singapura and dhoby ghaut mrt station. Approximately 5minutes walking distance

title: Good Location
desc: Located right on Orchard Rd, so it‚Äôs great for shopping, buses and trains. Too much disparity with service, some people are treated like Gods and some people like an inconvenience. No birthday cake for us or welcome drinks. It is easy to see it‚Äôs a guests birthday as you copy our passport, there are birthday cards and a sign in our room. People have continually mentioned the bad smell in the lovely lobby, yet nothing is done about it. Our room was nice, it was good to have somewhere to put family luggage, rather than over the floor. The bathroom was a decent size too. The restaurant was interesting, very expensive for average food especially breakfast.

title: Concorde soars
desc: Good value for money and really appreciated the late late checkout as well as the ability to use the Premier lounge for another hour while I waited for my taxi for the late night flight out of Singapore.Decent coffee and breakfast at Spices

title: Nice Place to stay at
desc: The hotel place is super, aroud the hotel so many facilities for shopping, wining and dining , and some amusement are avilable. The hotel it self has hygienic facilities. The staff are friend ly and efficient. I would like to stay at this hotel when I come to Singapore.

title: Great Place
desc: Nice and comfortable stay. Check in is a breeze. Accessibility is good. Location is excellent. Good for short and long stay. Quiet and serenity. There is a few few good food locations nearby. And orchard road is a good place to shop.

title: Very good
desc: I always enjoy my stay at your Hotel. Good service, good breakfas, convenient location etc.The above is my review and I think that it is not necessary to write minimum 200 characters.Please reduce minimum characters from next time.

title: Good time
desc: I'm so impressed welcome drink and birth day cake.And other services were provided with high quality and kindness.I would like to stay your hotel again if I have opportunity to Singapore for biz. and privat.

title: Awesome hotel
desc: Value for money hotel, good location located at orchard road that where you can plenty of shopping, restaurants. Hotel offered free hotel front parking for hotel guest which is perfect for traveller with car

title: Central to Singapore
desc: Well located hotel with easy access to public transport in every direction to take you to all the landmarks of Singapore. The service during our stay was friendly and accommodating. Would definitely come back again.

title: Great central hotel
desc: Just returned from a 3 night stay in Concorde hotel. The hotel is located on Orchard road close to all the shops.This is a return visit and is a great hotel with very friendly staff. It supplies a great breakfast and nice food for lunch. I would recommend this hotel to anyone thinking of going to Singapore for a few days.

title: Good service by Emma
desc: Warm service with a smile..sejuk mata memandang pretty with nice personality.. very helpful & deligent.. i will definetly come again. loves the hotel room too!the pool is huge and clean. Thumbs up Concorde Hotel singapore

title: Prime position
desc: We enjoyed our stay & the position was perfect. Staff were very professional & friendly. Rooms were very clean & comfortable. Pool & surrounds were clean & uncluttered. Highly recommend the Concorde Hotel as a great place to stay.

title: Concorde Hotel Singapore
desc: A very friendly hotel. Very well placed in the City. Service is of a very high standard. The Dining Room is excellent. The pool is possibly the best that I have encountered anywhere in a Singapore Hotel. Thank you.

title: Overnight stay.
desc: Overnight stay following a cruise. Large spacious rooms. Very comfotable. Very cetral for main shopping area. Staff very pleasant and went out their way to enable early check in. Good internet connection. Nice pool area. Central for many eating places. Overall a grest stay. Got taxi to airport from hotel ealy next morning which was very straight forward.

title: Good place but building need renovation
desc: Thank you for a good service, friendly staff and good location and facilities. Good place but building need renovation. It is obvious that building is pretty old one. Was surprised that room is pretty quiet.

title: Poor quality for a 4 star hotel
desc: Stayed for 2 nights. First night was made to wait 30 minutes for a shaving kit. Had to make 3 calls before finally receiving it. Second day room was not made up upon returning to the room in the evening. Housekeeping came only at 6 to ask if room had to be made up. Also found flies in the bathroom.

title: Excellent Service
desc: Our room reservation was wrongly made for a day earlier and we only realised the mistake upon check-in. To add to that, this is for our overseas relative who is in town for our brother‚Äôs wedding. Duty Manager Kev was calm and handled the situation for us professionally! We couldn‚Äôt ask for a better person. He single handedly saved our day. Not only did he managed to save our booking but he walk up to us personally to assured us that everything will be alright and we just need to concentrate on the family‚Äôs big day! Kev is definitely an asset to the hotel! I‚Äôll definitely recommend the hotel just because of Kev. Thank you very much! - Khafidz Family

title: Thanks
desc: Thank you very much. I shall be again come to you by end of this month because location is very excellent. All shopping mall area are waking distance. MRT is nearer to go any where. Even MEH hospital is also waking distance.

title: Terrible Choice
desc: The marble flooring entrance is impressive but that's where it ENDS. We waited a long time to check in. Only 2 receptionists dealing with 2 guests in front of us. They seemed to have various problems that took a long time to solve. When one guest was finished, the receptionist let someone else jumped the queue. Not a good first impression for a hotel of this calibre!the rooms are shabby, dirty and need of an urgent remake. towels were torn and with holes and the worst bed and linen, The bathroom has an unpleasant smell.The staff I encounter was unfriendly and unwilling to help, not a smile in sight, room service was extremely slow, had to call twice each time and the whole thing took at least 30 minutes at least for each request. THE WORST HAD TO COME, food tray were seen left

title: Concorde exellence
desc: I had a really relaxing, worry free stay. The hotel employees were super friendly & always willing to help, and the tour desk and concierge really knew their stuff on trains, buses, attractions, show times & shopping. A great experience right before xmas!

title: Good location and excellent personnel
desc: 27 days stay, and the personnel in this hotel make you feel at home...Thanks Rita, Natasha, Shinobu, Nesh and Cherry...Always smiling and happy to serve...Location is one of the best, the surroundings are full of shopping malls.

title: Convenience & Comfort
desc: It's our 3rd or 4th stay in Concorde Hotel. I love this hotel because it is in proximity to shopping malls. You walk out to your right and there are shopping malls sprawling a few distance away like, OG, OC, Cetrepoint, & Somerset 313. While walking out to your left, there are other shopping malls like Plaza Singapura and Capita Mall. Getting a cab is convenient too, just step out of the entrance, and there's a staff who will assist you. MTR is also nearby. About 5-8mins walk from hotel. The room and bathroom feel new since the hotel has undergone renovation. Breakfast is ok. The staffs are accommodating and they always greet you with a warm smile.

title: Anniversary Stay
desc: Excellent hotel staff whom deserves a üëç for their top notch customer service and assistance from making the reservations to check out. But rhe rooms need some refurbishment but overall a great n memorable anniversary stay. Wld return again.

title: Location, location, location.
desc: This was an amazing stay. The service was great and the location made all our outings convenient and trouble free. There were great restaurants and shops in and around the hotel that made getting good food and souvenirs easy and a good value.

title: Customer Service
desc: But the 668 room outside balcony din't put safety protective (A bit dangerous for the children).Employee didn't bring us to room and just show follow this lifter and can find my room! I feel a bit sad because i bring 2 child and also need carried many luggage! I feel a bit disappointed!

title: Staycation
desc: There are two single beds in the room however there was only one blanket and we had to inform them that they forgot to lay out the second blanket. When the flowers in the toilet withered, why don‚Äôt the Housekeeping people just throw it away instead of leaving it in the toilet and letting it turn black??? Overall experience is just average I Guess.

title: Great Hotel & facilities
desc: Great Hotel . The location is good & the Breakfast Buffet is wonderful. We especially found the lady at the Tourist Information Desk very warm, helpful & full of great knowledge about Singapore! Would def stay here again.

title: Good
desc: Good Location: No issue to stay SIngapore and to enjoy SIngapore.I can recommend this hotel to everyone.Good facility:Shower room is wide and very clean.Good room: Very wide type. but pillow was little hard.Good Staff, Good Breakfast.

title: great staff, rooms need renovation.
desc: Staff is A++++ friendly, courteous, helpful. Breakfast was very good. Lobby is nice looking.Room is comfortable and clean, however it is old and tired looking. Needs to be painted, needs new furniture, and to be professionally decorated.

title: No refund
desc: I stayed early December, and during check in, i was asked to deposit 100 sing $ as security. My bill was being paid by my sponsor company. There was no consumption at check out and the reception staff said this would be refunded. I am waiting. I have written a couple of times, No response.

title: Love the new look!
desc: We had a one-night staycation at the Concorde Hotel in May 2018 to celebrate Mother‚Äôs Day. This is not a new hotel, but have been refurbished recently. The check-in was fast and smooth and the reception staff were friendly. Our room on level 8 had a balcony attached to it. It was a corner room, and the view from the balcony overlooked the city area. A quiet and cosy balcony for reading a book, or just sitting there and enjoy the scenery. The room was refurbished recently. When stepping into the room, we liked that the layout was seamless. No protruding corner, safe for young children to move around in the rooms. The writing table was aligned to the TV wall, it was just a straight line on our left when we walked into the room. There was single sofa and rather spacious

title: Simply and very well emplacement
desc: Very professional, clean, good equipment in the room and very useful emplacement. Easy and professional check-in and out. Nice room service. The concierge was the only one decue. He has been a little rude with me.

title: stay at Concorde
desc: We stayed at Concorde from 3rd - 8th December, and for 1night 18th Dec. Reception staff were very good in giving us early check in on 18th Dec, which we much appreciated. Overall a good clean and friendly hotel, and close to cbd

title: Good area. Friendly staff
desc: Great check-in.managed to get same room as previous stay.USB needs to be checked regularly as some no longer work n may damage your phone. Balcony needs to be cleaned & maintained regularly. It‚Äôs moldy in the corners of the wall & sliding doors. Bathroom sink is slow to drain & even after complaining it‚Äôs only slightly better. Managed to snag 2 Umbrellas for our usage as it is rains in the afternoon and most evenings.Housekeeping needs to step up.teaspoon in room is not cleaned thoroughly and showed previous tenant coffee/tea stain at the bottom.On last day,room not made up even when we left quite early in the day for breakfast and quick last min shopping. Back by 2pm n room was still not made up.asked for 2 bath towels and took 3 calls before it was sent. That was more than

title: Great Hotel
desc: The rooms , foods and location are great. Staffs are so helpful. There is also a tour desk , we go around Singapore by bus and so easy to access . We‚Äôll be back to Concorde if we go to Singapore again

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Staying here for a staycation. Staffs are friendly and welcoming, room are cosy and clean. Great amenities and ambiance as well. Will definitely come back and recommend to friends/family. Thanks concorde for the pleasant service üëçüèª

title: short stay at Concorde hotel
desc: Concorde hotel is suitable for families and business guests looking for convenience, comfort and some very friendly and helpful staff. The rooms are larger than normal. The daily international breakfast served at its main restaurant has been enjoyed by many guests.

title: Good and clean hotel
desc: Nice and Clean. I usually stay here and convenient for food. I recommend to book earlier to save cost and nice room. Only the thing I want Hotel to consider is to upgrade the elevators which are verly slow.

title: Prom Stay
desc: I booked this hotel for my friends and I to stay over after prom night as our school's prom was held at this hotel. The room was generally quite clean, except for the balcony as it was dirty and littered with leaves and flowers. I understand that there is flowers growing outside but the condition looks like it hasn't been tidied for weeks.

title: We looked forward to Rita every morning
desc: Breakfast at Spices cafe starts with such a wonderful greeting by Rita! She‚Äôs incredibly warm, welcoming and a terrific host. See you next trip Rita! In general all staff offer friendly greetings and go out of their way to help. Makes for a very pleasant stay.

title: Continued high service standard plus good food
desc: I visit Singapore regularly and Concorde has been my preferred hotel for a lot of reasons: its central location; easy access to two train stations; great service and so on. However, I have to also add that in Concorde, one has access to good food: 1. Breakfast - contains a mixture of Cultural foods such as Chinese congee; or European foods such as cereals; eggs can be ordered to personal taste; thrown in is also a variety of fruit: my favourite being papaya! 2. Lunchtime is a feast of local cuisine. If one want to find out what Singaporean LOCAL cuisine is like, then lunch at the Concorde is a must - one can find ROJAK: a type of Chinese local fruit salad; or, Roti Prata: a type of local Indian bread; or, Otak: a type of local fish; or, Laksa: a spicy type of rice noodle

title: I want more service.
desc: I satisfied with cleanness of my room and your hotel.And I satisfied with the breakfast service.But I want bathtub in my room, Training gym and pool in your hotel.And I hope that your hotel will reduce price.

title: SO-SO
desc: 2 days 1 night staycation with my family. We took sometimes to find the entrance of carpark. Then, we cannot find the hotel lobby at B1a, then we have to drive to B2. Front desk service is quite good, fast and friendly.Hotel room is quite clean.A bit difficult to find lift when we want to go orchard road

title: Please refer to our general comment.
desc: Please refer to our general comment. In case if we utilized Singapore hotel more than one month, we should have obtained more better service such as priority member survice.Unfortunately, our staffs (total:6 persons) were never provided such service and chance from your side through this period. So, if you need our utilization in the future, you should prepare more good service for us.

title: Memorable stay at Concorde Hotel
desc: Very enjoyable and pleasant stay at Concorde Hotel for the duration of 3 nights commencing 31 October 2018 in suite 967. Both of us had a great delightful and very satisfying time during our stay. The staff were prompt, friendly and professional. Location of Concorde Hotel is very practical and useful to all the surrounding shops, businesses etc. The promotion which we took advantage of was excellent and great value. This entire trip concluding in Singapore was to celebrate our wedding anniversay and we ended it with resounding success at Concorde Hogtel

title: Good location
desc: Checkin/out is very quick and efficient.Nice room, comfortable bed and nice room service.Breakfast is nice, with a taste of local dishes. But I wish you have a boiled/poached egg at the egg station.

title: Very good reasonably-priced hotel
desc: Everything was perfect. Throughout our three nights' stay, we were absolutely pleased with what the hotel has to offer . Reception and restaurant staff were all very courteous and helpful. Hotel surroundings was very clean

title: peter's summation
desc: Great in all categories esp. personnel. Room and it's facilities were great. Spices need a broader menu.Type of cooking needs to be better explained. Lobby area very practical. WiFi was very much appreciated. Indiv. controlled A/C may have been better.

title: Good location but not a good stay
desc: I stayed in this hotel for business purposes. The moment that i arrive, there was no warm welcome from the staff and did not even gave me a welcome drink whilst the other had.... After check in, they escorted me to my room which has defects then they upgraded me to another category in which i still feel unsafe as the sliding door lock is just a normal hook and made me feel not secured. The room is however spacious but needs to have a lot of attention for repair. Its kinda old and outdated. The worst experience that i had here is that i lost my perfume. I immediately ecalated it to the duty manager upon knowing it. Though they did their further investigation, then the next day it was returned to me. I feel awkward about this knowing that they are a 5 star hotel but the service is

title: Location was great but hotel looks outdated instead of classic
desc: OK to stay hotel if your priority is location.Considering a bit old look of lobby and restaurant, I felt it was a bit expensive, but if you would like to stay near Orchard road for shopping, it may worth the price.

title: Family holiday Singapore
desc: The concorde was a great place to stay. It was nice and close to the MRT and all the shopping along Orchhard rd, it could use a spa and sauna to relax and unwind after all the walking you are sure to do, other than that it was an excellent place to stay with friendly staff. Would deffinatly stay there again. If looking for somewhere close to eat try the food republic on level 5 of the OG shopping center just across the road!

title: Excellent hotel. Wonderful staff
desc: Highly recommend a stay here. The staff were excellent and hotel was lovely. Great quality food in Spices restaurant. Pool was great and late checkout including pool use was very appreciated. Thank you

title: Tried and trusted Singapore destination.
desc: I love the Concorde Hotel for its first class service and amenities, plus the proximity to Orchard Rd shops and the central MRT station at Dhoby Ghaut. The breakfast buffet is superb, the ladies who have run it since I have been coming here including Rahimah also make you feel welcome. A lovely spot in Singapore.

title: Travel Stay over
desc: The facilities and venue were exceptional. Staff and service ere of excellent standard . Food variety and standard were above quality and well presented. i would recommend your property to my friends and colleagues .

title: Great location and friendly staff
desc: Overall, great clean hotel and facilities. Lovely piano performance in the evening in the lobby.Special thanks to FO staff Norleen for her exellent and friendly service during the checkin and checkout process.

title: Sometimes Location Isn't Everything
desc: What a location! 100 Orchard Road, Singapore. Right in the midst of all of Orchards' amazing malls.Just a three minute slow stroll away from there Centrepoint Mall, in the Concorde Hotel. As far as locations go, this would be hard to beat. A great pity then that the hotel looks and feels old and tired. The best you can say about the rooms are they are functional. There's no design flourish or 'character' that the best hotel rooms have. The staff were competent and efficient without being warm or welcoming. Only Rita at the Spices restaurant, took time to wish me for my birthday. The hotel wasn't geared to deliver a cake to my room at midnight - and when it came, it was a piece of cake, and not a complete one! I've been in a hotel where two F&B outlets and the front office sent

title: Great setting - got engaged at Concorde!
desc: Both fianc√© and myself are based overseas, but we visit our families in Singapore whenever we get the chance. We both had time to spend a night in town this weekend - one of the rare luxury this year! So, I decided to propose during this weekend stayover. We got a Premier Suite for the night, and it was perfect! We will be getting married next year! Not our first time staying with Concorde, and they don‚Äôt disappoint!

title: Singapore Trip #4
desc: this trip i stayed in the Premier room. Outstanding service with the availability of the Premier club. Great host and felt the service was outstanding. i had an issue with forgetting my cell phone in a Grab car and Nesh at the Concorde front desk was instrumental in getting my phone back as quickly as possible. Thank you Concorde Hotel and especially Nesh on this trip. :)

title: Asia in comfort
desc: This hotel's location was ideal for getting around. We opted for the Club Level rooms and they turned out to be a bargain when you consider the benefits. The staff was friendly, professional, and courteous. If you ever have any questions about tours, seek out DA Yan at their tour desk. She is a wealth of information and so helpful.

title: Perfect location, close to shopping
desc: Perfect hotel with shopping round the corner. Excellent room with comfortable beds. Nice cityview, very quiet room. Lovely spacious lobby with very helpful staff. Excellent breakfast. Nice pool area outdoor at the hotellevel four.

title: Credit debt
desc: Have already stated my opinion,in regards to your introduction of a credit card debt,where as a card swipe would suffice,and the introduction of a bed tax was outrageous,considering you had been paid many months in advance.

title: Bruno
desc: Great value for the money and good service overall .room very good size and comfort .I can recommend this Hotel , ner to shopping area and other facilities .Will for sure stay here next stop at Singapore

title: Nice hotel
desc: I like to stay in this hotel because I am sure if I would have a bad experience, hotel staff will react immediately to solve it. Very responsible. Rooms are clean and light. By taxi 25 mins way from hotel till Gardens and Marina bay hotel. We paid for everything, including taxi, by card. Bus stop is in front of hotel entrance. For bus you need cash. Better to use bus, taxi is very expensive. For way to Gardens we paid 18.5 S$ in normal car and for way back 34 S$ in big car for 6 persons.

title: Spacious room
desc: For Singapore's standard? The room is pretty big. It seems that they just renovated the rooms so it looks modern, clean and new. Very well located close to orchard road and any other attraction, only 5 mins to MRT and lots of food hawkers nearby and reasonable price. Good value for money!

title: Laundry
desc: Improvement the way to calculate the Laundry fee for customer. Sock is small item of laundry but still calculated is 2 pcs. it should be one set only and same as 1 pc of laundry item. Others thing is okay.

title: comfy room at excellent location
desc: the room is spacious. clean room and comfy beds. efficient replenishment of supplies. 5-min walk to Somerset MRT station and 3-min walk to local cuisines at CentrePoint. very nice staff. reasonably priced.

title: Great value
desc: Rooms are spacious and conveniently decorated. Bed is great. Bathroom is clean and offers a nice shower. Breakfast buffet offers a wide choice of international choices. Wifi @ busy hours not always working as desired. Location excellent. This hotel is absolute onw to pick for a visit to Singapore

title: Impressive service staffs and nice hotelll!!!
desc: Hi, I and my girl recently stayed in Concorde Singapore and definitely coming back again towards end of this year again! Hotel is centrally located in Orchard Rd, walking distance to shopping malls and a few minutes walk to public transport for the MRT or Bus! Hotel staffs was very helpful and friendly too! I remember upon arrival at the lobby while waiting for mom,was greeted by this lady Emma , but I was having a bad tummy ache and needed to rush to the washroom badly! Emma offered to help me carry my baby and make sure that my luggage is kept aside, I am very impress by her gesture and her child friendliness towards my toddler. My toddler was so calm and smiley when I walked out of the washroom. She then assisted me to check in and walk us to the lift. I'm very impress with

title: Cockroach nymphs found in toilet
desc: There were a few cockroach nymphs found in toilet.Also, there were scarcity of toilet necessities provided. No dental kit and shower bottle was provided. We called room service as its 11pm and housekeeping was closed. So,we ask for dental kit and yet, we received shaving kit.We dialled room service again, and finally receive the dental kit we asked for.The food is terrible!!!Their scrambled eggs looks and tasted like steamed egg!I went to so many hotels, even 3-star hotels' scrambled eggs doesn't even look like steamed egg .And yet Concorde 4-star hotel's scrambled eggs, tasted and looked like steamed egg.Not sure if your staffs got the food tag wrong or your chefs couldn't differentiate between steamed egg and scrambled eggs?

title: Wonderful stay at a great hotel with good service!
desc: Me and my husband stayed for 1 night to attend a wedding. I love the room! The bed is comfortable and the bathroom is clean and shiny. The location is good and everything is within a five-minute-walk. We had great help, Emma is very hospitable and she helped us with our parking. I‚Äôm sure we‚Äôll stay here again!

title: Fantastic Family Stay
desc: We loved staying at the Concorde hotel. We loved relaxing by the pool and found that the hotel was in an excellent location- not too far from the MRT and easy to get a taxi from when we wanted. The rooms were clean and comfortable and the beds were soft and perfect for a nights sleep after sight seeing. All the staff were friendly and helpful and we ate from room service and the breakfast buffet which was delicious and excellent value. The hotel was close to lots of other food places and shops when we wanted to eat out and explore nearby. We thought this was the perfect location from which to explore Singapore.

title: Good Hotel in a great location
desc: This hotel has good rooms and facilities and is close to MRT and Shopping Malls. Upon arrival at our room this year we found the balcony door to be faulty. Maintenance staff checked it and decided the door was unsafe and we would have to change rooms. Reception staff were most helpful and allocated us to the same category room two floors up.

title: Nice place to stay!
desc: Overall, it was a very nice and pleasant stay. Room was clean, organized. Toilet with good shower head & new shampoo, shower gel everydayRoom service was excellent. Clean up right after I left, even though it was late in the afternoon.

title: Clean and comfortable
desc: Check in was nice easy with friendly service. Our standard room wasn't ready but we were offered an upgrade to a balcony room overlooking the pool for $20 per night which we took and was worth it as it was lovely to eat dinner one night on our small balcony. Room was clean and comfortable and of a reasonable size. We had a roll away bed request for our son which was delivered quickly and made up for us at no extra charge. The hotel is pretty and well maintained and we had no drama's or issues whilst we stayed there. Pool was excellent, especially in the Singapore heat/humidity. Breakfast was a buffet and of good value. Room service was delicious and good value. MTR and shopping centre within walking distance.

title: Excellent service, delicious breakfast buffet
desc: This was my first visit to Concorde, and I'll be returning in March 2019. The staff are wonderfully nice, professional, and very helpful. The breakfast buffet has something for all taste, including a "cook-to-order" egg station! The room is well appointed--free wifi; large work area for my computer and books (here on a business trip!); the room has a free "handy phone" for the guests to use while they are out and about; and.the housekeeping staff keep it all clean and tidy, The Orchard Road location can't be beat, especially if you're a shopper! For sightseers, you can easily catch the MRT, as the hotel sits between two MRT stations, and if you're into buses, there is a bus stop literally outside the front door. Don't know what bus to take? ask at the desk; they'll know

title: Excellent Hotel Good Location MRT
