desc: Great location on Orchard Road not far from Somerset and Dhoby Ghout mrt on foot. Recently refurbished. Friendly helpful staff. Very firm bed. Good shower. Enjoyed trip to Clarke Quay mrt for river walk to the Merlion(lion statue) and to Bayfront mrt for Gardens by the Bay which surpassed all expectations.

title: Near 313 Somerset and MRT
desc: Good location as it's near the MRT and 313 Somerset; however, it's very hot to walk to/fro so youll just end up staying in the hotel. Pool is heated so it's great. TV has a lot of channels which is good but the remote control needs cleaning as it feels sticky. Room is huge and has ironing board. I was expecting a floor lamp as in the photo on Agoda but it wasnt there so it's a bit dark in the evening. I have to open all lights including the study area. Toilet bowl however was not flushed by previous occupant which reflects the cleaner's inefficieny at Room 747. It was disgusting really! Ruth from front office was friendly, nice and accommodating, allowing us to check in early.

title: Clean, Quiet, Well-located
desc: If you want to see the shopping malls along Orchard Road, or the early nineteenth century architecture of Emerald Road, the Concorde is the perfect place to stay. It is clean, quiet, and well-located. Staff is friendly and efficient.. Rooms have multifunctional electric sockets--no need for a converter. If you're going to Melaka, Malaysia by bus the Concorde is the departure point for one of the best lines (Luxury Coach). I would gladly stay here again.

title: Concorde hitel
desc: Hotel is in a great location, close to the train station.We had a lovely room, & all the staff were great. Breakfast was fantastic, one of the best buffets that we have had on our holidays. There was work being done in the foyer, but it didn't interupt our holiday. They even gave us a phone to use to call family back home for free. We would definately stay there again.

title: Short stay in Singapore
desc: The Concorde is a newly renovated, quality hotel. It is situated in the Orchard Rd precinct and is thus handy to all the shopping centres. It is also conveniently located to get to all that Singapore has to offer. The room - a Premium - was truly wonderful. Spacious with an excellent bathroom. The Staff couldn't have done more to make our stay memorable and comfortable. There was no downside to the stay at all.

title: Perfect location
desc: Good location. Right in the middle of 2 MRT stations (Dhoby Ghaut and Somerset). Very accommodating to requests. My husband was happy with the surprise arranged by the housekeeping.Will definitely stay here again.

title: Enjoyable stay at a conveniently located hotel
desc: Booked a 2-night stay and took the offer to upgrade to a deluxe plus room. Room was clean and facilities were well provided for. We were offered a late complimentary late checkout which was a welcome treat as we could spend more time checking out the Orchard Road sights before we checked out. The concierge, especially Emma, was very co-operative and helpful in ensuring that we had no problems finding suitable parking for our vehicle. The doormen were equally polite and helpful in ensuring that we enjoyed our stay at the hotel. Well done, Concorde Hotel staff. We will come back to enjoy the comfortable stay at Concorde. Just one wish! It would have been excellent if we could have had halal meals at the hotel restaurant.

title: Great location
desc: Ideal location for tourists. Walking distance to 2 underground train stations as well as shopping and restaurants. Rooms were large and comfortable. Great breakfast. Friendly service. Lovely outdoor pool. Very clean and modern.

title: 5 Day Stopover
desc: Just had 5 days in Singapore - in tourist mode. Stayed at this Hotel and enjoyed a Singapore Airlines stopover package, which meant we were out and about all day every day. Good rooms, great staff - friendly and most helpful. And good rerstaurant. Nicely sited hotel on Orchard Road and close to the train service. Would stay there again.

title: Beautiful hotel
desc: The hotel was really beautiful. We came at 9 o‚Äôclock and got a keyword the pool aria, so we took a shower (check in time was later). It was possible to leave our baggage at the hotel.The room was ok, very big and clean.

title: Excellent
desc: My family really enjoyed our 3 nights at Concorde hotel. The satffs are extremy friendly. The breakfast offer a wide range of foods and we highly recommend the buffet at noon and evening at the weekends.the prices are reasonable and the foods are sensational. I would like to send our special thanks to Mr. Richard and Ms. Rita at the restaurant who have made us feel really welcomed. :)

title: Short and sweet rendezvous
desc: The location of Concorde was perfect for our short stay in Singapore. And the room was also nicely situated in the corner, which provided a lot of privacy. A small comment needs to be made about the elevator - the elevator door closes too fast, which almost crushed one of my fellow elevator passengers while she was entering into the elevator... maybe the management want to change the setting for that...

title: Home away from home
desc: Staying at the Concorde gives new meaning to concept of warmth, friendliness and being much like home especially because of the people there - say hi to Faridah Amid, if you ever get the opportunity- she is a gem and gives new meaning taking professionalism to new heights. Facilities are great. I have a general fear of heights which makes this hotel ideal and location is fantastic!

title: Great location
desc: Great location! It‚Äôs in orchard road. Close to many malls and shopping center. Walking distance to eateries, close to MRT station and bus stop. Nice spacious room, it‚Äôs just the lobby entrance a bit confusing

title: With regrets
desc: I booked this hotel on short notice and needed to stay near Orchid Road... the decision was made based on the pictures provided on the internet and I was shocked. The room was dirty. There were blood-like stains on the carpet and the general condition of the room was terrible.

title: great stay and help when we needed it
desc: Lovely hotel in great position on Orchard Road. Beautiful pool area and spacious well appointed rooms with balconies. Our initial 2 night stopover was extended by another 2 nights when I got food poisoning ( courtesy of the Singapore Zoo - timing verified by Doctor). Every assistance was given and Doctor sent to room very promptly. Night Mgr Jayden was extremely helpful and all staff including room service ( lots of dry toast delivered) did everything to help.

title: Good hotel room and good location.
desc: Breakfast need to improve,limited selection and the breakfast same like few years ago when I was here.Room is clean and huge,I like the balcony so much.Location is in Orchard Road,very convenient for walk around and shopping.

title: Great location
desc: We recently stayed here twice on stopovers when travelling to Europe. We booked the Premier Club Room which was well worth it. Arriving in tired from travelling the tapas type food in the Club Room were ideal along with drinks. Because of late flights both times having a 6pm check out was ideal. The room was spacious with a walk in shower. Excellent location. I would recommend this hotel.

title: Concorde Hotel Singapore
desc: Great hotel and ideally situated on Orchard Road not far from many shopping complexes and within easy reach of mrt station. Rooms are well proportioned and staff are friendly and attentive. The sea food buffet is a must and well worth the cost. We will use again

title: great hospitality!!
desc: overall experienced was superb! location very strategic, room was spacious, warm hospitality from the staff. but during my stay, there was a cleaning and bit noisy during daytime. overall experienced was excellent

title: Good location
desc: We stayed here for a 3 night stopover in September 2018. The best thing about this hotel is location. Right on Orchard Road amongst the main shopping district with a bus stop right out the front and MRT close by. The restaurant has great service and tasty food. The hotel is probably in need of an update as it‚Äôs a bit dated. The reception area is nice but rooms a little old. Although I would still definitely stay there again cause location, as mentioned is great. We were offered a free upgrade when we checked in. The upgraded room seemed like a normal room, so not sure if it was a real upgrade, but nice gesture. Our room number was 830. The view is average. Industrial Rooftop and trees. Would recommend this hotel.

title: good location, helpful staffs
desc: I have special required for the bed type and I got the right one by helping from staffsroom was nice, a bit old of property but classic I enjoyed the pianist during the evening a lot!I will return there for sure

title: One of the best
desc: I have been staying here for most of my trips to Singapore. I love the rooms as they are spacious and comfy. The location of the hotel is on Orchard which is one of the things I look in booking a hotel in Singapore. The location is great. Just love this hotel and the service quality.

title: Great
desc: thank you for your great help. I really enjoyed at that time and even I've left my personal goods, your kindly help really much appreciated. one thing I wanted to do was taking bath at that time.. also air-conditioner switch is really difficult.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: I can thoroughly recommend this hotel. Great experience, convenient location, Staff is friendly and helpful. Shopping malls and restaurants are within 5-10 minute walk. It is my first stay there. I really enjoyed my three nights stay and will definitely come here next time.

title: Great location & helpful pre-check in reservation service
desc: Great location and can access direct to Orchard road. Room is accurate as picture - spacious, modern, clean, and up to standard of a 4 star. Breakfast is very nice also. Thanks to the hotel reservation officer (Firdaus) on his quick respond to resolved my pre-check in issue before my guests arrived. My guests had a great stay at the Concorde and I would love to try out next trip.

title: Awful welcome
desc: Good hotel but awful welcome. Coming at reception at 10:00 a.m. having with me a voucher for early check-in ( from 5:00 a.m.) . They refuse to give me the room until 14:00, affirming that I would have confirmed the room the day before, even if already payed. I have been in Tokyo, New Delhi, Bangkok, Hanoi, Mexico City, Beijing, Lima, and it NEVER happened. Most strange thing, they offered me as available in that moment, a room of upper category, paying a surplus, of course....

title: Just love this hotel !
desc: I love the location which is near Plaza Singapore (only 5 minutes walk), good breakfast. Their service is good. I never stand too long for check in & check out. Love the cleanliness of the bedroom & bathroom, since I don't like the bathroom with bathtub. For elderly guests, will love this kind of bathroom.

title: Fantastic family hotel
desc: The family room was spacious with the double bunk bed .... and enough room to walk around ... room service was great .... breakfast amd wifi was included and of high quality ... the tourist desk lady Diane was very helpful to plan our days and what to do with the kids ... you can get the tickeys a little cheaper online but her advice and guidance was spot on. Taxi and bus services onsie and on road of hotel and getting ariund was easy.

title: Excellent service
desc: This is our 2nd stay already at this hotel. Excellent service by all the staff. Special thanks to Richard, rita and yosef who went out of their way to assist us. Very convenient location to all amenities too.

title: Pleasant stay although some renovation works were ongoing
desc: The hotel is generally very good with newly refurbished rooms and situated very near shopping malls / eateries / MRT station. The common area of the hotel is still undergoing some maintenance. I am sure it will be good looking once all the work is completed.

title: Very good hotel
desc: The room.is spacious...and the room was very nice,clean and has been upgraded. The location is in Orchard close to major shopping center. Lots of restaurant and cafes nearby. The hotel provides lots of amenities...two sandals..two bathrobes....two toothbrushes.The hotel provides free international calls through its handheld mobile in the room...very nice and very recommended...will definitely come back to stay in this hotel again

title: Just ok
desc: I went one month ago while the hotel was under renovation (and will be for the next 5 months). We couldn't even breathe. A lot of dust and humidity everywhere. I wouldn't recommend it while it is still under renovation. Other than that, the location is fine and there is a huge mall in around 500meters. In overall the hotel is just OK.

title: Excellent Hotel!
desc: This was our third stay at The Concorde, it never disappoints! Such friendly staff, fantastic facilities, spotless, comfortable rooms and a fantastic nights sleep. It's location is perfect, especially if you like to shop. Everything you need is on your doorstep. Amazing restaurants, every shop you can think of and two MRT stations all within a few minutes walk in either direction. Highly recommend to anyone, the perfect base to explore Singapore from. Already looking forward to our next trip and our stay at this wonderful hotel!

title: Concorde Hotel
desc: The hotel is good value for money. The rooms are furnished to a high standard. Premier facilities are very good and worth the extra. The hotel is good for both business and holidays.Staff are friendly and helpful. The hotel is centrally situated and close to all the shopping.

title: we had a great time
desc: The hotel is in a fantastic location, and staff were excellent and helpful, breakfast was very good with great variety as well. Our room was maintained and always clean when we returned after our daily tours.

title: good
desc: basically I have no problem to stay there.and it is easy to move for shopping, eating and so on.but in hotel I do not see hotel staffs excluding reception.so I do not know if service is good or not.

title: Staycation choice!
desc: Third time at concorde and still loving it. Absolitely awesome location near plaza singapura and other eateries. Staff makes the hotel special because their service is genuine and happy to be there, doesnt seem like they are 'working' but more like family members of concorde welcoming guests!

title: Holiday Trip with family
desc: Good location. Walking distance from 2 MRT stations. Room was alright. Efficiency of providing enough toiletries and towels for guests could be improved. Room cleanliness was good but there was moss outside the sliding doors of the balcony.

title: Attend function here
desc: Was here to attend a corporate event, the function room is quite nice, hotel is near to Somerset MRT station, quite convenient. Not very sure about the room rate but should be worth a try. Walking distance to shopping complex.

title: Fantastic
desc: Arrived exhausted from 20 hours of travelling from Canada. Family of 4 with 2 teenagers. Taken care of right from the beginning! Arriving Early 10am local It did not matter... luggage handled and Valuables secured. Welcome drinks etc. All the right introduction & personal attention. We had adjoining rooms. First room we got in early and met our wonderful house Staff Joana assigned to the room. Can not say enough about the effort she made for our family. Breakfast spectacular, Chief attention to all aspects of buffet. I would put it up against many 5 stars out there. Perfect way to start a power day! This Hotel while older is undergoing a refresh.. obvious effort carrying over to staff as well. still really nice Do your research! Large Rooms. Walk to Transportation hub

title: Horrible room
desc: Room was in small and in pathetic condition. Bathroom was horrible. It took forever to fill up the bathtub even when the tap was turned to the maximum flow. The water temperature would turn hot or cold suddenly even without touching the tap. The tv reception was poor. Mediacorp TV 8 had no color and sound quality was extremely bad, in addition, the tv screen flickered very frequently. Hotel was renovation and was noisy and dusty. Workers could be seen everywhere even in front of the hotel room.

title: Awesome and comfortable stay
desc: It was a family staycation and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. Room is spacious, clean and the bed was so comfortable. Dinner at Spice was great as well with local flavors such as chili and black pepper crabs.

title: Good location
desc: Located on one end of Orchard road, so it was easy to access the whole city area and get to the train station. Room was slightly larger than standard size but the bathroom/toilet was small. Overall a good hotel.

title: Nice Hotel with right location.
desc: Well Greeted and prompt check-in at reception. Room was clean, spacious and comfy. Break-fast was included and foods were just nice. Walking distance to Plaza Singapura and nearest Dhoby Ghaut MRT station.

title: Concorde Orchard
desc: The hospitality was superb as was my room. The room appointments were located appropriately. Was able to relax & enjoy myself when not working. The Premier Club Room was a pleasure to indulge in - is hosted respectfully & personably

title: Singapore Visit July 26-29,2018
desc: Staff is very helpful and accommodating. We weren't gong to avail of the dinner buffet at Spices, but the person in charge of the restaurant encouraged us to first check out the buffet before we decided. So after checking out the buffet we decided to avail of the dinner buffet. In spite of the ongoing renovation at the atrium, the hotel was very clean and there was no traces of dust anywhere. Also, except for the presence of the scaffold, one would not suspect that there was ongoing renovation works as there was no noisy works going on at any time.

title: Short stay
desc: A welcoming hotel, centrally located . Clean tidy and friendly.only problem we had was that I thought an extr $60 plus tax was a bit expensive for an extra fold up bed. Other than that we were very happy with our stay.

title: Concorde Hotel Stay
desc: We were immensely impressed with the newly refurbished room. The last time we stayed in Concorde was a year ago when the rooms were still old. Had a comfortable one night stay there with my family and would like to highlight that the staffs at the breakfast buffet were extremely nice. It made our short stay a very happy one especially for my 2 boys.

title: Spacious room in Orchard Road district
desc: What is weird about the ‚Äúnewly renovated bathroom‚Äù is that the glass partition of the shower cubicle is only installed half the length. Hence splashing of shower water through the open half over the bathroom floor is unavoidable, despite placing a toilet towel on the floor. I had to put one more bath towel on the floor to soak up the water.

title: A Pleasant surprise
desc: I came to the hotel thinking that it was going an aweful experience considering the hotel is rather old. Apparently I was wrong as not only the room is really cosy and comfortable, the service was good too. The close proximity to the shops and gardens is also helpful if you feel like exploring..

title: Singapor 3 day stopover
desc: My Partner & I recently had a 3 day stop over on our way back to Australia from Europe & the UK. Our Singapore Airlines flight got in at 7.30 and we arrived at the hotel at 9am. Much too early to check in but the hotel was very obliging knowing that we were tired from our long flight and made our room available early. We only had to wait an hour and were very grateful - enjoying a shower and a snooze before we headed out to explore Singapore. The food was great - especially the Seafood Banquet as being hotel guest we were charged only 2 for price of one. The day we checked out our flight was not until late evening so they made a shower room available for us to use and into travel clothes. Highly recommend Concorde Hotel Singapore. Staff so friendly & obliging and it is so close

title: The best hotel in orchard.
desc: We stayed there for our honeymoon and we had a wonderful time.. the food was delicious,the room (the premier suite) was clean and spaciousand the service was excellent.. We will definitely come back next time we visit singapore. Thankyou

title: Millipedes!
desc: Rooms were full of millipedes. Concorde Hotel have to do something about those millipedes in the hotel rooms or you will loose your guests. I dont mind coming to stay again but the management will need to clean out the rooms from the pests. It is uncomfortable and you dont get to have a good night sleep thinking that the millipedes will crawl up to the bed which it did!

title: Business trip with family
desc: Location is great...with lots of shopping and dining options around. The hotel food is also good. Only the renovation work going on inside the hotel was annoying. Informing the guests before arrival would have helped.

title: Good location. AC/mildew issues
desc: Concorde is in a wonderful location. Close to MRT, food shop houses, shopping. The lobby is beautiful. The glass elevators give you a good view of the lobby. The breakfast was OK, with lots of choices. We had a peak a view of the Marina Sands. The room was a good size. No comfortabl+e chairs though. Bathroom was lovely with nice smelling bath products. The AC was disconnected in our room. Maintenance came and hooked it up. Coworkers had the same issue in their rooms, as well. What this means is that there are mold issues in the rooms. You can smell the mildew and the wall paper is already pealing off the walls of the newly renovated rooms. Such a shame.

title: Dirty
desc: The towel git red stain in it twice in two nights. And the front desk does not even give an apology. Because of that the 2 nights spend there i cannot sleep wondering if they change the bedsheet or not.

title: good location
desc: Didn't like the fact that AC was turned on automatically when I wasn't in my room and impossible to open the windows in my room so the room was misty and humid. Apart from that, I really like the pianist who was playing at the lobby while I was waiting for my colleagues or a taxi.

title: Great Location
desc: Just stayed here this July. We booked direct with the hotel and got a better price.We had a family room, which consisted of 2 connecting rooms, with a rollaway bed for our 3 children. Rooms were big, clean and comfortable. Use of handy phones was great. It is only a 5 min walk to train stations, and really close to big shopping centres as well as food areas. The staff were all friendly and helpful. The restaurant is fairly pricey, so we ate out at night. Breakfast was excellent. I would stay here again, as the location is great.

title: My 4Days trip
desc: Awesome location with Room size. Bed was hard, and having back pain after sleeping for too long. Stayed in Balcony room and the balcony were having some curly wriggly insects which sometimes crawl into the room, Harmless, but really not very nice.

title: excellent hotel
desc: very nice place to stay in. located near food stalls and shopping centres. very recommended for young families. looking forward to stay there for next trip to singapore. very good value for the price.

title: One week rest in our mind
desc: We could be staying very comfortably for one week at the hotel and the restaurant Spices. I think every staff is very warm and kind for us and they all have special knowledge. They have smiling face every time and every where. Thank you so much.

title: Singapore Holiday
desc: Had a great stay at the Concorde Hotel Singapore. The only problem we had was the millipedes , we had a deluxe plus room with balcony , the millipedes were a problem on the balcony and coming into the room , but once we made housekeeping aware of the problem , they cleaned the balcony every day which helped . Would definitely stay at this hotel again .

title: Awesome hotel
desc: This hotel is my company's first choice for conventions. Always love this hotel for the tip top state that the room is always kept. The hotel has all the required facilities to make your stay a very good one. The food served in the restaurant is very good and thus it also becomes my favourite hotel to choose for staycation as well! Thank you for the memorable stay you made!

title: Travel
desc: 50% discount on dining at hotel. Friendly Korean are in the lobby and restaurant. We are grateful for their hard work and hard work. MRT could walk. It was convenient because there were attractions near. I took my baggage until late. The restaurant was infinite until 10 o'clock. The restaurant and the room were all cold.

title: Review
desc: Great location. Staff were great, very helpful. The tour desk were fantastic. The tour desk were very informative about Singapore . The beds were very comfortable. Rooms were very comfortable , lots of room.

title: Great Service and Room
desc: Arrived at hotel about 10am in morning off long flight and reception gave us a room that we could go to immediately, which was a real bonus. Very central in Orchard Road and handy to shopping and MRT. Lovely room and very clean and quiet. Beds very comfortable, Wi-fi worked well and nice to be able to make tea and coffee in room. Would definitely stay here again if in Singpore.

title: Holiday pleasure
desc: The Concorde‚Äôs accommodation and the wonderful staff made for a very comfortable enjoyable stay the location was central to everything . And with the help of the staff able to access transport and getting around Singapore with a minimum of stress . All of the staff in The restaurant and premier lounge were extremely friendly and couldn‚Äôt do enough to make our stay pleasant experience thank you

title: Amazing Service
desc: Nice clean room, excellent service both before and after check out. The staff are very helpful in any matter. Decently a place worth to visit. Thank you to Ms Emma for helping us with our departure transfer, amazing service. Will definitely come back to Concorde Hotel

title: lift & pillow
desc: lift too old, pillow too thick and too high , uncomfortable to sleep. If there is kopitiam would be excellent. so we do not have to travel very far. the rest are perfect.. good environment and good location.

title: Great Location, Good Design, Great Service.
desc: Concorde Hotel Singapore, located on Orchard Road, one of the most convenient locations for visitors .. Convenient for shopping, entertainment, food, MRT and more! The hotel refurbished well with a touch of the past plus contemporary designs! The service of the Premier Lounge are great! Impeccable! The only thing that will make it more perfect: To have Jacuzzi and Steam in the gym area! The cafe varieties are great as well, food are tasty and authentic! Overall Great Experience!

title: Child friendly, safe, very clean
desc: We stayed at the concorde hotel Singapore 9 days and we enjoyed our stay soo much. The staff all helpful, friendly and child friendly. Location is perfect within meters of the famous orchard street shopping centres , you can walk to all daily. Also not far from most attraction points in the city . The tour desk lady / organiser is very helpful , humble and she will give you a genuine advice caterd for your family needs and children ages rather then selling you tickets that you may not enjoy or use to the optimum . Plus she‚Äôll sell you discounted price tickets cheaper than admission prices. The hotel has Super clean facilities all over and the cleaning process is an ongoing thing. The swimming pool is very clean and not so deep so you feel kinda safe when you children around

title: Excellent
desc: Very helpful and courteous staff.room was very clean and comfortable. Food was excellent ,in dining room and room service.the pool area was very clean and well equipped, such a lovely area to relax.would definitely stay there again.

title: Stay between 2nd July and 6th July
desc: Room is comfortable, but I wish; 1) Desirably room humidity is better more dry, room humidity is slightly higher. Room is near pool. 2) Shower curtain is preferably a little bit longer in order to avoid the bathroom floor is wet.

title: Simply beautifull
desc: I having a staycation with my family as we are attending a wedding reception below. Staff are friendly and have a very plesant smile. They also upgrade my room to a premire room which i thing is much bigger as i have 2 small babies with me..tq

title: june stay
desc: Good hotel. Location to shops in Orchard road great, MRT less than 200 metres and has the choice of many lines. Food courts great available close by. Staff most helpful and could find no fault in the hotel.

title: Very friendly staff
desc: The staff very friendly and the room clean and big. Located in the good area, shopping mall, near to Dhobby Gout or Somerset MRT stasiun, only 3 minutes walk. They give me early check in with balkon view room.

title: Our favourite hotel to rest for a few days.
desc: We feel so at home coming back here. From seeing the familiar faces whether its the doorman, the lovely little lady that keeps the foyer toilets spotless, or the lady that helps you to find you way around(Tours desk). Your greeted with a lovely cool drink when checking in. We had a premier room which was lovely and roomy. This gave us access to club room which you pop in to get a cool drink or a cuppa. The staff waited on us and chatted to us .We spent both nights enjoying drinks an nibbles(lots of yummy food) at Happy Hour.The hotel is central to shops, also the metro to go to sightseeing. Eg Go on the cable car to sentosa. Also to their wonderful Zoo. We do love staying here coming back from europe, We hopefully will come back to get such lovely service. Thank you.

title: Great hotel for business trips.
desc: Always stay here on business. Good location, great value and very friendly staff. I am regular guest and various staff know me. Home away from Home! Also on Orchard road and close to restaurants and the MRT. Room are of a good size.

title: Nice Hotel
desc: Generally the room are clean, new, nicely secure with interesting new gadget. Though the hotel is old on the exterior and has a power trip in the morning. Nice and helpful staff. Near MRT and shopping and Movie Mall. Have street food just round the corner.

title: Singapore Stopover Holiday
desc: The Hotel is in the best place near Orchard Road and all of the facilities were exceptional, the room was very spacious and comfortable. There were many places to eat very close to the hotel and all of the major retail outlets are very close.

title: The best of everything
desc: Our second stay at the Concorde this year was every bit as good as the first. Fantastic buffet breakfast and lovely pool area. The location on Orchard Road is so convenient to department stores, MRT train stations and bus stop at the front door. Easy walking distance to Singapore Flyer, Raffles, Sun Tec City and much more. Great eating places just minutes away. We look forward to our next stay.

title: Good Location
desc: Good location, 5 minutes walking to Sommerset MRT station and 8 minutes to Dhoby Gaut station, bus stop right in front of the hotel. 24hrs food stall next to hotel. Spacious and clean room, helpful staff. One of the best hotel to enjoy Orchard road with family

title: Good location and very supportive staff
desc: Hotel located in very good location, lot of shopping malls nearby. Their staff is very good. Mrs Da Yan at Tour Desk is very cooperative and gave very good information for exploring different places in Singapore, including travel tips. Mrs Rita in Spice Cafe also very helpful.

title: Good but had power outage and technical issues
desc: Our overall stay would have been perfect if the generator kicked in right away when there was a power outage. It took around 30-45 minutes for everything to get back to normal. We had to shower with flashlights in the bathroom. I also reported an issue with the air-conditioning switch. It wouldn't shut off for some reason.

title: Weekend Trip
desc: Good location and price to stay in if you intend to spend most of your time along Orchard Road. Room was spacious and comfortable. However, complimentary handy phone was not working properly. Friendly staff.

title: Despite a few Showers.
desc: Super Staff, Super Facilities, Super Location what a great 7days. Premier Club room highly recommended. Special thanks to all Premier Club Staff, the very attentive Ruth and the always helpful Suki in 'Spices Cafe'. Till next time.

title: Great Location
desc: The Concorde Hotel was welcoming and a relaxing. It is located in a great part of Singapore's shopping district and very handy if your using the hop on hop off buses. The rooms were spacious and the decor was to our liking. The lighting in our room was exceptional. The bedroom area had several options of lighting dividing the desk area, TV area, wardrobe and bed reading area. The bathroom had hidden lighting above shower and a light over mirror in one corner for putting on makeup that really worked. Great! We used the pool which was a great spot to relax as well. Overall a great stay.

title: A lovely hotel
desc: I found the staff were friendly and very courteous and my room was very clean. I was given a free upgrade to a room with a balcony which was delightful. There was a wide range of selections for the buffet breakfast.

title: Poor Service
desc: Overall I found Concorde Hotel well below expectations. On entering hotel there was a sickly smell around and in the Lobby lift area that lasted a couple of days. The type of smell that made ones stomach turn. My biggest issue though was returning to my room at 320pm, hot and sweaty and wanting to shower and relax after hours of walking only to find my room not serviced. I called Housekeeping and organised for the room to be cleaned and also informed reception of the miss. I went out walking agsin returned an hour or so later and immediately noticed that a towel I had used that morning was left on the lounge. There was also a note left by the cleaner which said special attention had been paid to cleaning the room. I then noticed that drinking glasses had not been cleaned. I rang

title: Mold Smell
desc: Entire room full of mold smell and old floor carpet. It has cause all of my clothes smelly and need to spray perfume to cover the unpleasant smell. Will not recommend to colleagues or friends to stay over here.

title: Very good customer experience !
desc: Family room is spacious, strategic location with short distance walk to major shopping mall, complimentary parking! The only less attractive aspect - breakfast is not really meet expectation due to limited choices of food. Nevertheless, I have good stay and would come back again!

title: Singapore stopover
desc: Booked this hotel from the list of options (in our target price range) as part of the Singapore Airlines stopover holidays. Decent location with a 10-15 minutes walk to Orchard Road main shops. We passed some nice looking restaurants on the way which were still quiet in the morning. Think it would be quite happening in evenings. There‚Äôs a SIA Hop On Hop Off bus stop 3-5 minutes away. The hotel lobby and common areas has a dated feel to it. But the rooms were spacious and well lit, and bathroom looked refurbished. We had a comfortable stay. Attempted to have breakfast in the coffee house but since it didn‚Äôt come with the room, we did the math and figured there we‚Äôd try outside - limited options but we managed. There‚Äôs always 7-11 near he bus stop. There was a complimentary

title: Comfortable and strategic location
desc: Room was clean and comfortable. There were welcome drinks. Clean and nice ambience. Strategic location to MRT and Orchard Road. But can be more value for money with breakfast included for this price. Overall a pleasant stay.

title: First Class
desc: The hotel is a great location and the stay was an excellent experience. The rooms are spacious and the accommodation really comfortable. The food and service was really really good. The staff are very helpful and friendly. Very well run hotel.

title: Excellent staff
desc: All staffs were very friendly and helpful. Location was great close to the major malls and stores The room was clean but the balcony need a bit more attention, the ashtray outside was full with smokers from the past stay.

title: Absolutely fantastic
desc: Couldn't recommend more highly, increadible staff and facilities. Room fantastic, well appointed. We had a Premier package, great value. Very handy location to public transport and right on Orchard Road.

title: Great Place Excellent Location
desc: Very clean room and good size. Shower did overflow however not a big issue. Think may have been problem with drain. Would have liked a fridge just to have cold water. Reception were helpful. Great location. Shops everywhere. Walk to MRT. Overall a great stay would totally recommend.

title: Gathering
desc: Our regular hotel when we are visiting Singapore. This hotel underwent a major refurbishment and it is almost new. Rooms are spacious, the gym is well-equipped and the corridor carpets are new and attractive. Learn from the staff that the pool is to be spruce up soon and ok safes are going to be replaced. Service staffs are excellent from the doorman to the management. All of them are courteous and also helpful. Security is good. Breakfast is good with a wide spread of delicacies. Their buffet lunch and dinner is a must try for first-timers. Conveniently located on Orchard Rd with easy access to MRT stations and shopping malls. Prices are reasonable. 4 star hotel with a 5-star service. Guests shall feel at home here.

title: A large uninspiring hotel in a good location
desc: Just recently travelled to Singapore with my wife and this was the first hotel we stayed in. First impressions were good. Taxi will take you around the back, off Orchard Road and up to the main entrance. Lobby is massive and needless to be frank. Receptionist at check in was good and we got given a small Singapore Sling (one mouthful) but they could do so much more. The hotel lacks any charisma, personality and colour...while it seems to have had a makeover in some parts the fact the swimming pool was being renovated was dissapointing but these things happen. Room was large and adequate. Nothing wrong with it really but it was all a bit boring. Top tip here....dont waste your money getting a room with a balcony. A complete waste of money. The room we had had old sliding patio

title: 5 day Business Trip
desc: Booked the room through agoda, went for a Deluxe room with Wifi / BreakFast + this hotel has smoking rooms. Arrived in the afternoon and check in was fast, went up to the room and it was nice n clean, opened up the mini bar fridge and it was empty, bathroom has all the usual stuff incl tooth brush and toothpaste. Looked at the room service menu and the prices looked steep so didnt bother ordering any foods. Below the hotel is small shopping complex with a few dodgy bars, next to hotels is some food stalls and the food wasnt too bad and not too overpriced. The wifi signal keeps cutting out and the speed isnt amazing, you would expect the internet speed and connectivity in Singapore to be high class but it really wasnt LOL Overall for the price you pay the hotel is GREAT, will

title: Very Good
desc: This hotel is little bit old but the rest is good, big rooms, great location, great staffs, friendly service. The only thing is no shelter on the way to the MRT. Overall it is a good to stay and can be recommended to a friend.

title: Staying with comfort style and ellegance.
desc: Friendly and prompt crews, upgraded facilities to match or even surpass hotels with higher ratings locally and internationally. Located at the heart of the city and easy to access. Very fair fare and very safe location.

title: Good Clean and Spacious
desc: An excellent Business hotel in a good central location. It has a no frills room but with quality items. All the essential amenities are provided. Value for money and will certainly stay again for business or pleasure

title: Nice hotel
desc: Great location and a nice hotel .clean and well situated. The facilities are fantastic. Although it was a shame pool was closed .Booked a premier club package which was well worth it . Staff super friendly.

title: Nice place to stay and relax
desc: This is a convenient hotel, I like it, but some old facilities must be fixed or changed. I can reach some common place for food, working out, and my office. Breakfast is not so rich, it should be added with more dishes.

title: Poor room maintenance? Leaking shower.
desc: Our room was booked a long way from our children's room, we had to organise a last minute change and it was a poorly maintained room, but we were not 'warned' of this nor were we asked to accept the vastly inferior room (and no 'compensation' for the cost. Very Poor.

title: Excellent
desc: Breakfast is very good(enough food, taste is very good and good for Japanese person). Location is very good. Room is enough space and clean. Reception is very good service and very kind for all of us.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: We stayed for one night recently in a club room. Very pleased with the facilities and the excellent service. Breakfast was lovely as was the drinks and nibbles in the evening. Will be staying again in a couple of weeks for 5 days next time.

title: Nice service in a nice location
desc: First time to your hotel and I will come back soon! The staff from restaurants, house-keeping and bell-boys are really nice. Room was nice with a good sound-proof effiency. Food for breakfast and room service was very good.

title: Excellent
desc: I woulg highly reccomend your hotel. We had a plesant stay. We are all absolutely satisfied in all aspects. The location was perfect as long as the service and the rooms. Moreover we had a great experience when we realised that we forgot something in our room. You were very helpful and I must give all the necessary gredits.

title: THE BEST HOTEL IN SINGAPORE
desc: The stuff is very quick operation. The room is very clean and comfatable. The breakfast is also good, but Rice (steam rice) have a little bit smell. This rice is disappointed for Japanese. I hope they use real Japanese rice.

title: Memorable moments
desc: Our stay was very nice at Concorde Hotel. The room is clean and the bed is very comfortable. Well situated hotel - 5 minutes walk to the shopping malls. Easy access to MRT and bus stop The personnel is very friendly and helpful.

title: Disappointed
desc: Booked a balcony room and decided to upgrade to a newly renovated room after we got an email just prior to our arrival. It did not mention that the swimming pool was being refurbished and couldn‚Äôt be used in this email though. On arrival I confirmed the room was what we had paid for. Went to the room it smelt of damp, had a broken table and had not been recently renovated, it was a horrible room. I went to reception and they agreed we could change room. This was much better but still not amazing, the bathroom was very nice but the room was badly painted and the balcony door had been broken and now locked with a hook and eye which caused a few problems with the aircon. This could be a very nice hotel and maybe we were just unlucky but I won‚Äôt be going back. Photos are of the

title: value for money
desc: Just completed a 5 days 4 nights stay, with the whole family of 4 adults and 2 young kids. I booked 2 premier club room for my stay via the hotel website. It is well worth the money, the whole family absolutely enjoyed it. We were pleasantly surprised as we were entitled to an automatic upgrade to the premier suite. The room was huge, with a nice couch which my 5 year old could sleep in easily. The drinks and snacks in the bar is complementary, and we love the wine provided. Breakfast in the club lounge was good as well. We could tell the food is of better quality compared to the common breakfast area. The people behind the counter are always courteous , always smiling and greeting us. However, it was a shame that we were not informed regarding the 30 dollars food and

title: best in town
desc: One of my favorite places in Singapore. Excellent location and very good price for value. Clean, Excellent service and great breakfast buffet. You can enjoy nice time in town even when you're there for business since the hotel is located in the main central part of the best Singapore... far from the new busy Marina places! This is the original Singapore.

title: Good location
desc: This hotel has been my favourite in singapore, best price at the best uulocation. My family and i enjoy shopping so staying at orchard is the best. If you are tired of strolling you can come back to the hotel take a rest and then go back shopping after recharged. If you need a ticket to universal studios or jurong bird park, they have it here at the hotel. The nice aunty will guide you through all the interesting places to visit in singapore. Always love the room, its big enough, clean and the bathroom always have bathtub. Its not our first stay and definitely will not be the last.

title: Great staff
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights with family. Staff were amazing at all times and nothing was a problem when anything was requested. Great location as close to MRT and shopping on Orchard Rd. The only suggestion is easier access from reception to Orchard Rd without having to walk around from other side of the building for persons with prams/strollers. The only downside is the restaurant and room service with prices very expensive. Considering you could get street food next to the hotel for a fraction of the price we only ate at the restaurant once for the seafood.

title: Business visit
desc: Hotel in convenient location. Big, attractive lobby, which was well used and comfortable. Convenient access to good-sized rooms. Service was fantastic! A lot of attentive staff who had time enough to give really personal service.

title: 5 Nights at Concorde Hotel.
desc: I like best the large, recently renovated room. The hotel is near to MRT stations, restaurants and shopping malls. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful and the daily international buffet breakfast was interesting and satisfying.

title: Nice hotel, great location
desc: A 3 night stay. Have stayed at this hotel before, was very comfortable with good amenities. The staff are friendly and very helpful. The location is excellent, on Orchard Rd close to train services. Solid hotel and will return again.

title: great position
desc: Other than the fact the pool is out till end of May the hotel was great,quiet and in a great spot!! Staff on the whole very efficient and nice. It would have been good to be told beforehand that the pool was not working as it was missed

title: Disappointment in the hotel structure and service
desc: My family and I visit Singapore every year and we have adopted Concorde Hotels our favourite hotel since last 5 years. This year as is usually the case we booked for the Premier Club package. We were very disappointed about the newly renovated premier room: the shower has only a half door and when you shower in water splashes everything in the bathroom and around the toilet which is located just opposite. We also experienced a lot of disappointment in the premier lounge service and the specie restaurant. We have a lot of reservations on the hotel and would not recommend our friends to go there.

title: Good Location, good food, comfortable
desc: I like to stay at Concorde & always love it. The room is spacious, shower's water is strong enough. I can get the check out late too. The breakfast is good, I love the porridge. The location is very good. Just take a few minutes to Plaza Singapura.

title: Our visit to Singapore
desc: A very pleasant and satisfying hotel experience provided by the warm, friendly & very professional Staff. Centrally located, however our taxi operator found it a little difficult to locate the front entrance of the hotel and we entered through the underground car park. however this did not present us with too much of a problem locating the Reception check in desk which was very well handled with a minimum of delay which was very much appreciated being the middle of the night! Would we recommend and or stay at the Concorde again, yes, without hesitation!

title: Quick stop over
desc: I am a regular visitor and find the staff service outstanding from the point of arrival till the time I depart. is covenant for all that I need for business meetings and city spaces for that after work breakout

title: Little gem!
desc: I have stayed here before and liked it for location and friendly staff. Haven‚Äôt stayed for a couple of years and staff are still great and the hotel has had quite an update. Rooms are now quite modern and fresh. It‚Äôs worth paying the extra for a premium room as the facilities in the room and exec lounge are good with really sharp service and decent quality wines ( so often hotels think it‚Äôs ok to give paint stripper wine üç∑ just because it‚Äôs ‚Äúfree‚Äù) Overall this is a good hotel with character in a superb location. Highly recommend

title: Ceremony
desc: Very good hotel in a very optimal location, with nice staff and wide range of services. Recommended to have guaranteed a pleasant stay. Huge spaces for ceremonies and other kinds of event which can involve a large number of people.

title: Older Hotel but great service
desc: Well equipped rooms and comfortable beds. The Fitness Centre has quite a bit of worn out equipment and is lacking some equipment that clients would expect. The service in the hotel is very good and food quality was great.

title: Fantastic stay, great place and service
desc: This hotel is excellent! Great service from friendly, knowledgeable staff, excellent quality rooms, clean central location so easy to get to places. Highly recommended! I would definitely stay here again.

title: Enjoyed
desc: Nice location and convenient for sight seeing, restaurant, and night life. The sports gym is the best gym-in-the-hotel I have ever experienced. Unexpectedly, the gym has so many dunbells, kettlebells and barbell for weight training. I enjoyed my shoulder day though.

title: Well maintained property in prime location.
desc: We had stayed there for 3nights and get offered for an complimentary upgrade. My son likes the spacious room and facilities. We wanted a quick dip in the pool but unfortunately renovation work was going on, will try next time. Though it is quite old property but still nicely maintained. Front desk staff are courteous and all other staff are always ready to help. Breakfast was good and resonable number of variation were served. Overall a very good and reasonable place to stay at an expensive town.

title: Travel April 2018
desc: Room #608: aircon noisy specially at low fan speed. Need to be rectified. Change to room #556: OK Prefer to have a Deluxe room with a separate desk corner at right angle from the main room). Guess it is near the fire exit #503 or 603? Spice Cafe: good quality/Price! No price difference between Direct booking or through Booking.com. Advantage of room upgrade is limited, may be just late check out Handy phone is useful!

title: Balcony for smokers
desc: This is one of the few hotels on Orchard Rd that had rooms with a balcony for smokers. YAY! Aside from that the service from the staff was prompt & excellent. The hotel was close to eateries, massages, shops, two mrt stations & a convenience store. Highlights were the free smartphone, international power outlets, multiple usb charging outlets & fast free wifi. The pool was under renovation when we were there but guests could use the pool at the Holiday Inn close by.

title: Staying in Singapore
desc: My first time in Singapore since 1988 was helped by staying at the Concorde. Friendly and helpful, they offered recommendations on food and sights. Gym a bit rough, but all else good. I highly recommend breakfast buffet.

title: Best location
desc: The hotel location is the best thing about Concorde. It‚Äôs 5 mins walking distance to dhobhi ghaut mrt n it‚Äôs at the start of orchard road. So shopping and commute is sorted all at once. The rooms were clean and rather huge for Singapore standards and decent service. Worth the money paid.

title: End of cruise stay
desc: The Concorde is well located on Orchard Road close to Dhobby Ghaut railway station, walkable via Fort Canning Park to Clarke Quay and a little further to Chinatown. Breakfast buffet is expansive and delicious. Pool was closed while we were there. Rooms spacious but air conditioning was very noisy.

title: Concorde hotel great location and service
desc: The location of Concorde Hotel in Orchard road is great - in between two MRT stations and the bus stop right outside the front door. It is the perfect location to travel around all of the Singapore sights by public transport without traffic delays. Just buy a visitor travel pass and jump on the public transport to see everything at a very minimal cost. The staff at Concorde offer excellent customer service and all of our requests were met. Breakfast was included with our package and includes an international variety of foods for many different nationalities. Check out time is 12 noon which gives you more time. We were also offered a hospitality room to freshen up before we departed for the airport later in the evening and our bags were kept at the hotel till we were ready to

title: Amazing stay
desc: I surprised my Mother and two sisters on their way home from India who were staying in this hotel. They had booked the accomodation so I didn't have a say in where we were staying !!!! OMG it was an amazing hotel !!!! Azlan and Darul the concierges were amazing they helped us with advising us where to go sightseeing, booking tickets even so far as to answering our phone call (on a mobile phone that was supplied by the Hotel) when we were out and about advising us what bus to catch from one side of the city to the other, nothing was a bother to either of them. The staff in the restaurant especially Rahimah greeted us every day like we were old friends with smiles and made us feel like we were very important at every sitting. The Seafood buffet was a wonderful experience with a

title: Great
desc: We stayed at the Concorde Hotel for 2 nights. We have stayed here in the past on a number of occasions, and we were very impressed with the renovations since our previous visit. The location is wonderful- great shopping,food outlets and easy transport access. Our check in was friendly and efficient. Our room was very comfortable and spotless, with lovely decor and amenities. We would definitely stay again!

title: Fantastic place to stay
desc: Very comfortabl hotel for a stop over to get our sleep pattern back freindly staff in premier club. Girls very nice chatty ..and a person not anyone we got quite freindly with Suki .Ruth and a few others they were all helpful

title: Home away from home
desc: Spent 7 days with my 5 years old without any issues. The handy phone was fantastic. The hotel is ideally located within walking distance to one of the main train station and a there is also a bus stop at it's door step if you don't feel like walking. Will definitely stay there again next time we visit Singapore.

title: Business trip in SG
desc: The place in overall is in a good shape. The services are good. Some internet disruption from time to time. The internet disruption is really annoyed during working when I require a constant Internet connection.

title: Ideal location great hotel
desc: On Orchard road the location is perfect. Hop on hop off bus stop just outside the hotel. Hotel is very well maintained. The rooms are clean and in good condition. We had a late flight but on check in room was ready with triple beds. Comfortable beds and lovely shower. Complimentary water bottles. Good variety of the food for breakfast. Staff very friendly and always willing assist. Especially Rita in the restaurant for breakfast. I would definitely return and recommend this lovely hotel.

title: Friendly and efficient staff
desc: Appreciate the service they provided. Loved the spacious balcony room and the room service was delicious too. They really made us comfortable and we felt at home. I arrived early but they allowed early check in. And during checkout the staff who helped us with the luggage also kindly took the initiative to call a cab. It was so efficient and helpful considering I was traveling with a child.

title: Excellent Service and Location
desc: We had a very pleasant stay at the Concorde Hotel! Location was very convenient, and the hotel facilities were very good. We stayed in a family room which had ample space for our family of 4, and all the necessary amenities. Only negative on the room itself is that the interior is probably due for a refresh (signs of wear and tear, and even some mould/mildew building up in the bathroom and the air-vents), but the room was otherwise clean and suited our family. We had family staying in two premier rooms on a different level which looked recently renovated and were very clean. Their rooms also included free laundry service and food and beverage credits, which were extremely generous and great value. What really impressed us about the Concorde Hotel was the service at every level.

title: Decent Stay
desc: Decent room but little outdated in comparison to fellow hotels. The room size is fairly decent overall. It will be better if there is complimentary/discount dining vouchers provided for in-house customer for the least.

title: Cost effective
desc: Cost-effective, nice location near both business offices and shopping mall, easy to call taxi without any stress, nice people of service who are polite and professional. Room is clean and wide enough.

title: Do not book this hotel - you don't know what kind of room you'll receive
desc: Do not book this hotel - you don't know what kind of room you'll receive. See below for details. Concorde looks real nice in the pictures, but unfortunately, you'll walk in to find that it's quite cheap on the inside, almost at the quality of freeway motels in the US. When I walked into my FIRST room, I had trouble finding the light switch - they have switches for the hallway and bathroom near the front door, but you'll have to walk to the bedside for the bedroom light switches. The reason I describe the light switch placement is because I felt drops of water falling on my head, leading me to quickly realize the pool of water collecting right at the entrance to the room. The air con was leaking!!! I had to step through the puddle of water just to get the lights on and call

title: Excellent location
desc: Excellent location and traffic access with bus, metro and taxi. The bathtub has not been cleaned, the drain speed is much lower thanm usual, the clerk of front desk is good and friendly, the food court and drink bar around are all good too.

title: Well worth the stay
desc: Friendly staff in every section , never too busy to help. Not an overcrowded Hotel Easy transport options. Acceptable pricing The Hotel is very centrally located with a main MRT line and major bus stop at the front door.

title: Comfortable stay for 3 persons (1adult, 1 teen-age and 1 child)
desc: I visited with my family had (1 14years old boy and 11 years old girl). House keeping service proveded new towels everyday and we could spend comfortably. The bus stop is just in front of the hotel and also some others are very close. Samerset MRT station is also close. We also enjoyed swimming pool. Large towels were available at the counter in swimming pool area.

title: Concorde Hotel stay
desc: Everything was fine, staff on the whole were very helpful and kind. We would all stay there again, hopefully not in the far too distant future. The hotel is right on Orchard road without the in your face noise and a few minutes walk to the top shops, only let down was some noisy guests into wee hours of the morning across the corridor, loud male quests having too much of a good time at 3am.

title: First time in Singapore
desc: This was part of my birthday celebration trip. The hotel was spotless. The room was very spacious and the employees were all very professional, courteous, friendly and willing to assist. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay.

title: A perfect place to begin your Singapore adventure.
desc: From the moment we arrived, my daughter and I were made to feel welcome. Kim did a fantastic job of checking us in and arranging a room with separate beds for us. She is an asset to the Concorde. Rita and all the Spice staff were great. Always ready with a smile and greeting in the mornings, or after a busy day of adventures. The concierge staff were brilliant and always ready to help. Their ability to organise a taxi within minutes was very impressive. The rooms were very well presented and clean and the double glazed windows kept the room quiet. The bathrooms were a highlight with great water pressure in the shower. The bar and staff were very professional and always made us feel relaxed after a tiring day exploring Singapore. And don't forget to enjoy a dip in the

title: Great Hotel
desc: Stayed here for recently on a business trip and couldn‚Äôt fault anything. All the staff were friendly and extremely helpful, nice food and very reasonable prices. The staff in the Premier Lounge are fantastic and couldn‚Äôt have been more helpful. There‚Äôs some good restaurants and bars located just outside the hotel within a couple of minutes walking. All in all great hotel and location.

title: Average but conveniently located
desc: Location was convenient with buses outside and a short walk to Plaza Singapura with the attached MRT station. Room was spacious however bathroom had no powerpoints (for shaving, hair tools, electric toothbrush etc). Bathroom sink got stuck on the first day and shower had trouble draining. Leather desk chair in the room also seemed quite old but the bed and couch were comfortable and appeared reasonably clean. TV was a supposed smart TV but we couldn't connect to it or use apps, luckily we enjoyed the 24hr anime on Animax. We paid extra for the buffet breakfast, reasonable range and quality for the price. The buffet finished at 10:30am allowing time for a bit of a sleep in which was nice!

title: Review
desc: We enjoyed our stay at the Concorde Hotel. The staff are friendly, helpful and courteous. They were informative and very helpful. The rooms were clean and tidy, The reception staff were very informative.

title: Stay at Concorde
desc: Stay was good except that there's some comfusion in the Front Office check in personnel. As for the Complimentary Laundry under the Premier Club room it's useless as we are not able to enjoy it as by the time we check in it's already passed 3pm while we were told that all laundry must be hand in before 12 noon.

title: Great hotel in a strategic location for your stay in Singapore
desc: In general, Concorde is a great hotel. The location is great, near the Dhoby Ghout MRT station that is easily accessible from airport. The room and facilities are quiet complete, its spacious, near a lot of shopping places, and the facilities are quite complete with gym and shopping pool. Few things that might be able to be improved on is the breakfast. On Sunday the queue for breakfast is a bit long, and the menu is a bit limited. But overall it's a great experience in Singapore.

title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
desc: Very strategic location along Orchard road. Very spacious room, en suite T&B. Bed was very comfortable. Crisp & clean sheets everyday. The staff were VERY FRIENDLY & ACCOMMODATING! Always have a smile on their faces. Just a few minutes to high end malls, grocery & dining places like Orchard Central, Ngee Ann City (Takashimaya), Ion, Paragon, Lucky Plaza to name a few‚Ä¶ Highly recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Good Hotel
desc: Good hotel location, good service....Location is good since it is very close to MRT station. Bus stop is also right in front of the hotel. Thus it is convenient to move around. The service also good as the staff is very friendly and helpful.

title: Nice hotel. Good location.
desc: Stayed here 5 nights with partner. We have stayed here before so it is good enough for a return stay. Pros: On Orchard Road so near shops and MRT stations; Comfortable beds and clean rooms; Good air conditioning: The Premier Club package is worthwhile with included drinks and eats each evening; Staff generally were polite and attentive, but not always (see cons). The staff in the Premier Lounge were especially attentive and polite, top marks to them; Cons: Reception staff at check in (at 10:30pm) were abrupt and perfunctory and made us feel like we were a bit of a nuisance to them ( this wasn't the same with other staff on other days); The hotel needs a do-over with it showing its age. Couldn't help but notice the faded paint, broken surfaces, water stains and other issues

title: Very good position
desc: Medium+ hotel at the city center. Close to public transport and shopping centers. The breakfast is good and in the business lounge very good. The staff is professional and very service oriented. The gym and pool are also medium+

title: Holiday
desc: Great position on Orchard road, with bus service on the doorstep and train station a few minutes walk away. Staff very helpful, breakfast was good and the pool and gym access was great. Wifi available in hotel and gym area.

title: Family booking
desc: Very good location, service very nice, staff are friendly. Good quality. I had booked 2 rooms for family, even I have 2 kids with no charge, but they also add more extra beds. Really comfortable and nice.

title: A wonderful experience.
desc: My wife and I had the pleasure of staying at the Concorde Hotel in Singapore. From the moment of stepping through the front door the staff were professional,courteous and happy. Cleanliness, breakfast ,club lounge great.

title: Concorde Singapore Review
desc: So close to the shopping center. The rooms are big and clean. The staff are professional, approachable. The rates are reasonable considering that the hotel is in prime location. The facilities are in excellent condition.

title: Singapore visit
desc: Our stay at the Concorde Hotel was fantastic. The staff here were so friendly and helpful. The service in the Premium Club was exceptional, the staff remember you every time we went in. The hotel is in such a convenient location to public transport and even walking to the centre of the city. The rooms were a good size and beds very comfortable. I have no hesitation in recommending a stay here.

title: Staycation
desc: Price is reasonable. Warm and friendly staff. Great breakfast spread. but staying in room 515, i could actually hear the conversation and guess the happenings in the room next door because we are separated by a door inside the unit.

title: location and breakfast are good, but the total price is a little bit expensive
desc: I stay for 2 nights, all the things are good: the location is good : I can go to dhoby ghaut and orchard road in 5 mins. the facilities are good : the room is big compared to other hotels. the staffs are friendly : they are nice and offer welcome drink. the breakfast is good: every day has different menus. overall all, everything is fine except the price is a little bit expensive (but affordable)

title: Great location and staff makes this a good choice
desc: Well this is my 2nd visit here and it won‚Äôt be my last.. Ok ,so it‚Äôs not perfect but it suits me perfectly.. There are some quirky things ‚Ä¶ our room this time was an unusual shape - it had everything you‚Äôd need. But a weird layout. 2nd biggest bathroom I‚Äôve ever stayed in - so fabulous‚Ä¶ but it claims that it‚Äôs only serviced every second day ( fine by me !) but really there‚Äôs nowhere to hang towels etc except for one small rail. Now a lot of hotels are guilty of this. They say they doing the right thing for the environment but don‚Äôt give you the means to hang your towels and floor mats up to dry during the day, so that you can use them again the next day. We had Lovely toiletries supplied. In the shower was shampoo, conditioner, liquid soap, all of a good quality. But that

title: Guest Experience
desc: Rooms was clean. Room service was excellent. Receptionist were very good. Especially a gent named Rakesh. Breakfast could be improved. Laundry service was a box expensive. WiFi was fast. Friendly staff.

title: Family trip
desc: Very good hospitality, would comeback to this hotel cause its very good and very nice hotel, and its near orchard and Somerset so its easy to get some food and etc. very recommended to stay in this hotel!

title: Average
desc: The location was good. The room I stayed in (630) was a bit tired. The toilet seat was not clean, still had hairs and a bit smelly, when I checked in. A concierge gave me the direction of turning right instead of left, when asked for a direction. The in-room dining person said he will deliver a hardcopy menu and it never happened.

title: Keep up the excellent work
desc: The hotel may have slightly outdated facilities, but they are still well-maintained. The staff, including the service and lounge attendants, were incredibly friendly and made us feel very welcome. They even went out of their way to make my child happy, which was greatly appreciated. We would definitely love to come back again and highly recommend this hotel. Keep up the excellent work!

title: Not my first time and won‚Äôt be the last time!
desc: Everything is just excellent! Staffs are kind and friendly, great compliments received and outstanding service. Had my first stay back in 2013, then another in 2017 for business purpose and finally returned post COVID in 2023 now with my own family!

title: Great stay at Concorde Hotel in Singapore.
desc: Great location on Orchard Road, rooms were clean and tidied on a regular basis. Upgraded to club room which was even better and access to the club lounge was worth the extra cost, girls in club room fantastic and couldn't do enough whilst we were in there. The only thing I found annoying was the piped music in the lounge area near the bar, all in all, a great place to stay.

title: Anniversary night ruined
desc: Stayed for 2 nights to celebrate my anniversary. On the second night, my friends came over to celebrate with us with the intention of leaving by midnight. At 11pm, two security men came by to notify us of a noise complaint, which we where ready to abide with and my guests immediately packed up. What surprised me was that the guards stood the entire time until my guests left, and came into the room for a ‚Äòsearch‚Äô immediately after. Normally hotels would give a warning when a noise complaint is made, but this is the first time I‚Äôve had them barge into my room to search, including the balcony as if we were hiding people there? The experience was unpleasant and ruined our night completely. Was there a need to conduct a search immediately? We would‚Äôve complied if security gave us a

title: A good hotel to stay
desc: Overall, I was impressed by the hotel's cleanliness, location, and friendliness of staff. Love the blend of modern but somehow antique design of the hotel. Also, the hidden gym was very modern with new equipment, next to the pool for relaxing hour.

title: Your Best Choice Hotel in Orchard Road
desc: Good location in orchard road. Good service from front desk staff and on duty manager (Mr Adi) Quick response for all enquiry via email. Good hotel prices. Value for money. Will come back to this hotel again for my next biz trip.

title: Concorde Hotel Is A Good Hotel
desc: Please provide special HALAL food counter at the Cafe. If possible please provide Sauna for the guest and children play room for the kids. Room cleanliness is very good and the room was comfortable while the staff were very friendly

title: Hotel review
desc: The room was very spacious, clean, and had the amenities we needed. Breakfast was delicious and with many choices/very wide buffet spread. The location is great- very near to Singapore Mall, Metro, bus stop and restaurant. Excellent hotel. Great service. Thanks.

title: Great stay for business. Will stay again
desc: I stayed at the Concorde Singapore on business for 5 days in June 2023. The hotel staff and facilities were great and the breakfast in the morning was ample, diverse and well prepared. The location of the Hotel is excellent, with shopping and restaurants merely steps away. Public transportation is easy, so moving about if you have time to explore is really a no brainer. My only small issue was the shower enclosure. Since the showers are tiled with very dark tile, it may be easy to overlook stains and mold in a general daily cleaning. I unfortunately noticed some mold/ mildew in the corners, in the areas under the shower and soap dispensers. I made sure not to step there and averted my eyes when I showered. A clean shower is always something that I notice at a hotel. Other than

title: Shower Head Rotten
desc: I occasionally stay here and I have no issue at all, and very much like the hotel. However, my recent experience was that the shower head was rotten. I have informed the hotel, so I hope it would be improved soon. Other than that, the hotel is excellent. Breakfast is very nice.

title: lovely hotel
desc: outside discounts for the hotel were nonexistent, overall, the service was great food was superb. the pool was clean, and towels were plenty full and writing this review is too long. so im filling up with words you don't need

title: Clean, comfy, good location
desc: Stayed in family room - very spacious. Comfy beds. Clean bathroom - seems like it has been refurbished. Hotel located between Somerset & Dhoby Ghout MRT. Walkable to Plaza SG/313@Somerset/Takashimaya/Paragon/Atria/ION. 7-11 shop nearby. Will consider staying here again.

title: Best Hotel to stay in Orchard Area
desc: Me and my Husband stayed at a room with broken AC, and the Reception straight away upgraded us to a better room (Suite) AC is cold and Spacious Room with daily refill of Mini Bar. it was really worth the money to spend our holiday in Singapore. The Location is also convenient for us to go around orchard, nearby somerset mrt and a bus away to plaza singapura (dhoby ghaut mrt)

title: Not Clean
desc: This hotel is right on Ochard Road where all the malls are. The location is 5 stars, but the cleanliness is 1 star. I chose this hotel because it is SG Clean certified. When I cleaned the room myself after checking in, I found strands of long hair on the night stand, table, and most disgustingly on the body wash dispenser. I don't think they clean the room at all besides making the bed and replacing anything that was missing. It made me feel unsafe especially with covid still around. This hotel is pretty expensive at $240 a night for the condition it's in.

title: A great week.
desc: Concord is in a great location. Stayed there a number of times. Restaurant has always been great. Wine list does need updating. Could not recommend it more highly. Rooms are spacious and clean and tidy. Staff are friendly and helpful.

title: Good size family rooms and great location
desc: We enjoyed 2 nights here. We loved having the extra space of the family room and it was an ideal location for getting out to explore straight from the hotel or for buying snacks or having meals out. The staff were friendly and helpful, and the buffet breakfast was plentiful with good options. Areas of the hotel and rooms are looking a bit worn and tired but overall for the price and everything it offered us as a family traveling with two young kids it suited us well.

title: Wont be the last...
desc: Me and wife stayed for 2 nights here at concorde as a direct booking guest in may 2023.. do book direct to enjoy more perks as concorde is having promotions for direct booking guest..i will lay out the review in point forms as usual.. Reservation 5/5 As i pre book my room almost a year prior to my stay, I decided to send a confirmation email of my stay in case my reservation got cancel prematurely as could happen in many hotels..truly amazed my booking is intact and my email were responded swiftly by reservation officer Hasrinah who attended to my many email queries with patience.. Concierge_Parking 5/5 My concern here before arriving was the availability of parking space as i will be driving down but was told of the limited parking space the hotel had prior to my stay..even

title: Birthday staycation
desc: Planned my May birthday staycation at Concorde Hotel. Pleasant stay and location is convenient. Staff are friendly and will greet when I pass by them. I will definitely stay back to the same hotel again.

title: An absolute gem
desc: Stop over from Europe before heading back to Australia and from arrival to departure it was an absolute pleasure. Location, staff, accomodation, ambience of room all 5 star! There was some minor traffic noise as the room faced Orchard Road so if you are a very light sleeper ask for a room on the other side and problem solved. Make sure you become a member and enjoy their fantastic hospitality room each evening and breakfast in the morning!

title: Short break in Singapore
desc: Good hotel in excellent position on Orchard Road. Room was clean and comfortable and well appointed. Bathrobe and slippers are provided and bottled water, tea and coffee are replenished daily. Linen is changed every second day in line with the hotel's Green Policy. Fresh towels can be requested as required. All staff were very pleasant and helpful. Has a nice pool on the roof at level 4. Close to Somerset MRT and several big shopping plazas with a large variety of shops and food outlets. Breakfast buffet caters for a variety of cultures and was more than adequate. Bus 36 direct to/from Changi Airport stops right outside the hotel and takes about an hour plus is very cheap, although perhaps not recommended if you have a lot of luggage. Rooms appear to be well

title: Holiday
desc: Holiday to Singapore visiting son . Hotel is clean and tidy , restaurant food was good but on some days arriving late would mean some food was cold . Hotel could do with a revamp as it is getting tied . Redecorate and update is needed . Staff very friendly and helpful .

title: Solo female traveller
desc: I travelled alone and it is my first time staying at Concorde Hotel. I had a pleasant experience with the staff - they are polite and helpful. Location is good ; just 5-8 minutes walk to either Somerset or Dhoby Ghaut MRT. Room walls are a bit thin ; I could hear my neighbour arguing almost everyday. I could also hear kids screaming by the corridor early in the morning. I stayed on the 4th Floor. Aircon vent is dusty hence I gave a 3/5 for cleanliness. Room itself is clean - housekeeping is done everyday. Price is a bit steep for solo traveller but I wouldn‚Äôt mind staying here again.

title: May Family Trip
desc: Hotel is at a very convenient location at Orchard Road. Night Club music is a bit too loud at night time which disturb sleeping. Room is clean and tidy. Just shower box floor is a bit slippery and without a handle for you. Staff are helpful to your requests.

title: Worth it
