desc: Love the spacious room although hotel vibe is quite dull/old but the newly refurbished bathroom is so comfy! Checking in was straightforward and we were welcomed with friendly staffs and was offered glasses of juice. We would definitely stay here again!

title: Amazing stay
desc: The staff and the service is amazing. We stay there for few nights and it is so amazing. We have an awesome experience and feel welcomed. We are pretty sure that we will be going back again to stay there.

title: Jalil MACHICHI
desc: Real nice service, wonderful & very professional staff. Restaurant ambiance is gorgeous, service is excellent & well attended. Breakfast dish choice is not what it was before COVID. Furniture looks old & worn out despite recent room restoration. Cleanliness is perfectible (underbed & bed/bedside table gap) Do not misunderstand me, I will be back....

title: Expensive for the standard of accommodation
desc: We have stayed at the Concorde on numerous occasions and have been previously happy with the standard of accommodation and room rate, however our stay in May 2023, was a little disappointing. The rooms are looking very tired and in need of renovating, the bathrooms are quite dated, mould in the grout in the bathrooms, shower screens aren't clean and overall the hotel is looking a bit tired. The room rate was quite over priced given the condition of the hotel. Breakfast offers quite a choice of food, however the food wasn't hot despite us being there within 5 minutes of the restaurant opening. The staff are helpful and friendly and the location is great, however overall I would say the hotel is over-priced for the level of accommodation.

title: Exceptional Personnel and Services
desc: The staff who checked me in - Ms Yvette is very helpful with such a pleasant personality! She makes guests feel so welcomed! I haven't been back here since the pandemic, and I feel ever so at-home, just like before! Room is clean, bed is comfortable and pillows are nice! Housekeeping, Room Service and even the Concierge personnel are superbly helpful! Will definitely be my first choice! You have got a great asset - Yvette you are exceptional! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: 5 nights stay
desc: Good location within 5 minutes walk of 2 MRT stations. Bus stop also right in front of hotel. Room on 9th floor. Spacious and clean. Free minibar. Checkout extended to 1pm (complementary). Only slightly negative thing was room was serviced late in the afternoon between 2-4pm when we were already back from eating/sightseeing and were taking a break from the heat before going out in the evening.

title: A very good hotel not far from main places of interest in Singapore
desc: A very pleasant hotel, not exactly cheap, which shows high quality in several aspects. The breakfast is outstanding, the hotel service excellent. It is not very close to the see front and the bay gardens (main Singapore attraction) but within a reachable distance (a walk of 20', otherwise buses are very good).

title: Good price-quality hotel in a central location!
desc: Very good location - Very nice staff - Room large and clean - All facilities like fitness room and pool Room could be better be soundproof. I could hear my neighbors (music - TV and bathroom)! Large choice for the breakfast but missing better quality of stuffs (couldn't find any Bio products for instance!)

title: Dated business hotel
desc: Was told that the hotel is going green therefore rooms will not be tidied up/cleaned for stays of less than 3 nights. With less services provided, there was no reduction in hotel fee. Hotel gym is shared with public so there's a queue to use any equipment.

title: Good Stay
desc: I had a wonderful week attending a conference, and the Concorde Hotel accommodation made my stay perfect. Nice staff and very helpful when requested. The room service was also perfect. Great hotel to stay again in the future.

title: A wonderful stay, would choose again for sure.
desc: A wonderful stay, would choose again for sure. The hotel staff was very professional and meticulous. I stayed there for 8 days and never felt overwhelmed. I would however like to indicate that the television systems could use an upgrade.

title: Poor Breakfast - Great Rooms
desc: In short - Breakfast was a huge disappointment and clearly showed cost cutting... Cheap ham, regular sliced supermarket bread, no meats with the rice & naan, cheap fruits, machine coffee with creamer sachets - will never return!! Compared to other 4/5 star hotels you definitely lose out by having breakfast here. Rooms are spacious and comfortable including the linens, carpet, came with cable TV and clean / fresh. Great location as well as few hotels are towards Dhoby Ghaut.

title: Great choice for Singapore
desc: We had an amazingly comfortable and spacious room on the club floor and great breakfasts in the premier lounge. The hotel service is first class and the staff really friendly. Located on Orchard Road just out of the main downtown means a very convenient location but without the noise.

title: Best room and hotel ever all new bathrooms with balcony
desc: Just a lovely hotel the room with a balcony is the biggest room we have ever stayed in all new the bathroom is the size of room we have just come from we are in room 666 all staff are friendly we would be staying again when in Singapore train station just down the road plenty of shops bars nearby the room is like a palace you could have six people in here staying thank you we have had room service club sandwich was very nice and cheap price why would you stay anywhere else right on orchard road as our plane flight is at 8pm we booked with hotel directly we can stay in room till 4pm so you can have showers before you leave thanks again all the best to all the the staff

title: One should stay to believe in
desc: Concorde is a quaint hotel with arcade of other things in and around the complex, it's centrally located. Their buffet breakfast is awesome with wide range of choices from continental yo American, Chinese, Indian and Japanese. Hotel provides pick up and drop on informing about your flight timing. Good rooms and lovely staff.

title: Highly recommended hotel.
desc: Our family booked a Deluxe Room in this hotel last December for 3 nights. If I'm not mistaken, the hotel is already old but recently renovated. Location is along Orchard Road. 10 to 15 mins away from Takashimaya and Paragon. 15 to 20 mins away from Ion Orchard. 5 to 10 mins away from Orchard Gateway and Somerset. All by walking. Apart from the malls, there are numerous restaurants and convenience stores near the hotel. So location wise, you definitely can't go wrong with this hotel. The rooms are not new but very spacious and clean. Bed, pillows, bathroom, room ACU, power outlets, water heater were all excellent. Bottled water was provided daily. Even though the hotel is located along Orchard Road, I felt that the room was quiet and we were all able to sleep soundly.

title: POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE
desc: Went to checked in around 7 and staff named Mr Fairuz was not being friendly at all. Lack of customer service. Did not greeted me nor showed me where i have to go after he gave me my room key. I did not know what level is my room or if theres any wifi available. He could have explained it to me but no i just left. I even said thanks to him but he did not response. This is very bad reflection on the hotel as this hotel is 4 star. Other than that the breakfast food was amazing, i was greeted miles before i reached the front desk at the cafe i cannot remember the guys name but kudos to that staff!

title: Perfect overnight stop to shop and rest.
desc: A quick overnight stopover at the Concorde hotel in Singapore was ideal for our 24 hour rest in between flights. Parents will likely know that travelling with children amplifies the effects of crossing time zones. The opportunity to break up a long journey was well appreciated. Located very conveniently on Orchard Road, the hotel was walking distance to most things you might come to Singapore for. In our case particularly, it was for some late last minute Christmas shopping. Our very comfortable spacious family room came with bunks for our 11 year old twins and a king bed for us. The luxurious and well-appointed bathroom came with an enormous bath which, once immersed in, aided to counter the effects of jet lag. We especially enjoyed the breakfast offer in Spices

title: DISGUITING SERVICE. Don‚Äôt book ever. Horrible staff. Bad food.
desc: What a disgusting hotel with horrible service. DONT COME HERE. Live somewhere else. The breakfast is same everyday and legit bad taste. I repeat DONT COME HERE. Dirty and old hotel. Horrible customer service. All staff has a flat face and not welcoming at all. The hotel doesn‚Äôt deserve this amount of money they are charging. I HATED WVERY SECOND OF MY 7 days stay with them.

title: Hospitality at its best.
desc: As always, a home away from home. The management and staff never fail to provide stand out hospitality and one leaves looking forward to the next visit. The refurbished rooms, lobby and refreshed pool area are all excellent and were a very pleasant surprise.

title: Short vacation in aged yet classy hotel
desc: Went to Concorde hotel Singapore for 1 night Love the deal - complimentary late checkout 4pm and 6.pm for club guests only Check in was fast and effortless Went to the room , nice But some system look outdated , one need to put door sign ( do not disturb) sign. This thing must change if Concorde Hotel want to be modern 4 star hotel Check out swimming pool , it was nice but pool bar not really functional because If you want to order food and drink, need to make phone call to Spice cafe located at lower floor and they will bring food to you Then went to gym After gym , go back to room and bath then come to Spice Bar for early dinner, really love the menu ( wide variety of food and drink This hotel still sell few more liquor coffee, I am impressed with that Other hotels

title: Deluxe Plus with Balcony
desc: Dissappointed 2 nights stayed with family #819.Hotel praticed ecogreen cleaning which means after 3 nights your room will be cleans.Request for emptied rubbish was turned down except change of towels and replenish toilet papers.Aside that hoseekeeping does not keep the room clean.Upon check in toilet not cleans well,toilet rubbish bin not emptied,minibar dusty,the carpets lots of small centipede crawling and some dead.The balcony was so dirty.Entire my stays cenrtipedes keep crawling into the room even balcony doors was closed.Centipede will also crawls up the curtain.Just wear your room slipper to avoid stepping on them.It such disgusting amd annoying stayed.

title: Let's end this year with a good review üòù
desc: Definitely recommended! On behalf of the bride and groom here I am guysss! We book 2 room because bride(Elly) and groom(sufiyan) need to get ready for their big day. From her check in with yvette was a smooth process to mazley offered on helping with her bags to danish sending her up to her room and explained regarding the room details. She video call me and say she felt like a vvip hahaha! overall we are satisfied and bless on choosing Concorde Hotel Singapore! Here are the people that make our stay an awesome one cause they were the ones whom ensure of our stay,wants and needs met. You guys deserved it! Yvette, Mazley, Danish, Din, Nico, Nesh, Khaz, Michael, Adam, Arvin, Ron and Stephanie for the complimentary mini bar and room upgrade- Aishah(bridesmaid)

title: Hotel laundry ruined suit trousers
desc: Just a terrible experience. Had an expensive pair of suit trousers ruined by the hotel's overnight pressing service, after which they refused any compensation beyond a very low notional limit. Told me to just go make a claim on travel insurance. Very old building in desperate need of refurbishment. Avoid like the plague. I left early to move to another hotel

title: Disappointing stay at the Concorde
desc: This hotel is wildly overpriced and not worth it. The room smelled damp and the shower never dried after use. They are only servicing every third day and the towels also remained damp after 24 hours. There is a kind of balcony in my room but actually the balconies communicate with the rest of the rooms so there is no privacy unless you pull the curtain. Doesn‚Äôt make a lot of difference in terms of light because the room is very dark and almost no natural light; the lighting is also not sufficient. Finally, I was very concerned because the sliding doors to the balcony were only secured with a hook eye latch, which seems insufficient to me. The built-in latches on the balcony door were missing the matching latches on the frame, so the only security was the hook & eye. In addition

title: Great location, and superior breakfast buffet
desc: Great location along Orchard Road, walking distance from shops. The breakfast spread featured a very good variety of cross continental fare. During my stay though, the hotel was fully booked, and they seemed understaffed, because there were so few staff members who were available to help us. Some of the staff encountered by my tour group and myself were borderline rude, and even handled our luggage so roughly, and I had to tell them off on behalf of the group I was leading. Aside from a few isolated incidents of that sort, it was a pleasant stay.

title: Great Hospitality but with a Weird Housekeeping policy.
desc: Stayed on this property for five nights. Had a wonderful time. The hospitality was great. Special thanks to Adi at the club lounge for being so thoughtful. Thanks to Xing Xing, Susan and Kim for their smiling and prompt service and hospitality. Mazley at the concierge was always eager and ready to help. They are an asset to the hotel. However, one thing we were not happy with. We stay at hotels all over the world. This was the first where housekeeping every day was an issue. It used to be a big deal for servicing the room. Not vacuuming and cleaning the room/ bathroom every day has got nothing to do with the green promise!

title: Detroriating services
desc: I am regular to this hotel since year 2006 when it was owned by Le-Meridian group. Later it is bought over by Concorde Group from Malaysia and the hotel has started loosing its charm. However, it was managable till my recent visit to hotel in Nov 2022. 1. Hotel says they will clean the room on alternate days since they are running green initiative. It is beyond the reason to understand how the green initiative is compromised in cleaning the room. There is no need to change the linen. 2. The breakfast spread is reduced , combination of food is bad especially for vegetarian and the in dine services are very poor. The services were deteriorating since last few year and gradually lost its flavour. It is quite visible that Top Managment has gone for drastic cost cutting

title: Excellent service from housekeeping & Permier lounge
desc: This review is of the Premier room stay. Let‚Äôs start with the positives, generally overall stay was most enjoyable. Staff from housekeeping to Premier lounge is excellent. The 2 pieces complimentary laundry is much appreciated & was prompt. From the perspective of the room, the amenities are all there. Notable are the fantastic shower & air conditioning. Love the terrace balcony in the atrium & the bubble elevator, gives it a novel retro vibe. The hotel seems well suited for business travelers but holiday makers should consider it.

title: Good Option Good Location
desc: I have stayed a few times and usually find this hotel a good option, not top quality but good. Location is good, rooms ok and breakfast buffet average for Singapore. Check in was terrible despite me being the only person (and four staff doing nothing) there as I arrived late at night. Some staff are really good and go out of their way to assist whilst others seem to work hard on not being helpful. The hotel has a 'green' room clean policy of very 3 days which is ok but I am sure is more cost savings than green benefit. I found most hand sanitiser stations empty. Overall, a good option for location and if you aren't looking for a 5 star stay.

title: Avoid this place if you can
desc: This was a terrible experience. The hotel is in a great location but there ends the positives. The rooms are tired, the lobby dated and the service deadly. The check in team happily informed me that during my 4 night stay my room would be cleaned only 1 on the final night. This is the first hotel only cleaning every 3 days. Worse than that when they did clean they missed so much of the key surfaces that I had to complain to have it done properly. The breakfast is ok but not very healthy or wide option. The best part was the amazing concierge team who really went out of their way to help you.

title: LOVELY HOTEL
desc: This is a lovely hotel. Our room was very nice and clean. Restaurant was really good and the food was wonderful. It is located on Orchard Road and there are lots of facilities nearby including shopping malls.

title: Hygiene issue in the room
desc: I arrived in room 636 , immediately caught by the strong cigarette smell. I called for a room change however they said no more rooms available hence they will refresh the room for me after I shower and went out. Proceed to the bathroom, I discovered body hairs all over the bathroom, there were even urine stains left there. Totally unacceptable. Second time I called the receptionist cleared she is unpleasant with her voice this time . I requested for house keeping immediately. Went out to see my friend without shower after 10 hours flight. Lobby front desk girl was very apologetic however later in the evening I went back stain beside my bed etc. I‚Äôm too tried to make an another complaint by that time. I‚Äôm only there for a short 20 hours layover. But the basic hygiene things

title: Good hotel with a few drawbacks
desc: I rate this 4 but its actually more 3.5 stars. A lot is good with this hotel but there are a few drawbacks that for some may be a showstopper. The hotel is old and is showing wear but its still clean and well kept. The staff is nice and helpfull. The best part with this hotel is the location. It's located between two mrt stations and is in walking distance to the heart of Orchard road. Its only 300 m two Douby Ghaut station which gives you direct access to 3 of the main lines that tourists will use. The yellow line wilkl take you down to Marina Bay, the pruple will take you to Sentosa Entrance, Chinatown, Little India, Clarke Quay etc and the red will take you to Orchards and Mandai Parks (altho I recommend going by taxi). It also only 1-2 stops away to change to the green and

title: Stay for the location
desc: It wasn‚Äôt quite a 4 star more like 3.8 stars! Pros: Location on Orchard St plus the view to the next door gardens were nice. Close to the MRT and Singapura shopping centre. And from here you could walk down to Raffles or Fort Canning Park. The premier rooms were huge. The restaurant staff were excellent ( Pearl, Whey Whey, Sharon, Raymond, Arkin‚Ä¶ also a special mention of AKI front desk really helpful). Our rooms came with a $200 in-house voucher, free mini bar items and 2 pieces of clothes washed a day. The breakfast and seafood buffet was very good quality and plentiful options ( unless you are vego or vegan). Cons: The premier club was non existent and the food was minimal what made it worse we were vegan and no options. The room was a bit dirty when we arrived. The

title: Very pathetic service and cheap hotel
desc: The hotel is fantastically aweful. They have not left a scope of being rude, impractical , emotionless. Highly disappointed with the hotel services, staff behaviour, chef at the Spices Restaurant, house keeping staff, phone operator‚Ä¶and I can count on. We have been calling the hotel to request early check as we were travelling with a baby, but no emotions they won‚Äôt budge and a very rude straight line reply on the phone. During check in, they asked us to wait, we reached at 745am to hotel, but we‚Äôre given our 1st room out of 3 at 10:30am, for the other rooms I kept on asking at the reception again n again but the guy over there was so rude you would slap him for giving such a reply. I again went and at 12:30 1 lady gives me the keys and to my surprise it‚Äôs the next door room.

title: REVISIT
desc: Revisit stay. I have been staying here long time ago then changed to HI next door. What I found is that the room has been renovated in terms of Carpet , Bedding , and bathroom. The AC is Strong. The TV channels are good. The Room is comfy. However the furnitures in common area is way past its glory. Other suggestion is breakfast taste has been declining rapidly since my last stay ( perhaps due to pandemic )

title: 6nights in concord hotel Singapore
desc: Actually we are one family,me myself & my wife with 3 daughters ,we booked two rooms (connected room) with balacony, the hotel located in orchard road which was very good, but my complaint about room service which was weird: it has take up to three nights to clean & tidy the room, only remove trash, they also told me I got penefit because I booked directly from them, I got 360 Singapore dollars which I can spend on any services; so I used it on laundry, but when we checked out; on receipt details I spent all money also the deposit used to cover all services I had it these days ; I noted that they charge me the room service 10% every nights each room for nothing, it is disappointed

title: Rooms a bit tired, but staff make up for it!!
desc: We stayed for three nights in a premier suite. Now, I'm not going to sugar coat it, but to be honest, the room was a little bit tired and could do with some renovations. However, i think currently, the hotel industry worldwide, needs to have our sympathies. The global pandemic has hit it hard, and until hotel capacities are back to normal, I think it is fair to expect the ball to be dropped for a while. It was nothing major, just things like a slight damp smell, and some minor damage to fixtures and fittings. The big issue for me was the noise. The soundproofing was terrible and every noise from the street below sounded like it was in the room. It did make for a poor nights sleep. The bed was very comfortable, and the air-conditioning worked fine. Rooms are cleaned every three

title: Customers BEWARE, don't put your health at risk staying at this unhygienic hotel‚Ä¶!!!
desc: Critical: Professionalism, Hygiene level No no no don't stay in this hotel as its the most unhygienic hotel. rooms aren‚Äôt cleaned even in 4 days. They claim to follow a SG safe policy in which rooms should be cleaned one in 3 days but its just to cover up their lack of staff. Common hotel washrooms stink as they too haven‚Äôt been cleaned. Drinking water isn‚Äôt provided even after multiple requests. Room service orders will take forever to come. Hope this review reaches the management of the hotel so that they know the pathetic situation of the property.

title: Good hotel
desc: It's good hotel . Aroud the hotel have roads. Very close to shopping centres. I stayed 19th Nov 2019. Staffs are good. Like the hotel system. Have all facilities and foods are good. Will visit again. Thanks to all staffs.

title: Days in a hotel in Orchard Road
desc: Hotel food leaves much to be desired. 3 pieces of Chui Kwei, 1 Lo Mai Kai, an apple, orange juice and water. The beds are clean. View is pleasant, facing the Istana. Cannot open the window for fresh air, but I suppose it's due to security considerations of being in the proximity of the Istana

title: Everything was great but with an unpleasant Housekeeping experience.
desc: Stay for 14 nights due to Stay Home Notice (SHN) upon retuned from Australia. Stayed for 130$ per night with 3 meals provided. Hotel Location perspective i would say still pretty good , along Orchard road but not very strategic; quite outskirt along to express way; walking distance to city of Orchard. Check in process quiet smooth ; the receptionist , Cherry from Thailand was patience enough with some of my questions especially with SHN. Very professional, even at late evening. I was assigned to level 7, with a king bed and overall facility seems decent. And well maintained. First impression was very good. Great part: - Surprisingly the bed was soft with 5 nice pillows given - Meals given were quite acceptable but limited choices; - Room service were quite prompt. Thumbs up

title: My comment.
desc: Nice and comfortable.. Good location and will recommend to others. Complimentary parking for my car are also given. But unfortunately, I stayed only one day and then was transferred to other hotel. Thank you...

title: Great Location, Friendly Staff
desc: This is the second time we have our staycation at Concorde Hotel, and we enjoyed our stay. The room is spacious, and clean. I am very particular with cleanliness, as well as the condition of bed and pillows. At Concorde, I have no complaint about these issues. Staff are all very friendly and helpful. Yvette and Rachel from Front Office are very nice and professional. However, I didn‚Äôt get to see Josephine this time, the Taiwanese lady whom I met during my last stay. She has a very nice smile and very polite. I would also like to compliment the F&B staff, Nicole and Suki. I like Nicole‚Äôs sincerity when attending to the guests. She is very friendly and attentive. Suki, who has been with Concorde for many years, is always helpful and friendly to all guests as usual. I have

title: A lot to like
desc: Excellent location on Orchard road, a few minutes walk to Dhoby Ghaut MRT and the Singapura mall, which we visited a few times. Rooms perhaps a little tired by modern standards, but the hotel must have been quite something in its day, and it was clean and tidy. Bed large and comfortable, double glazed so no street noise, bathroom usable but basic. Room service -- prompt and tasty fare!! The Spices restaurant we used for breakfast every day - excellent, really well done, staff friendly and helpful.

title: Return visit to this friendly Hotel
desc: We visited the Concorde Hotel in Feb and March 2019 and again Feb and March 2020. We cannot speak highly enough of the restaurant staff and especially Rita who has the most sunniest cheerful disposition and just brought a smile to our faces especially during these worrying times. The seafood buffet was outstanding and the special ‚Äòdeal‚Äôof two for one just brilliant! Look forward to seeing you all....hopefully (!) February 2021. Take care and stay safe!

title: Staycation in Singapore
desc: The hotel's location is excellent. The staff are very friendly, courteous and informative. The hotel room is clean and spacious. The hotel's breakfast buffet spread is very elaborate and consistent with a 5 star hotel. Although we did not utilise the full facilities as this was a business trip. I will definitely return and stay in this hotel again.

title: Brilliant stay
desc: Booked Indulgence Premier Club room & got upgraded to a suite. Large room which even had a balcony. Excellent room amenities & cleanliness. Premier Club lounge had great amenities & the staff were brilliant. Drinks in hotel bit pricey so glad had use of drinks & food in Club lounge. Room also included complimentary mini-bar with snacks. There were four of us & staff enjoyed us lining up to attention for our temperature taking. We used the spices restaurant a few times & the buffet choices were excellent. Will definitely stay there again.

title: Convenient
desc: Love the location. Been here several times. My only gripe this time is I was unable to get the room i wanted despite booking and paying for it well in advance. No info was also given on the unavailability too. The staff were wonderful though. It seems that there is no longer a Handy Phone given with the rooms as the staff explained that the contract with the provider is over. Housekeeping still needs to be upgraded as they need to be informed to clean out the balcony if you get a room with a balcony as they will neglect to clean it if not told to do so. Other than that, the location is excellent and the availability of food is close by with Plaza Singapura being one stop away using the bus. All in all will still choose to stay there but better amenities would be much appreciated

title: Good customer service
desc: Good customer service, good room and can check out late. Different from other hotel. Room are clean and toilet also excellent. But only no halal restaurant there. Need to buy from foodpanda. Everything are perfect and hope can have arrow for kiblat for Muslim to pray

title: Quality
desc: The hotel is only 25 mins from airport by taxi. Easy travel by underground with MRT station nearby. Also, lots of gifts shops and branded products shops in walking distance. Also taxi was easily available and inexpensive if two or more people sharing.

title: Room
desc: Stayed at concorde hotel as I was attending a wedding there so we decided to book a room on the way. was clean and spacious. Location is convenient and staff were friendly! Value for money and would stay again.

title: Awesome Hotel
desc: Great place to stay in Singapore, great location and comfortable spacious rooms. Stayed for 11 nights. Staff are friendly and welcoming, especially Jason who went out of his way to assist and make us comfortable. And Rita was the awesome breakfast host, delicious breakfast especially the coffee pau!

title: We always come back to concorde hotel as a place tot rest en enjoy in out gravel from the Netherlands To Australi√´
desc: We are from the Netherlands and have a lot of family living in Australie. Every 2 year we try to come over and spend our holidays in Australi√´. As it is a very long way we make a stop over in the Concorde hotel. After so many years it feels like coming home to spend te stop over on out wat to and from Australi√´. I hope to come back as regular guest over 2 years.

title: My review!
desc: I had a really great time staying with you. I would recommend to my colleague. However, if I mention only one point, it will be a matter of noise and operability of the air conditioner. I would hope for these improvements. Thanks!

title: Great hotel ar top of Orchard Road
desc: An excelent hotel on Orhard Road so close to shopping, resraurants and train. Rooms comfortable . Excellent customer from all staff. The tour desk lady was fantastic - so hdlpful and friendly. We had Ccess to the Executive Lounge which was really good to escape to - excellent service and facilities.

title: Old But Clean
desc: The room was spacious. It is consider an old hotel but maintained very well. Staff are friendly, we was allowed to do a late check out. During our stay, corona virus very viral, hotel very concern about it, staff checked our temperature during check in and they also provide a hand sanitiser in each elevator.

title: Good location for getting around town
desc: Stayed for 3 nights and found the location good for transport links around town. If you like shopping there are plenty of stores just up the road. The hotel has a very modern look and has very good sized rooms.

title: Agoda Pricing vs Hotel Cost - Agoda 3 time the Price
desc: Tried booking directly with Hotel, no rooms available, got through Agoda at 3 times the price. When at hotel the price was still cheaper, and available. I was under the impression that the Booking Sites would the the same or cheaper. Hotel could not assist as they don't know the price charged to me, on their system, even if I showed them. Sent query to Agoda to see how this happend, no response. Be careful when using Agoda, booking site, as hotels can't assist either.

title: Friendly and helpful staff
desc: The check-in receptionist was very welcoming and attentive. She was very patient with us and explained to us every detail of our club benefits. We were also allowed for a late check out till 6 pm! Upon walking to our room, we met up with the housekeepers. They greeted us with a smile! We were at the Premiere Lounge for breakfast, the staff there were very professional and very friendly. Though the food variety at Premiere Lounge is lesser but it's a more quiet and private place to dine for breakfast. Lastly, I will like to thank you, Jasmine. I carelessly left a pair of Chanel earrings on the table and realized it on after an hour after check out! I immediately called the hotel to find the earrings and thankfully, it is still on the table. Jasmine gave a call back to me and

title: Nothing impress..
desc: Self check in.. Carry my own luggage... No carpark lot... I have to do everything on my own.. So yes... not a pleasant stay.. Call the operator && the reception counter over the phone... they don't answer me politely but very rudely so not reccomended!!

title: Good Location
desc: This was a very interesting hotel on orchard road of singapore Easily accessible to shopping malls and food The staff are very nice and there is an amazing japanese restaurant at the lobby of the hotel

title: Ok.
desc: This hotel is aged it's easy to see how it was a top class hotel in its heyday. Needs a revamp and removal of carpets in main areas. There was some leaking in the foyer caused by rain. The plus side is that the hotel is near enough to shops and one of the main shopping districts.. Also, the hop on hop off bus can be accessed nearby which was an added advantage. I'd rate it as a 3 star or rather budget hotel. The reception staff were friendly and helpful.

title: Good location, nice dining offering
desc: This hotel is nicely located to allow for access to many sites on foot as well as one block away from the train station which expands your access exponentially. Also, as a guest of the hotel there is an offering of 2:1 for the most amazing seafood buffet I have ever seen! And the same restaurant is used for their breakfast which has an equally impressive buffet offering --- it is just huge.

title: CNY stay
desc: Location is good, easy access to MRT and bus stops. Only few minutes walk to Orchard Road, east access to Shopping Centres. Hotel is clean and cosy. Room Reservation Staff is friendly and helpful. Hotel Ambience is good.

title: Good Location
desc: Very Good location. The rooms are big compared to other hotelsin Singapore. Walking distance to all the major Malls. MRT is walking distance from the hotel. 7/11 is just next to the hotel. Will definitely come back again.

title: Worst 4 star hotel experienced ever.
desc: Concorde hotel singapore - worst hotel. do not stay in this hotel. overall hotel service is the worst I experienced with irresponsible house keeping, breakfast, customer service. room was unclean and cleaner was rude. restaurant all staffs impolite and unhappy. Reuse unclean toilet towels, use to wipe floors. Used floor mat towels were refold back, not replaced. breakfast everyday same menu which doesn't even meet 4 star quality. (Should be under 1 star). Staff came into our room using his card while we were in without knocking. Not secure. what the management can do is just to say "apologize". Nothing can do to resolve. DISAPPOINTED. Yet you call yourself a 4 star hotel. üëé

title: Bath room and loundry fee
desc: As the current configration of bath room , sometime water spread out from shower room. So sometime a bit stress. Loundry fee feeling a bit expensive , could you consider to give some discount ticket for long stay customer?

title: REALLY LARGE ROOM WITH A BALCONY
desc: Great hotel Loved the spacious room and the balcony Good pool with comfortable sitting area. Would have been perfect with a pool bar. Restaurant was excellent. Great chilli crab and lovely lady in charge. Great location for shopping and eating and bus at the door. Very helpful concierge

title: Hotel Stay with Concorde Singapore
desc: Good location. There are malls on the left, right, front and back within walking distance. Friendly Premier Lounge staffs, especially Mr Aki. Get room with lounge access, you will have no regret. Will stay again.

title: Business
desc: Everything was excellent. But you need to improve on the TV channels and have more movie channels and news channels like Al Jazera, MNet. Otherwise I enjoyed staying at the hotel. The breakfast was also good.

title: Nice hotel near MRT
desc: Good overall experience with the hotel. The location was very good, not in the middle of orchard road but ner enough to enjoy orchard area as a whole. The breakfast was good and cannot complaint with the food. Right next to the hotel are several hawker foods which is quite good.

title: Convenient
desc: Convenient. Did not eat in-house, but there looked to be some nice options. The fitness center is good for weight training; but not enough treadmills. Walking distance to may eating venues; and tourist attractions.

title: Time for a serious upgrade...
desc: We stayed for 2 nights and checked out yesterday. This was my 2nd time staying at Concorde Hotel but this time it fell short on a number of points mainly to do with our room as follows: - Requested a double and got 2 single beds pushed together. Completely separate and still a gap in the middle where my 3yr old kept getting his foot stuck. - Looked under the bed for toys that had been dropped only to find used hotel slippers, a plastic soup spoon and a used coffee cup (photos provided). I complained to reception who apologized and had the room cleaned again. - I also requested a bathtub if possible at the time of booking but wish I hadn‚Äôt bothered. The bathroom has been half renovated but for some strange reason they have kept the original dated bathtub and sink which are old

title: Great Location
desc: The concorde is in a great location for shopping along Orchard Road, the MRT a 5 min walk away and bus stop out the door. There are some great eating places around too. There is a laundry place just across the road. The buffet breakfast is very much worth it. A great selection of foods. And you will not walk out hungry! The gym is fantastic and the pool area...well so much potential there but yeah.. Great size pool and area with a area for the kids but getting a towel was a mission and don't expect to be able to walk up to the bar and order a drink..this service is not available. We ended up going and getting drink from outside the hotel and bringing them in and sitting by the pool. The rooms are lovely and the beds are great. They do room service but we found our room was

title: Serious refurbishment required
desc: The room is old and refurbishment is required. For the price I paid, it was certainly overpriced. The air con was not in the best condition. Felt warm in the middle of the night and kept waking up. There are better hotels in Singapore for the same price if not cheaper

title: Two night stay
desc: peaceful environment was on a business trip with limited time was able to a bit of shopping and eating out. good location. very wide selection for the breakfast. hope fully will visit with my family in the near future

title: spacious & comfortable
desc: I always come back to Concorde everytime go to Spore. Because I found the spacious room, comfortable bed, and the good location. The dinner buffet is delicious & have many kinds of food. Breakfast is good too although I didn't take the bfast this time..

title: Excellent
desc: This is my second stay with you and I must say that I am very impressed with the quality of your hotel in Singapore. I did in the past many different luxury hotel like Shangril la, Regent, Four seasons, Mandarin Oriental... in Singapore, Kuala Lumpur, Bali... and I was very disappointed each time with the service and so on, but the Concorde in Singapore really surpass my expectation. In one word, EXCELLENT. My husband and I also were having our buffet dinner at Spices every night during our stay and each time we were very satisfied by the food, the very efficient service. Here again one word for Spices cafe: PERFECT. And one more thing, the Housekeeping compare to other hotel, is really efficient and keep an eyes on every aspect of the hygiene of the room. Now one thing gives me

title: Mr Naeem
desc: The hotel is clean and staff is friendly yet professional. Some names that I would like to mention for their unmatchable hard work are Annalin, Chandra, Manoj,Nimna and Uttham. They have been exceptional with their professional responsibilities. Buffet is amazing and caters brilliant healthy options.

title: Great location
desc: Hotels staffs could be more diplomatic and professional. Location was great, beds very comfortable, room is clean and functional. Facilities were alright. Internet connection was fast and efficient. Will definitely stay here again.

title: Dated, bad traffic and incompetent car parking management
desc: Hotel is dated with shops that is not "family friendly". Common area is lined with sleaz shops. Car parking is worst. Narrow space for manouevre, can't leave the carpark due to exit issues for 4t minutes. Called the hotel, refer to security management and no one took charge. Other cars users were Horning and smoking but no one took action.

title: Dated but super friendly
desc: This place has been around for a long time, probably mostly due to its great location in the middle of Orchard Street shopping district. Everything is a bit dated and screams ‚Äúdesigned in the 80ies‚Äù. It‚Äôs clean and well kept though and what really makes it stand out is the staff. This is a shout out for Rita at the Spices cafe, whose enthusiasm, caring attitude and sense of humour really made my day. She‚Äôs an asset to the hotel and having real, happy and confident people like her working in service makes any guest feel so much more welcome than just basic professional courtesy. Thank you Rita!

title: Quiet hotel in the middle of Orchard
desc: The Concorde hotel is perfectly situated in the middle of the Orchard district. It is convenient to the metro, shopping and a good base to explore the city. The hotel is quiet and nicely furnished. The pool is a great place to relax.

title: My favourite hotel on every occasion
desc: Whenever I am in the Lion city for both leisure and business, only stay here. Spacious rooms, comfortable bed clean and snack in the city. Great breakfast in the morning with all type of local and international cuisine in offer and wide variety of room service menu.

title: Nice and spacious room in a convenient location
desc: Convenient place to stay if you want to shop around center of orchard, close to mrt (sommerset), and easy access from anywhere. I really like the spacious room, and even with the balcony. Close to any convenient stores that open 24 hours.

title: Great hotel location
desc: Rooms are spacious, very clean,confortable large bed,5'walk from subway...easy to go to central shopping mall.. Restaurant lounge in lobby good food...highly recommend to travellers and would come back there nextly.

title: Location
desc: Hard to beat for location - smack bang on Orchard Rd, near shops and a short walk to Dhoby Gaut MRT. Rooms were spacious however we did have problem with bugs and had the bites to show for it. We were moved to different rooms but really this should not be allowed to happen in the first place. Breakfast was adequate (would prefer fresh coffee than a machine) and overall not a bad stay. Would probably stay again .

title: Excellent
desc: Overall pleasant stay. I have to admit we splurged and upgraded our room categories but the amenities offered made it well worth it. The location is very convenient and the hotel offers many small gestures that enhances the guest experience.

title: Location Location Location
desc: This is a wonderful property though a bit old. Reception staff seemed to be a bit slow and cold. Lobby area is huge with lot of seating options. Rooms are good and well maintained. Centrally located with many shopping and dinning options nearby. I believe that this is one of the best located hotels. Our sincere thanks to Ms FARIDAH whose support and help made our stay very comfortable and memorable. Downside: Breakfast is really very poor and the restaurant is always overcrowded. Staff the the restaurant are good.

title: Great location
desc: This location is convenient to any other places. Shopping mall just right near by. There are many restaurants and shops to have your meals and look around. Especially during Christmas time, there are a lot of Christmas decorations everywhere. Nice to take photos everywhere!!

title: concorde hotel
desc: Concorde hotel is nearby shopping malls and eateries hence it is very convenient. Room is spacious, clean and tidy. breakfast was good however please look into check in process as it was quite slow. Thank you

title: Friendly and helpful staff
desc: It is really good value for money staying at Concorde hotel. We really have a wonderful stay at this Concorde hotel chain in Singapore. The room is so fabulous, elegant, stylish and just very comfortable. It is so heartwarming to receive a welcome greeting from the staff at the entrance of the hotel. All the staff we meet from the reception to the concierge and to the room service are so accommodating, helpful, full of smile and very friendly. I stayed in Concorde hotel while in Australia before with my family and experienced the same accommodation as well. I just love staying in Concorde hotel.

title: Excellent stay on Orchard Rd.
desc: Stayed here for ten nights in December on business & found it to be a great place to stay. Not the biggest or perhaps the grandest hotel in Singapore but very warm and welcoming with friendly staff & great services. I was lucky to have a 'Premier' room on the 9th floor with club privileges - if you are able this is certainly worth the extra to be able to use not just the dining room/evening drinks but also a range of other services. My room was quite big for a 1 - 2 guest room, wifi was excellent and the service was great. The location is also great, just 5 minutes to the two nearest MRT stations and in the middle of all the shopping & restaurants you can stand. A very good place to stay.

title: enjoyed my stay
desc: superb stay at the hotel, everything was easy to access. The WiFi connection was excellent. The staff was friendly and very helpful. The room service was excellent. Before ,we are back to the room in the evening...everything cleaned up.

title: Business Sleepover
desc: I was alone in the hotel room, it was comfortable and I enjoyed the peace and quiet in the room on the 8th floor. I had to leave very early in the morning and required a taxi. The hotel concierge booked a taxi for me, which was excellent and convenient.

title: Excellent stay.
desc: Was one of the best stay, so far. Excellent hospitality and Stirling performance from the reservations staff, the housekeeping staff and the people at the taxi stand. Please keep up the good work. I intend to come again.

title: Bad food, musty rooms, beware the fourth floor 'balcony'
desc: Do not get a balcony room. The fourth floor balcony rooms are really a shared ground floor patio between all the rooms on your side. They also smell musty and damp and are quite outdated. Be careful at checkout if you are given a food and beverage credit because they may not automatically apply it and you may need to ask for charges to be removed. The breakfast buffet in their restaurant is overpriced for the quality of food. We recommend going elsewhere for breakfast.

title: 2 night stay at Concorde
desc: The hotel is ok, good location close to the shopping area The swimming pool is outdoor only so not really enjoyable on rainy days Breakfast is good, big selection of different food I d recommend the hotel for the location and if you are not looking for facilities Taxi call a bit slow

title: Stay from 08 Dec. to 13 Dec.
desc: The location, shops around the hotel, cleanliness and hospitality are impeccable. If I comment, we had a little bit difficulty in getting a taxi, especially when rain. Smooth transportation is preferably improved,

title: Average
desc: Need refurbishment, breakfast need to fill up as soon as the tray/pan empty. Need more choices on the breakfast. Price wise is not worth. Location is great. So, as a whole, just average point. Need more comparison other hotels so comments will be better

title: faultless stay
desc: We booked a premier room and opted for the stay and dine package. Booking direct gave us a few more benefits inc a free minibar and 30 sgd per night towards food , which we used on the afternoon tea in spices cafe , a nice selection of tasty treats. The evening meal ,again at spices cafe was a delicious buffet including some rather impressive seafood .Overall a faultless stay , highly recommended.

title: Singapore December 2-6, 2019
desc: I would like to say "little disappointed with my trip in Singapore on December 2-6, 2019". Due to when I had check in at the hotel, I received the smoking room. That's not my needs and then I changed the room from standard deluxe to the deluxe plus that I am charged 30$ plus per night (not included vat). But I accepted that because I didn't want the smooking room. I want the quiet, one king size bed with the Orchard road view room that i had email to the hotel before i had check in. I hope that the next time to go to Singapore I will receive the room that I want.

title: A nice staycation..kids love the family room
desc: nice location, clean spacious room . Very recomended for family with children. We opt for family room and the kids love the bunk bed. A nice way to bonding with the kids over the weekend. Will sure to come back to Concorde Hotel. Thank you.

title: Our home away from home
desc: We have stayed at the Concorde numerous times over the years and will continue to stay there, not only because of its excellent facilities but also because of the fine services provided. The rooms are clean and comfortable, Spices Cafe offers delicious meals right on site, and the hotel staff members are pleasant and efficient. We greatly appreciate the warm welcome we receive each time we visit.

title: Weekend at the Concorde Hotel Singapore
desc: Excellent service and warm, friendly staff. Check in staff very efficient and helpful. The hotel has been recently renovated and all room have a new fresh look about them. Located on Orchard Road it is perfect for shopping and browsing in the many local malls.

title: Good location, good facilities and room services
desc: I was on a business trip with my husband and my baby. We had good sleep here and we could walk to shop pleasantly since the hotel is at Orchard Road. The room was nice and they even provided a baby cot for my 23-month-old daughter. While I was away in conference room, my husband and baby had a good time at the pool and the hotel facilities. Highly recommended.

title: Not great
desc: This hotel is convenient to shopping but the hotel facilities are a bit dated. The linen was a bit older than normal for a four star plus hotel. The front desk service was cordial. I believe that a bit of updating would be nice. I stayed here over twenty years ago and it seems that they have not updated since.

title: Comfortable staying
desc: The room was very clean and quiet even located at the midtown facing Orchard street. The breakfast was tasty with variety and so satisfied and not palled. I enjoyed my staying at the hotel. Thanks a lot!

title: Shame about the nightclub
desc: Most things about the Concorde Hotel Singapore are great - excellent rooms, great position on Orchard Road, lovely restaurant - however it is a real pity we hardly got any sleep due to the nightclub somewhere below which finished at 5:30am. Given sleep is kind of important, it totally spoilt our stay and we will not be back.

title: Good Service, Great Location
desc: Everyone was friendly and helpful. Service was great. The location of the hotel was very convenient, specially if you want to be close to the malls in Orchard. The lobby interiors and some of the furniture and carpet in the room feels dated. Otherwise, enjoyed my stay here.

title: Concorde Stay
desc: I recommend this hotel for family travellers. Spacious room. Very good location. Would like to suggest to minimise the use of single use plastics, such as the water bottles and some of the bathroom amenities.

title: Breakfast service is disappointing
desc: Overall is good, just disappointed with breakfast service as no staff is there to help and refill spoons or glasses. Table is not clean and seat r with crumbs. Cant really find anyone when we needed something

title: Convenient and Comfort
desc: Nice clean rooms with firm comfortable beds. Great location and friendly accommodating staff. Throw in affordability and there is nothing else i need to say to convince others to experience Concorde Hotel. Ideal for business and holiday with family.

title: Best hotel
desc: This hotel is the best we have stayed in. The staff are so friendly & we always get greeted wuth a smile. Nothig is too much trouble & food is amazing. Rooms excellent & clean. All staff always speak to you & always willing to help.

title: Great Location
desc: The Concorde is in a great location and the staff are all very friendly and accommodating. We had a Premiere room so the services included in this were great. I did not find the pillows to be very comfortable though, so at times had trouble sleeping. I would be happy to recommend this hotel.

title: Great stay in a great location
desc: Visited to see the Xmas lights which were amazing, not only on Orchard road but also in Little Italy. Concorde was ideally located between Somerset and Ghoby Gaut MRT stations. Highlights being the Gardens By The Bay and the Super tree light show.

title: Very noisy and dated hotel
desc: We came back to Singapore from a very nice hotel in Penang after a tour. Hoping for a bit of relaxation!!!? We arrive at midnight so hopefully get a good night's sleep. But were woken up by constant thumping! Gym on same floor as us so obviously sound proofing problems can also hear people conversing through walls. Hotel in perfect location for everything, but rooms have chipped and worn out furniture corridors musty, would put it just below a premier inn quality with a 5 star price. Would probably not stay here again if we come to Singapore.

title: Great location
desc: Location of hotel is great. Shopping, food, convenience shop easy access. Lift situation to street level abit annoying for guest with pram/wheelchair. Comfortable stay with the kids bcoz of tub in room and pool but the kids pool is really small and not too exciting.

title: About Service
desc: Location was so good but the bathroom(shower booth drainage) condition and the service by waitress in breakfast restaurant was terrible. The food quality and diversity was below average compare to other similar price hotel. There was even no fish at all in the menu.

title: all good
desc: all good. easy to transport and located in the centre of shopping area. All staff are friendly. Room is big and the price is not so high. Room is clean. The food is ok. I really recommend you to stay here.

title: Concorde's Tiptop Service
desc: With front desk officers look so ever professional, I will come back to attest the fact that they will serve with utmost dedication every single time. Personnels to look out for: Bonita, Rita and Sumin. They are some of the best Concorde's ambassadors

title: Repeat visits for more than 10 years
desc: Consistently good service and friendly staff. Hotel recently refurbished. Excellent location for public transport - numerous bus routes just outside, MRT 7 to 10 minutes walk. Shops etc virtually next door.

title: Convenient experience
desc: Always love staying in Concorde Hotel everytime I visit Singapore. Love the good service and the staff, the room, location, cleanliness, etc. Hope the service will be more improve and excellent in the future

title: Old but nice
desc: Breakfast is good, location is strategic. Big room with city view, and hospitality of the staff is superb. We stayed for two nights, and enjoy our sleep. We not yet enjoy hotel's facilities because we travel all day

title: Not returning to Concorde Hotel
desc: My wife and I celebrated quite a few of our life milestones (and getaways) at Concorde Hotel. We used to be amazed by the hotel‚Äôs exceptional hospitality and excellent rooms. Not anymore - we were greeted with a less than helpful reception officer, who had us waiting for 10 minutes so that she could verify a detail of our stay that she should have known from her management system. Air conditioning in our Premier Suite room wasn‚Äôt ideal, it was hitting 27¬∞c in the evening - not conducive for sleeping. Drainage in the shower wasn‚Äôt working, so it floods every time we took a shower. Complimentary conditioner in the bathroom was dodgy, it had the look and consistency of diluted soap. Evening cocktail food was cold at the lounge and we tried getting our soap in the bathroom refilled

title: Pleasant stay a bit on the cold side
desc: Nice hotel, very spacious room, with very modern decoration, comfortable bed, clean, with all expected amenities for that level of hotel (shower only in my room, which was fine for me). Efficient and helpful staff with a joyous greeting in the breakfast!. Located in a very busy road, with shopping and restaurants within walking distance. Variety of choice for breakfast but catering mainly for Asian tastes. Efficient and helpful staff. The AC! Rather difficult to adjust in the room. Adequate meeting facilities but in the meeting room it was uncomfortably cold and being centrally regulated not adjustable. Should adopt more environmentally friendly temperatures for meeting rooms.

title: Good stay
desc: Good location , fairly clean rooms, the pool is impressive, staff were nice too. One thing I am still wondering is how did they do the window sound proofing, the hotel is located in the fairly Busy area after the commercial Street there‚Äôs a lot of bosses and pedestrians outside the window but in my room I almost couldn‚Äôt hear anything big plus on this end.

title: A good location for visiting central Singapore
desc: Excellent and not too expensive hotel on Orchard Road in central Singapore. Great location for both shopping and business meetings. The rooms are spacious and clean. Efficient and friendly staff. The atmosphere is a bit impersonal and a little too classic. Some modern touches could make the whole structure stand out even more. Unfortunately, the area is a bit lacking for restaurants, especially in the evening. The restaurants in the area are mostly oriental and do not offer good international cuisine. The only alternative is to move to Clarke Quay, 10 minutes away with the MRT, but you still need to walk to Plaza Singapura. Another small "flaw" ... the hotel does not have a smoking area and, given the recent ban on smoking all along the Orchard Road, the only alternative

title: Great Stay!
desc: We Had a great stay in this hotel. The location is really good on Orchard Road, you can visit the city by walk. There‚Äôs a bus station just in front of this hotel and a subway nearby. The staff is very polite and friendly. The room was really nice and clean. Breakfast worth it! I totally recommend this hotel ! Sana

title: upgraded but not quite
desc: The concord is a very nice property and well located. They have done some room upgrades since my last stay. Still not quite there... the soap and shampoo disperser in the bathroom is very similar to ones found at the YMCA or local gym... had to call to get a toothbrush.. bathroom amenities are scarce to non-existent. The bed was Ok but you can tell its not new. Overall, its clean and nice but just appears like the hotel is in a budget crisis... staff are very kind and friendly.

title: Business Stay at Concorde
desc: Solid hotel for a business trip. Walking distance to the metro and a quick ride to the Bay area. The gym only has one treadmill but was otherwise well-stocked with equipment. Odd that the bathroom had no plugs. Otherwise, staff was lovely and the room was clean.

title: Calm, convenient and very comfortable.
desc: We shade 2 nights each way, to and from Europe the Concorde was a haven to return to in a very central location on Orchard Rd. MRT, shopping, restaurants,bars, all nearby I recommend upgrading to Premier Lounge class (check their website for all the benefits)

title: Good Hotel, Bad Room Odor
desc: The location of the hotel is very nice, close to a lot of shopping malls and also located in the middle of 2 MRT Station (Dhoby Ghaut & Somerset). The room is clean but i just cant tolerate the bad carpet odor, or maybe because the hotel is quite old, so maybe you need to change the carpet of some rooms or change it so odorless flooring..

title: Not a 4-star hotel
desc: I stayed in the "Deluxe with Balcony" type room. Pros : * Good location near malls and station Cons : * The soundproof of the room was totally poor. There was a door separating my room from the next one, and I could hear everything from the other customer. That was really annoying. Also, Every time a customer was closing his door from a different room, I could hear it and my room was shaking too. * The shower was bad. There were very little water power and it was difficult to get tepid water as the switch made it either too hot or too cold.

title: Modern, clean, comfortable close to everything public transport at the door step. Highly recommend place to stay.
desc: Modern, clean, comfortable close to everything, public transport at the door step. Highly recommend place to stay. Staff excellent, helpful friendly, tour guide at the hotel was a fantastic help to myself and friend very knowledgeable. We also ate at the hotel many times, good was good and plentiful and reasonably priced. Pool area is great only thing I would say is that some shade over the pool should be provided or erected as its far to jot and sunny to stay in for long as you would get terribly burnt. My Girlfriend had to sit under the umbrella as it was to hot in the sun to go into or stay in the pool for more than 5 minutes. Apart from that we couldn't fault the accomadation.

title: Banquet lunch
desc: I came here to attend the Health Ambassador Day event which was held at one of the function rooms. This hotel is quite easy to find as it is located within walking distance from Somerset and Dhoby Gaut MRT stations. The exterior facade of this hotel gave an impression of an old hotel but the function room is quite modern, spacious and brightly lit. The stage is also suitably large to accommodate the many entertainment programs put up by the organizing committee and robust enough to withstand the vigorous movement of a team of zumba dance performers. The sound system is also perfectly clear. The environment was conducive for interaction. The sumptuous banquet lunch dishes were very well-prepared and matched perfectly well the strict dietary requirement of the Health

title: Lovely hotel
desc: Although this is a lovely hotel with a nice welcome by reception, they let themselves down on two accounts. Firstly the comprehension of several staff was poor, which meant we did not really get the specific answer to what we asked! Secondly our soft boiled eggs were undercooked and we had a duplicate order and NO difference so this is not acceptable! We had to pay $150 deposit which is not refunded for up to 10 days!!‚Äô Nice large gymnasium and pool

title: Concorde Singapore stay
desc: Very well appointed rooms with well cared for amenities. We enjoyed using the pool, and were especially impressed with the Tour desk, which we found most helpful in organising the tours and destinations we wished to access.

title: Great Staycation
desc: With minimum view or a view of a busy road, those wont stop me from coming back to staycay at Concorde again. Comfy beds, spacious room, easy check-in & check-out. Friendly staffs too. Just a little setback, to check some of the necessities in the room, eg ironing, some are kind of faulty as in it can still iron but there's rusts. So a minor or random check of necessities, would be good.

title: Great hotel in a great location
desc: The Concorde is in a good location in Orchard Road with public transport and the HOHO bus a short walk away. The staff are friendly and provide good service. The rooms are clean and fairly spacious. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Short but very nice stay!
desc: My stay was very good! The Staff of the hotel was very friendly. I was here for a short seminar and i was surprised by the room i had given. It was on the top floor and it was very good. my overall experience here is very pleasant!. The hotel is very near the MRT station.

title: Comfortable but Average
desc: Fantastic location. Comfortable rooms, but the hotel seemed a little bit dated and understaffed. Food quality was good, but could have used more variety at breakfast. My wife had stayed at this property before and had a slightly better experience, so maybe some of our minor inconveniences were not typical. We left a bit of polite feedback and hope it was well-received. The gym was quite good compared to some other hotel's fitness centres. We'll probably consider staying there again the next time we travel to Singapore.

title: A good hotel to stay
desc: We were welcomed with a glass of juice while checking in after a long flight. Always a nice gesture. We had a normal sized room, and heard no noice from the street, although Orchard road is quite busy. Every day we got two complimentary bottles of water from the hotel, which I also find a nice gesture,.We liked the location at the Orchard road, many shops and eateries nearby. We used Grab (taxi) for most of our trips, and because of the central location, the furthest trip was 15-20 minutes away. Service of the hotel personnel was good and friendly, especially at the restaurant. We liked the breakfast, there is more than enough choice between Asian and European style food. We also enjoyed their sea banquet menu in the evening. We would certainly recommend this hotel for a nice

title: Family reunion nov 2019
desc: Family friendly hotel Pleasant friendly staff Good location Good amenities n facilities Friendly n commited reservation staff Friendly n helpful reception staff Friendly hskpg staff Which make our short stay a memorable one Location location location is fantastic Thank you Concorde hotel

title: Concorde Hotel the place to stay
desc: Concorde Hotel is a very central place to base yourself for the surrounds and delights of Singapore, easy access to the MRT, Buses and Taxi's. Always something happening and have a tour desk who is extremely helpful with Singapore. The staff very accommodating on arrival, and the staff for breakfast always happy and positive which sets you up for the day. I have no problems recommending the Concorde Hotel to anyone wanting to stay a few days or an overnight stay in transit, they will help make your stay so easy and take the stress out of travel between countries.

title: A pleasant stay
desc: Clean hotel in a convenient location. Staff were helpful and friendly. Definitely would recommend this hotel to anyone who is visiting Singapore. Nice pool and gym facilities. Will come back if ever I'm in Singapore again.

title: Very good hotel with a great location
desc: Great location. The room was really good as well as the facilities and the staff was nice. The breakfast had a lot of good choices, but the coffee machines could be better. I recommend to improve two things, the treadmill machines in the gymnasium and the lights in the room.

title: DLM capital
desc: I have stayed at this location on 3 different times. And though the service is ok, the place reminds me of a large funeral home. Very Dark, litlle no night life, bar great service, but out of the mainstream. I do not understand how they make,a profit. Great location, but just plain boring. I stated to go Orchard Hotel much better spirit and atmosphere. Its a shame because great location, just needs a life.

title: Singapore stop over
desc: A very good central hotel close to shopping, public transport (MRT) including being able to walk to some sights. The hotel has been refurbished so facilities are clean, modern and well looked after. Staff were all helpful and pleasant to customers. This was our second stay here ( four nights) and we would be very happy to go back again.

title: Class
desc: It‚Äôs an ideal location for shopping and is very convenient to Somerset MRT station. They had good service provided. Fab experience I had my 4 days stay in Spore. Will definitely come back here. Love the gym too.

title: Great place to stay
desc: Nice hotel with great staff and clean rooms all within walking distance to train stations and shopping areas. our house keeper kept our room to such a high standard and made us feel welcome. check in was simple and was easy

title: Comfortable & Convenience
desc: Hotel location super nice and super convince for eat and shopping. Also room is newly renovated and I like the mattress, was sleeping like baby. Also bathroom amenity is also nice, it was upgraded than my last visit last year.

title: Expensive but ordinary
desc: Stayed here because it was booked by my wife's company. Main plus is the location. Located in orchard road, very accessible to all the shopping centers. But the rate per night is high, considering the amenities are not that luxurious. Food selection during buffer breakfast is limited. I miss my stay in holiday inn Singapore center where I usually stay if I'm in SG.

title: Great location, great staff and value for money
desc: We stayed 2 nights 3 days and couldn't ask for anymore. The staff were so friendly and helpful. Rooms were very clean and comfortable, you got value for money. The hotel is in a great location close to all public transport and heaps of shopping. Well worth the stay.

title: Cold hotel
desc: Front desk staffs were cold during check in and out. First time I see a hotel need the guest to cook their own soup noodle during break fast. Strangely put 2 empty vast in the room. Feel spooky..........

title: Amazing place to stay
desc: I stayed for 9 nights in the Premier Club and cannot fault any aspect of the hotel and service. The location was perfect close to public transport. The Premier Lounge was perfect for relaxation or for working.

title: Great Hotel to stay at the heart of Singapore
desc: Rooms are very clean and very well maintained although it may not be the newest hotel in town. Highly recommended for business and leisure stay. The breakfast has variety of dishes, and the gym has the necessary basics for exercise and work out. Highly recommended!

title: Staff and Room
desc: the receptionist is very helpful, polite and the room is spacious and clean. A good stay at Concorde Hotel. Will recommend to friends that is going to Singapore. Very near to shopping location at Orchard Road.

title: A good business week in Singapore
desc: Good location and easy to communicate to any part of Singapore by MRT taxi or bus, nice and comfortable room, excellent breakfast with a good selection of nice food and generous happy hour, nice staff and good service. and a free mini bar in the room.

title: Location
desc: Very good, specially good location, very close to orchard road. My only worry is my credit card ($100) which you FO took which is not return yet. Could you please let me know when i will be able to get this money back to my card.

title: Hotel Reveiw
desc: The hotel is located at very convenient location. But the verandah and other common areas does not have AC, so its hot in those areas. Hotel is clean, Service is good and prompt. However, the portion of food provided is very less as compared to the cost.

title: Family Holiday
desc: The service.location & amenities were of a very high standard we will be returning to Singapore and will definitely stay at the Concorde we will be personally recommending it to others & conveying or review with our travel agent

title: Loving this hotel
desc: I've been stayed this hotel more than 10 times due to my business trip. I must say their hospitality is exceptional. They always consider my request for my rooms, and also receiving parcel for me. It‚Äôs just perfect place to spend time for hectic business trip. They also have amazing gym. Even the opening time is limited, it‚Äôs a decent gym. Rooms, they have varieties of room depends on your need, cozy to spacious one. Whats common among all the rooms is cleanness. Room SV is also amazing! But it‚Äôs really expansive. Locations, you won‚Äôt miss anything.

title: Near Perfect Stay!
desc: Last week my husband, sister and I stayed in one of the Premier rooms of Concord hotel. On the first night we had some problems with the air-conditioning of the room, but the hotel people promptly shifted us to premier suite! My sister accidentally left her earrings behind in the earlier room, and when we asked the management people, those were returned to us. We even forgot our camera behind, that they kept safe for us. The staff and the service were impeccable. There was however a Mr Din, one of the lobby attendants, who left a bad taste in our mouth with his racist behavior. We are from India and we were waiting for the taxi in the lobby and an Asian family came after us. But he got them a taxi and let them go first. Another member of the same family was going elsewhere and

title: Great stay
desc: Always a good stay here. Location is great. The staff are very accommodating and the overall experience. Price to location ratio this is one of the better hotels to stay in when wanting to be near orchard and stay in a quality establishment.

title: Geosim68
desc: Stayed recently, the service was excellent, the staff great and the location perfect, would highly recommend a premier room to enjoy the executive lounge, great value for money hotel in the heart of Singapore.

title: very good in position and view
desc: good location comfort , quiet and clean professional staff Near the city center; shopping, sightseeing, restaurants & bars nearby¬∑Near public transit & the train station warm hospitality and convenience but limited diversification in european breakfast

title: Happy Visitor
desc: As per my previous comments. I was happy with everything-Staff were wonderful and the food service excellent- the variety astounding. The air conditioning was just right. A second coffee machine would help, especially at peak times

title: Hotel accomodation at the Concorde Hotel
desc: Buffet was excellent. Staff very efficient and friendly. Location was very central to food courts and shopping malls. The doorman was very helpful in providing directions to various venues and taxis were readily available

title: Concorde Hotel
desc: Great services, located in a very convenient area which ease your moves either with public or private transportation! Well equipped with gym room, wonderful view from the room and very clean, secure place!

title: hospitality hotel
desc: The receptionist especially at Premier Lounge , staffs are warm, helpful and hospitality . The same at the cafe. The hotel location is ideal to move around. especially with all the shopping mall around nearby..

title: Decent hotel in a great location.
desc: This hotel is situated in a great location on Orchard Road with Plaza Singapura on one side and Dhoby Gaut MRT and Orchard Central, Somerset MRT on the other. There are also some 24 hour food stalls right beside the hotel. I recommend the satay (only open at night). Easy waling distande to other malls eg: Paragon, Ion etc. The hotel itself is nicely appointed, staff friendly and helpful. When i told them about being woken up by banging at 7am in the morning, they did not hesitate to offer to change our room to another one on a different side of the hotel. The noise apparently comes from a gym on the 2nd floor. Which is a bit weird because we were situated on the 4th floor..? Anyway i would advise you to avoid rooms situated to the right of the building if the noise carries that

title: Great hotel, great location, excellent lounge!
desc: I stayed at the hotel for 3 nights, hos location is the greatest advantage for my opinion- right on orchard road, the rooms are well equipped and the premium lounge is very nice too - lovely staff and nice food. Overall good experience and lovely staff.

title: Good location - aged hotel
desc: The hotel is in need of a renovation or at least getting the mouldy smell out. The first room I was offered had a strong mould odour. The second room was better in that regards but wasn't clean, stained and dirty desk chair, broken seat mechanisms and a phone keyboard that was very dirty. Staff was nice and efficient in accomodating both room replacement as well as sourcing a new desk chair and phone.

title: Concorde Hotel
desc: Very Good, staff polite. Good Breakfast. Clean rooms and overall very clean facilities. Excellent location with Metro nearby, restaurants, shops of all types, mini markets and malls. An ideal hotel for all visitors.

title: If you look for the best Concord Hotel is the one
desc: If you are best of the best so go and stay in Concord Hotel with the best staff and great management and warm welcoming, they served with happiness and carrying warm greetings. Mr. Gopalbwas very kind to request me to stay in Concord hotel and for me I will always back again to the Concord

title: Great location
desc: The hotel is in a great location, however the shopping complex surrounding the hotel needs a revamp. The rooms were clean and spacious, most staff were friendly with the exception of the check in staff.

title: Staying in the heart of Singapore
desc: very good location, in the centre of a vibrant city, spacious and many facilities inside the hotel and also nearby. The rooms are spacious and quiet for a good sleep and rest. Everyday a very good buffeet (seafood and western). Friendly team. Very nice Premier Lounge with everday free snack and drinks. That's really nice there.

title: My review
desc: Nice stay thank you.My only consideration would be that I am forced to write at least 200 characters in writing this review when I don't really want to say anything. It was nice, staff helpful, clean room, comfy bed, just what I would have expected.

title: Great Spot in Orchard Road
desc: We really liked this place. The hotel was modern and up to date. Staff were prompt and helpful. Plenty to do nearby as malls and food were plentiful in the area. Breakfast was outstanding. I would stay here again.

title: Great hotel In Singapore.
desc: Great hotel. Right on Orchard Road. No views of the sea which would have been perfect. Lovely staff. A Kiwi GM. What could be better? We also joined the Premier Club and the staff there were terrific.

title: Concorde
desc: overall very nice stay for one night at the end of our holiday, great location for shops, metro and good access to city centre, bed was very comfy and room was well appointed, I didn't eat in the hotel as had been in Singapore for four nights at the start of our holiday so new a few other restaurants

title: Great Location with Large Room
desc: Great location on Orchard road. Staff are very welcoming and helpful. The rooms are large, clean and well maintained. The breakfast selection is one of the best I have experienced. I stayed on this occasion based on my previous experience staying at this hotel.

title: Comfortable and Spacious
