desc: It was a comfortable trip and the cables are good. I love how spacious it is and it is easy to move around and not have to squeeze. We don even have to eat on our beds but there are chairs and small table to eat.

title: Good location
desc: The location is perfect. Right on Orchard road, you can walk everywhere and easily access two MRT stations within 5-6 minutes. Check in and check out was hassle free. I had no issues with noise and no trouble sleeping. The room was fine except for the level of cleanliness in the bathroom. When I checked in, the bathtub was not clean and there was pubic hair in the tub. Not ideal and it dampened my experience. I requested the tub be cleaned the next day, and I think it was - but it still had these black and brown stains and generally wasn't the nicest experience for a hotel of this price. If this was a budget hotel then I wouldn't mind so much - this was advertised as higher quality. There were also no amenities provided in the bathroom other than a shower gel dispenser in

title: Great Stay
desc: Really good value hotel in excellent location on Orchard Road. Book directly online to receive complimentary late checkout to 4 pm which suited us as we had an evening flight. We also arrived on a very early flight and were allowed to check in to our room straight away. The receptionist also heard my husband mention our anniversary and we were also served complimentary cake. Nice pool for cooling off in after a warm day sight seeing. Definitely recommend.

title: Bad Experience
desc: I was stayed for 3 nights and had to listen to the kid(s) beside my room scream since the early morning till the late night. Also in the morning there were a sound of construction from the hotel, very noisy.

title: The Concorde Hotel, is an excellent place to stay.
desc: I enjoy returning to the Concorde, it is my home away from home. The staff are exceptionally friendly, helpful and very professional, from the door man, concierge, laundry, housekeeping and the Premier lounge staff, they take care of my every needs. My rooms are always very nice. Thank you everyone at the Concorde for taking such good care of me. It is very much appreciated. I highly recommend the Concorde to anyone going to Singapore.

title: Concorde Hotel Singapore
desc: I truly enjoyed my 3-night stay at Concorde Hotel Singapore. Everything is great, from the location, the facilities, the hotel supplies and the foods too. It was really a pleasant stay. Definitely recommended!

title: Smelly mildue room
desc: Room was full of mildue and moist.Got new room third night that was much better. The girl in reception was very helpful but my clothes was stinking from the mildue in the previus room. I got a plate of fruits sent to my room, but no excuse or compensation was offered.

title: Excellent Staffs
desc: Overall good services from the staffs. From front desk to lounge, housekeeping and laundry. The only downside was the condition and equipment of the gym. Many things need replacement, even the mats. No treadmill.

title: Good choice to stay in the heart of Singapore
desc: Excellent rooms - large, furnished. Had everything I needed in the room. Very clean. Service very friendly and immediate. Location is great: right on Orchard Road. Breakfast needs more investment, more variety - but OK.

title: Concorde on Orchard
desc: Excellent location on Orchard Road and in easy access by foot and local transport to major tourist destinations and bars and restaurants. Our main reason for this visit was for the Grand prix but we also explored attractions and food options.

title: TV remote control
desc: TV remote control device did not work properly when you used just in front of the TV screen, but it was OK when you moved in a stiff angle from direct front of TV screen and try to let it work. Iy is quite strange !

title: Hotel stay for 4 days 3 night.
desc: The room sound proof is very poor. I can hear the sound from the next room very clearly and couldn‚Äôt sleep. I booked for a Deluxe Plus room and expected to get a king size bed but I was given a double single bed room on the check in day. The reason given by the staff is all king size bed room rooms are fully booked and I couldn‚Äôt change the room even for my second and third night stay. This is not fair to me as I paid slightly more for the king size bed n only get single bed. The breakfast is decent and I am satisfied. But the selection is almost the same for the alternate days. It will be great if can have more selection or change the menu and not repeating within 4 days.

title: Nice and comfortable hotel
desc: Nice hotel for family, children like the hotel at all, room is very clean, the staff all is good. Next when I go to singapore I will stay at Concorde and will recomended to my friends..near shopping centre too..!

title: Brilliant Location
desc: This Hotel is in the perfect spot to explore shops, restaurants and to be transported to anywhere in the city. The rooms are clean and very comfortable. The staff are helpful. The concierge was also of assistance when needed.

title: overall satisfactory
desc: overall satisfactory except the breakfast was not very fulfilling. The items were limited and kids' cutlery set were not provided. Nevertheless, overall the staff were courteous and friendly. Would consider staying in the hotel again.

title: First time in Singapore
desc: I was here for business trip, and my room was on the 9th floor. View out of my window was facing adjacent building. Room was very clean and big, I had king bed, the bathroom and shower were elegant. The ceiling shower spout was large, and very relaxing. There is also handheld shower spout if needed. The mirror in the bath was able to rotate from normal mirror image to magnification image. The partition between the bathroom and bedroom was wall from the floor half way up and then transitioned to glass from half way to ceiling. I really liked this look!

title: Nice hotel
desc: Hotel Concorde is in a great location. Breakfast is plentiful and a good variety to cater for many nationalities. The pool is a good size and nice and quiet. The gym looked good but we didn‚Äôt use it. All the staff were really helpful and accommodating. The hotel is in a great location with a bus stop right outside and only a 5 minute walk to Dobby Gaut station.

title: Courteous and comfortable
desc: The stay at Concorde was wonderful for us. The staff - we felt - were every ready to help us; their courteous ways made us comfortable. The hotel is good, food we felt was nice and the breakfast spread was excellent.

title: Excellent services for us
desc: We sincerely appreciate your warm services. Especially, we arrived at your hotel on around AM11:00 in the morning, but your staff arranged early check-in service with smile. We had baby at this time, my wife appreciated your warm service. And your room keeping service lady gave us good services, especially for our baby. We sincerely appreciate again for your all services. Thank you so much.

title: convenient location
desc: building is old but well renovated and comfortable. The quality of the breakfast is no good. Location is nice for all purpose. Service of the hotel peoples are 5 star hotel quality. Only the breakfast is 2 star hotel quality.

title: Another Holiday stay with Concorde Hotel
desc: My family has been staying with Concorde Hotel since 2015. We have stayed in the old, newly renovated and also in their premium rooms, regardless whichever room, we always enjoy our stay with them. Location wise is great as it is only 10 minutes walk (with children) to MRT station.

title: Friendly people and convinient location
desc: I visited for bisuness and stayed for 2 weeks. Metro station is very close and there a lot of restrants and shops around. Also people were very friendly. Musician played a piano in lobby Friday evening. I spent comfortable time here.

title: Room
desc: the rug inside room is smell bad and to moisture. I also found some previous guest hair in the refrigerator and in the restroom. Moreover I feel unsafety on the slide door at the corridors because of the only hook lock.

title: Overall good hotel....
desc: We stayed there for 3 nights.Location of the hotel is great.MRT , Bus Stops & Shopping malls are all nearby.Our room is clean & comfortable.The service was excellent.Breakfast was good,but variety of the food are limited.Staff was very polite & friendly.Specially ,Ms.Reeta is so friendly & very pleasant.Overall Its a very good hotel.

title: Not good
desc: The room is dirty and old. Insects found. Drivers normally do not know where is it and extra time is needed to wait for called cab. Breakfast is not good but staff generally are polite. Will not choose to stay.

title: Good hotel for a couple of days
desc: I recently stayed here for a couple of nights and aside from some confusion at check in, the rest of the stay was acceptable. The rooms are clean, the linens are comfortable and the restaurant puts out good food. Like many places in Singapore, you can get a shock when the bill comes but nothing was out of the ordinary or over priced.

title: Heart of Orchard Road
desc: We love the location of Concorde Hotel. It's centrally located to shopping and even has a 24 hour Japanese Supermarket nearby. We hear that you will be in luck if you stay during Christmas season and the roads will be decked with lightings. Be sure to check out their lunch buffet that offers a variety of Peranakan food.

title: Close to the Business Centre
desc: A good choice in case you have work around the business district with close by option of good food and cafe Rooms are quite spacious and has all the amenities you would look for on your business travel

title: Hotel is fantastic!
desc: Hotel staff are polite and the overall ambience is fantastic. I will definitely recommend this place my families and friend. Their seafood buffet is a must to try and items were all fresh. Will come back again.

title: pleasant stay
desc: Check-in without a hassle. Normal procedure of check-in for a hotel. Drinks were served during check-in. It was indeed a pleasant stay. The room was big and spacious. Need to improvise on the lighting.

title: Location, peacefulness, comfort.
desc: The gym equipment was outdated, but still very much ol to use. Peacefulness and convient location is what I love in Concorde. I would also suggest to have a digital weighting scale for the guest luggage. Overall it's all very good and I would recommend it to anyone.

title: Parents‚Äô Staycay
desc: booked a room for my parents for one night. they really enjoyed it. thank you for the balcony upgrade so my dad could smoke. assigned a room based on my requests, the GSO was very friendly and nice. would definitely book another staycay there again soon.

title: muhammad ayub siddiqui
desc: our experience is excellent. everything is perfect. please start offer halal food as well. thank you ‚ò∫Ô∏è we found singapore an amazing place to visit every single person is welcoming and honest........

title: good
desc: it was good stay and the staff are friendly except for the concierge staff literally not friendly at all.but overall everything was good experience. i hope the hotel should remain the smart phone facility which make easier especially for the tourist

title: Everything is perfect
desc: Faciliaties are all clean. All employees are very very Kind. Location is one of the nearst hotel in downtown. When I wanted to open the window, but I couldn''t. So I couldn't have fresh air, when I wanted. This is very small disadvantage.

title: Great stay at the Concorde Hotel
desc: We stayed at the Concorde for a week, the room was very clean, the Staff were very polite and helpful especially Rita at Spices Caf√© where we had breakfast every morning we would recommend the Concorde to family and friends

title: I was unlucky
desc: Now Room renovation almost completed. Location is so convienient next to the Orchard Central and Center Point , Takashimaya and Paragon. Bus stop is in front of the Hotel , MRT station also near 5 minutes walk.

title: Very impressed.
desc: Our travel agent recommend several hotels in Singapore for us to stay at during out 3 day stopover in Singapore. The reviews on the hotels we were offered weren't very good and didn't inspire us to stay at them, so we did our own research and eventually decided on the Concorde Hotel. I can only say that the Concorde Hotel fulfilled all of our expectations, a lovely Hotel which was quiet, had lovely 'clean' well appointed ooms and facilities. We found the staff extremely courteous, obliging and friendly. The hotel is also close to transport, restaurants and shopping facilities. We highly recommend the Concorde Hotel and we will stay here again if we return to Singapore.

title: Handy
desc: Reasonably close to the airport. Within walking distance to every place we wanted to visit. Very handy for pubs and food. We had a very good time and would definitely stay at this hotel if the opportunity arose again.

title: One of the best experiences!
desc: I stayed in premier suite. The room was really big with all kind of decoration. Receptionist was very cordial and allowed early check with no charges. Location of hotel is also fantastic with bus stop just in front of it.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Excellent service and friendly staff throughout the hotel Breakfast very good excellent choices staff that stood out at breakfast Rita and Shaun Room was clean and tidy plenty of space William who made room etc excellent bed very comfortable Excellent pool area very clean plenty off sun lounges and seats Checking in and out very good and easy Had the seafood buffet was excellent value for money and plenty of choices Overall comment on hotel staff is excellent and a very important part of the reason for my comments because my stay was relaxing and hassle free Your desk was excellent and Dy Ann who helped us choose where and when to go and how to get there another reason I would highly recommend this hotel The only down side I would say is the price in your bar area are bit

title: Concorde hotel singapore
desc: Best location at orchard road. Malls are very near and mustafa street is at 5min drive Neat and clean room and very coperative staff Tip to trip adivsor. Kindly keep review simple. I find it complex üòä

title: Alex Aug 2019
desc: Excellent accommodation, good location and facilities for a business trip to Singapore. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. The hotel is very well located and provides easy access to Orchard Rd and the MRT

title: Concorde Hotel Singapore
desc: Hotel is lovely and staff very attentive but go somewhere else for breakfast. The chef served up uncooked pancakes because he was too busy on his mobile phone and then the next morning he served up a semi cooked omelette without the ham and mushrooms we had ordered. Not sure where he learnt to cook but where I come from omelettes and pancakes are pretty basic fare..... üò¢

title: Great experience for a shorter period of time
desc: although it was a shot period of time, i really enjoyed staying at this hotel. Great location. Food was also great and a daily replenishments of food and drinks at the mini bas was a plus to a premier suite room. although i didnt spend more time at the hotel bc of the business meeting, it still a great overall experience.

title: Second time just as nice
desc: Second time staying at the Concorde and once again a pleasant stay. The staff are friendly and helpful and rooms are of clean and comfortable. Great location on Orchard Road for shopping or walking distance to MRT stations.

title: Location, location, location
desc: While it obviously shows its age, the Concorde is a well-appointed and comfortable hotel located right smack between two MRT stations (Dhoby Ghaut and Somerset) and barely 5 minutes walk to several malls with abundant food choices. Getting into the lobby was a bit confusing as the split-level location of the entrance means you need to get on an escalator, but once you're in, the check-in was breezy, and the kids enjoyed the quaint bubble lift (something we're used to in Malaysia if you grew up in the 80s). The room we took had a king-sized bed and an additional single bed, which was perfect for our family of 4 (with two young kids) but probably very cramped if they were any older. We didn't use any of the facilities as we only used the hotel as a base for our walking and public

title: Staycation for my parents
desc: This is the 2nd time that I booked the same hotel for our staycation within 3 months. We really like the service and the staffs are friendly. We will definitely choose back the same hotel for other occasion.

title: Recommended by the travel agent and lived up to expectations
desc: We both enjoyed the peace and quiet the rooms offered with little or no noise from adjacent rooms. .Servicing of the room was as expected. Concierge, Stephen, was very friendly in ordering a taxi and another concierge was helpful with local bus details to go to Chinatown

title: clean and big room for biz trip
desc: everything is average, price acceptable, not too far from MRT or bus stop, close to department store and easy to walk along Orchard road, many of street food around hotel at the night. Breakfast is good.

title: Good location only.
desc: Not value for money. Power outage. Dead cockroach found inside guestroom. Water splashing on the toilet floor as there is no cover in the showering area. The only plus is the location: the hotel is located between 2 MRT stations (Dhoby Ghaut & Somerset) which is quite convenient for visitors.

title: Great situation
desc: Very handy to buses laundromat and restaurants, rooms big but couldn't open a window, bed was very comfortable and had a great bathroom and shower.a good stopover hotel. Ant think of anything else to say to fill up the 200 words!

title: The friendly Hotel
desc: Close to most things to see and do.Shop and eat.staff very helpful.Room nice and cool.bottled water on arrival.juice on arrival when checking in.Can buy cheaper tickets for Gardens at hotel.cabs very reasonable except for a private cab which was double!

title: Good and Convinient
desc: Very close to several famous place There are some food court next to this hotel. Noodle was quite nice. Highway gate is also near, so very convinient to visit from Airport. Breakfast doesn't have so much various food but taste was not so bad.

title: very nice
desc: great location on Orchard Road. Walking distance to shopping and dining. MRT is closeby. Staff is welcoming and efficient. Beds are very comfortable. Room was spotless. Breakfast is good but the menu never changes.

title: Thank you so much
desc: It was such a nice stay! Your staff are amazing and very helpful!Thank you so much for this birthday cake, you really made my day‚ù§Ô∏è! Would definitely recommend the hotel and hope to come again soon!!!

title: Surpassed expectations
desc: The front desk staff are one of the most friendly and professional people I‚Äôve ever met. Concorde hotel did a great job training them. However, breakfast variety can be improve. Overall a pleasant stay!

title: Surpassed expectations
desc: Thank you Concorde Hotel staff for the hospitality. The hotel is wonderful. Excellent location. Close to eateries, malls, MRT stations, bus stop right in front of it etc. The housekeeping manager always greeted us everytime she saw us. The staff overall were excellent and friendly. Didn't had the chance to drop by the gym but the pool was lovely. Big enough for laps and it was heated. So no worries about getting cold. There was a playground at the pool too for kids. It's a great place for a family to hang out after a long day travelling. We went for breakfast one time and we weren't really excited by it. Not that the food wasn't great but just not to our tastes. We used the credits we had for the breakfast and felt it wasn't worth paying that much. If there was one

title: Nice hotel for shopping
desc: Hotel is good for shopping experience as located in Orchard Road. Breakfast have limited variety and quality was just ok but not as expected. Room size is big and clean Hotel lobby is nice and they have tours desk.

title: 4d/3n stay at Concorde
desc: It was good improvement after refurbishment. Recommended to anyone for business and leisure stay. I had a nice surprise when I came back from meeting to find a piece of birthday cake along with candles as it was my birthday.

title: Dazed and confused
desc: The first room we had was on the 4th floor. Big bathroom and balcony. . 2 nights . Then we moved to 8th floor last night no balcony and smaller bathroom and they call it an upgrade! The buffet breakfast was decent!

title: My stay at Concorde Hotel Singapore - Aug 2019
desc: the hotel is very well located very close to shops , bars etc...It is also very well connected with public transportation and obviously taxis are always available at the lobby. The team is very friendly

title: Overnight stay
desc: Had one night stay, staff were helpful and hotel facilities good. Most things we wanted outside hotel were within a short distance (convenience store, ATM, alternative eating places, etc). Bus and taxi very close by.

title: A great stay in Singapore
desc: Well located to MRT & buses & is close to shops. Staff were helpful & cheery to first-time tourists. Room was big, bed was large & comfy, minimal street noise, shower great. Pool was lovely. Great taste & range at breakfast.

title: Excellent location with excellent servic to match
desc: stayed 2 nights here, bf is excellent, couldnt enjoy more due to work commitments welcome drink was perfect timing as I checked in almost to midnight even though its beside main road, and my room looks at the main road, not noisy at all due to time constraints, couldnt check out other restaurants but the breakfast buffet was excellent facility wise I did not try anything there but would be good if there is in room massage service or massage center inside hotel

title: My place to stay in Singapore
desc: The hotel Concorde has a great location at Orchard road near the Istana Palace and mayor malls. The service was amazing. The room had good space and it was very clean and confortable. The restaurant offer good food.

title: Excellent Location & Spacious Room. However, service probably need some improvement
desc: Excellent Location & Spacious Room. However, I am a little disappointed with the service during this visit for 3 nights stay. Firstly the room do not have a window. Secondly, the housekeeping did not throw rubbish for one of the nights, and also did not change the towel for 2 consecutive days.

title: Just OK
desc: Great location but facility is starting to show it's age. Breakfast not what it used to be, everything seems to be watered down, including the quality of meats and the curry was like congee, so watery.

title: A PLEASANT STAY AT CONCORDE
desc: We had a wonderful stay at Hotel Concord for 5 nights. Lobby is impressive and staff is courteous. Check in process was quick and so was check out. We were given a neat and clean room with good bathroom on 7th floor and it had a balcony. We enjoyed the stay, restaurant and bar here. Location is excellent as it is on Orchard road and it was easy to commute to different places.

title: Business and pleasure for 6 days
desc: Great hotel with very good staff. Everything was up to expectations. You got a very good feeling that you were welcome and that all staff was there to service you. Excellent renovation done last year so both character and quality was there.

title: confusion on elevator direction and food quality
desc: I have spent 5 mins confusing on elevator direction. this is my first itme with this hotel applying premium type but got very confusion on elevator up/down . i use wrong elevator and never find the way back to lobby. Food quality on salad vegetable and noisy place in morning breakfast bar.

title: Comfortable and clean
desc: The staff served welcome drink when I was checking in. The hotel have smoking room and non-smoking room as you prefer. The hotel located on Orchard road near the Plaza Singapura, and other shopping mail. Take it easy to find and I like the space in the room not quite small.

title: Old Hotel with good maintenance
desc: this old hotel BUT the location is super. and the cleanness still on prime. surely lot of facility is already old. (pool and gym). but the room already being renovated. the worst thing is the breakfast. lack of variations and the taste very usual. anyway since it is on orchard, better go out to take breakfast.

title: need improved
desc: Good location , breakfast so many need improved like a taste , varian , team front office full support , add channel TV , over all good , improved information location like a marina bay , merlion ,garden by the bay , universal , etc.

title: Singapore Stop Over
desc: This was my second time staying at The Concorde. Staff are wonderful, nothing is too much trouble. Rooms are fabulously decorated and clean. The location is perfect for shoppers. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Best location in orchard
desc: Good location with affordable price in orchard. Overall for the room is clean and comfortable. We love the design of the hotel. The only thing is I‚Äôm not sure is that everyone will get welcoming drinks while check in. I do not get mine. Not sure is it welcoming drinks is for selective people.

title: Family room is fabulous
desc: Nice experience. Very spacious family room . My two kids were loving it. Big bath tub as well as a shower room. The bunker bed is lovely, my son was loving to stay upstairs and enjoy his own private time. Will definitely stay here again.

title: A very good stay, as always
desc: A very good hotel for business as well as short holiday trips. Excellent location on Orchard Road very near to two MRT stations. Guests who need quiet rooms should ask for room facing the back street. Rooms are big with a good size desk. Swimming pool is of a decent size, a you can actually swim there. Breakfast finishes at 10.30 am, which was a challenge for my friends who had to cope with jet lag. On the other hand there is plenty of places to eat around the hotel. Hotel staff is very helpful, so as usual we had a pleasant stay.

title: Concorde Hotel
desc: Concorde Hotel is an old hotel with over 30 years history but renovated before. Great location with many eateries and shopping centers nearby. MRT is about 10 mins walking distance. Taxi stand at main lobby.

title: Travel Singapore in August 2019
desc: Hotel location is not far from the subway station. Counter service staff is still very professional. The room is comfortable, but daily cleaning and replacement supplies need to be strengthened. Forcing to write 200 words is a bit unreasonable.

title: Fantastic on all counts
desc: Stayed for two nights with our small family group of 5.Arrived in the early hours and really impressed our rooms were available after a long flight so we could get some sleep before exploring Singapore. Special mention to the staff in the Premier Lounge - great service with a genuine, friendly and caring manner!! Location superb being right on Orchard Road. Can highly recommend!!

title: Comfortable stay & 2 mins walk to shopping paradise
desc: I was on a business visit and stayed in Concorde as my company booked it for me. Location is the most important factor; it's amidst all the upscale shopping malls and diners and walkable to CBD area. Bus stops and taxis were easily available. 7-Eleven was 3 mins walk incase you need to buy anything immediately (Sim card/ snacks etc) The first thing I experienced is when I entered the hotel to check in, the service staff never helped with my luggage, even till the reception and I was carrying quiet a lot. However, the overall service experience was good. The room was clean and toiletries were available. Breakfast was delicious.

title: concorde
desc: Entrance difficult to find. Taxi had to take a long detour. And even coming from Orchard road is a bit of an adventure. But once in, the hotel is nice. No toiletries but that's ok. Overall good and value for money.

title: Dissapointing check in experience
desc: Booked club room and had a very cold and demotivated receptionist. Although the room was nice, looking at the age of this hotel, the room‚Äôs aircon was very noisy. I have requested for a room with a better maintained aircon. The response of the receptionist on the phone (who was exactly the one that checked me in) can be best described as bitchy. I felt like being a hassle. Result was that I had been given a far smaller room, and not the same category. After my second complain they gave me a room with the same size, however not the same category. With my patience wearing thin, I went downstairs and asked them to assign me a room according to my booking after I return from my business meeting. Apparently, they have given me a room from one of the highest categories, however the

title: Four day break
desc: This was exactly how we remembered from our last trip! AMAZING service, staff are excellent. In particular I found the evening meal was much nicer as Suki was our waitress it was a Buffett but I can eat only limited amount due to illness, but Suki kept returning to ask if she can get me soup? Or anything she was so caring. The rooms are quite spacious and lovely finishes. Nothing was too much trouble. All staff from top to bottom were always ready to offer assistance and to advise on where to go and where they thought we might be better away from. Such a beautiful experience to speak to the people who ‚Äúlive‚Äù here permanently. I even got to speak some Indonesian that I learnt many years ago. Each evening a gentleman and I say that because he really is a

title: Would have been a 5 star, however a rude waitress takes away the 2 star.
desc: I stayed at Concorde Hotel Singapore for 2 nights with my mom and her fianc√©.We had 2 rooms per night.The receptionist thst checked us in made us very welcome and I was upgraded to a big room with balcony. I was so surprised how big the room was. As we arrived late around after 9 PM on Aug 2 and we missed the dibbercbuffet, we went to Spicey Restaurant the first evening and were very well welcomed. We got to choose "Asian cousine" and "Late night snacks" menu and really enjoyed the food. My mom and I chose the Asian couisine and my mom's fianc√© chose the "Late snack menu".Great service! We decided to go back to Spicey Restaurant the next night and its then the horrible and disastrous experience started. My mom and her fianc√© came a bit before me at the restaurant and I came

title: recommendable location and good meeting rooms
desc: The location is very good, but there are confusing shops and night bars in the building. Felt uncomfortable because of night bar. During my stay of 3 nights i did not received the room service, so i can not say something regarding the room service. But the personal of the hotel was good. In total was good and nice to stay in the hotel.

title: Value & Location
desc: Nice quiet hotel overall. Big room and balcony, very comfy bed. The pool area was great, lots of lounges and umbrellas. Great location, right at the beginning of Orchard Road shopping strip. Very helpful staff, excellent service all round.

title: nice stay
desc: It was very nice for all through our staying, but water drain was not enough in the shower room. I had water over flow problem as like as this time when I stayed a few years ago. I think water facility of your hotel have some problems so you had better to check your water facilities.

title: accessiblle
desc: This hotel is very accessible. It is quite near to high-end malls, cheap souvenir shops and food stalls, and other establishments. Staff are very friendly. Very good lunch and dinner buffet. Nice bathroom.

title: Singapore holiday 2019
desc: Excellent Hotel,great location.Tip,take the Premium upgrade you will not regret it.Spices restaurant has a very good breakfast with a wide selection of western and Asian fare.The dinner menu is wide and varied Including lobster thermodor and rack of lamb.Wine list has a good range of wines including reds from Western Australia.Taxi through concierge very easy but do use the MRT , it is cheap and so efficient. Relax after dinner or shopping to lobby pianist of an evening. One last item is the tour desk,buy your attraction tickets there from this most friendly lady and save on entrance fees.I fate this a good place to stay.

title: Really bad
desc: It‚Äôs Old and dirty, the toilet and the sink was full of mold, the curtains was really dirty too. The breakfast is bad, it‚Äôs seems like it don‚Äôt care to anyone, and is just to have the service. The staff has nice and the hotel is good located.

title: Great Location
desc: In orchard road opposite the park so no complaints on that score, excellent staff, pretty good for lunch and dinner but breakfast, not so much. Rooms were generously sized but this venue loses a star as things were just a bit tired with chips and scratches on furniture and the like. Otherwise a very good hotel.

title: Very clean and nice service
desc: The room very clean and all service very nice. Good location, we can go to shopping easy. Near restaurant, near shopping center, easy to go to famous place and nearly subway. And very safe for alone travel.

title: Hotel Staying Experience
desc: It was an impromptu travel trip to Singapore and stayed at the Concorde. Stayed for a day and really enjoyed the hotel. Was warmly greeted by the Staff. Strategically located near to the Orchard Road and the heritage trail where past buildings can be seen which added up to the experience in Singapore. The buffet breakfast was good but it will be good to add more choices.

title: Great location
desc: Great location within the heart of the city. Office was right across the hotel so super convnenient for business travel. There were shopping malls wihin walking distance where you could go experience the local culture within the vicinity. Nice facilities and service. I would visit again.

title: Family stay @ Concorde Orchard
desc: The room is spacious but need to be cleaned better. It was decently cleaned but not as clean as I expect a 5-star hotel to be. Location is within walking distance to somerset & takashimaya, a bit far to walk to ion orchard.

title: Good stay
desc: I regret two things. At the reception , i came two Times to validate my late check out, which was done before i ask ( because i recieve the confirmation by my boss) late Check out was already payed. And the second things at arrival i was ont informed abouti my benefits fort things stay...

title: The hotel is maintained wel but is a bit "over the hill"
desc: rooms needs some updates, you lobby bar is not cosy. you could install a real bar with bartender ! the front desk reception girls were very service minded excellent job! your wifi in the lobby works only one hour free! WITH a renewed password obtained from the front desk! that should be at least 3 hours... We had to wait 9 hours in you hotel lobby before pick up from your lobby to the airport. Due to the fact that a late check out was not possible. every hour we had to ask a new passport.

title: thank you
desc: It became a very good memory. I was glad to receive my luggage twice. I was able to spend comfortably. Thank you for your support in Japanese. I appreciate it very much.It was a very nice hotel.thank you

title: Location: Shopping Central
desc: Located in the heart of Orchard Road where you can find near to every shop and brand you can think of. Bustling streets but nothing but serenity in the room when u wish to sleep. Would definitely stay here again if was to come back.

title: Old is gold, yet up to date to stay modernized.
desc: Satisfied for overall service, only want to suggest that receptionist should know where the rooms are located so that she should advise us the nearer lift and we didn't need to walk a long way to our room.

title: Poor value for money
desc: The deluxe plus room was spacious for a family of three (2 adults, 1 ten year old).however to our disappointment, There were a few hiccups during our stay. Rooms did not have basic things like toothbrush, toothpaste and hairdryer. There were only two lifts servicing our wing and one of it was under maintenance. So the wait was quite long. The most dissatisfying part of the stay was the fitness centre. It does not reflect the reality as compared to the photos in your website. Only one threadmills was available and it was not maintained well. Most of the gym equipments were old and about to give way. The room was also poorly lit and does not reflect a 4 star hotel kinda ambience. All in all, I strongly feel that this is poor value for money.

title: Excellent location & Comfortable Rooms
desc: With just a 5 mins walk to the Plaza Singapura, which houses the Dhoby Ghaut MRT station., and also a 3 mins. walk to the shopping centers on Orchard Road, you can't beat the hotel's location. The staff are also friendly and efficient, and the newly-renovated rooms now have a proper shower area rather than having to hop in and out of the bath tub for a shower like before!

title: Great location, great hotel
desc: The Concorde may not be everyones cuppa tea but for us it was great. Compared to other hotels in Singapore we found this hotel clean, the room was nicely made up, the breakfast (Rita was an amazing lady) was well presented, hot, with lots of variety, the pool was good. The location was great, close to the train/underground and Museums close by. Absolutely no problems at all. We would stay again and regret I did not choose to stay here on our return.

title: Staycation
desc: Great location in Orchard Road and newly renovated rooms with comfortable bed. Loved the hugh bathroom and definitely friendly staff. Nice breakfast spread but must be early and very efficiently ends on time at 1030hrs with no more top up after 0945hrs.
